exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: clean toilet
WATER SOLUBLE EMULSION OF PIGMENT MATERIAL EXTRACTED FROM RED PEPPER, MANUFACTURING METHOD THEREOF, WATER SOLUBLE POWDER AND MANUFACTURING METHOD OF WATER SOLUBLE POWDER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for making water-soluble emulsion and a manufacturing method of water soluble powder are provided to maintain a product of high quality for a long time without color change of water soluble pigment material powder. CONSTITUTION: Water-soluble emulsion of pigment materials includes a pigment material extracted from Capsicum, edible vegetable oil, oil phase emulsion containing medium chain neutral lipid, water, glycerine, sucrose and an emulsifying agent. The pigment material is oleoresin, the vegetable oil is soybean oil. The pigment material is contained in the liquid oil emulsion with the weight ratio of 20~40 weight%.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: bottle cap of soju
STAPLER WITH A LEG-FLATTING DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A stapler with a leg-leveling device is provided to simplify the structure and have labor-saving effect by employing a labor saving lever system. CONSTITUTION: A stapler comprises a support base(10), a magazine assembly(20), a trigger assembly(30), and a leg-leveling device(40). The trigger assembly has a trigger lever(31) and a pressing element(36). The leg-leveling device includes a sliding base which slides on the support base and has a press piece which is selectively pressed by an arm(361) of the pressing element, a movable base(43) which is selectively blocked by the sliding base not to move downward before the sliding base is slid on the support base, and an anvil element(45).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: An apparatus for ceramic short fibers using sol-gel method
COMPOSITION FOR IMPROVING UROLOGIC FUNCTION USING EXTRACTION OF BOKBUNJA

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A composition containing Rubus coreanus Miquel extract for improving urinary function is provided to suppress contractile reduction of bladder muscle and treat erectile failure. CONSTITUTION: A composition for improving urinary function contains Rubus coreanus Miquel extract. The composition further contains L-arginine or vitamin E. A functional health food for improving election and urinary function contains Rubus coreanus Miquel extract. A method for producing the Rubus coreanus Miquel extract comprises: a step of pulverizing 1kg of Rubus coreanus Miquel fruit using a pulverizer; a step of adding Rubus coreanus Miquel fruit to 3kg of ethanol and stirring at room temperature for 5 hours; a step of filtering at room temperature; a step of evaporating ethanol; and a step of vacuum-drying the extract.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: Nipple Insertion Checkvalve
METHOD FOR VOXELIZATION USING COLOR CODED POLYGONS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A voxelization method using a color code of a polygon is provided to configure counter information which distinguishes the inside and the outside of an object according to a color code, thereby shortening reducing the time consumed for during a voxelization process. CONSTITUTION: Color codes are assigned to each polygon of a 3D model through polygon mesh information about of a 3D model(S1,S2). The 3D model is sliced(S3). A voxel is searched through the pixel information of the sliced section(S4). A counter is composed through the pixel information. Internal information and external information of the 3D model are identified through the counter.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: Desk for computer

exch:applicant-name.name: KOREA INSTITUTE OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FABRICATION METHOD OF ORGANOCLAY USING SONICATION AND FABRICATION METHOD OF POLYMER NANOCOMPOSITE USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A manufacturing method of an organic clay using sonic waves and a nanocomposite using the same is provided to make layered clays in the polymer matrix to fully exfoliate and disperse by effectively inserting an organic modifier. CONSTITUTION: A manufacturing method of an organic clay comprises the steps of: processing a solution including clay having layer structure with an ultrasonic wave; inserting an organic modifier into the inter-layer of the clay which is treated with the ultrasonic wave; and repeating the process of the ultrasonic wave for 10~120 minutes by the size of 50~500w. The clay is selected from montmorillonite, saponite, hectorite, beidellite, bentonite, nontronite, laponite, vermiculite, illite, muscovite, mica, mica fluoride or the compound of the same.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: multi-functional pole
ELECTRIC OVEN

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An electric oven which secures the cavity size of an electric oven is provided to separate parts of a steam generator by a user by installing the steam generator on the outside of the electric oven. CONSTITUTION: An electric oven comprises a case, a cavity(S), a steam generator(100) and a manipulation part(53). The case forms the outer tube. The cavity is included inside the case has a steam emit hole. The steam generator makes the steam provided to the steam emit hole. The manipulation part comprises a button which inputs an actuating signal and is located in front of the case. The steam generator is included outside the case.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: TENT
METHOD FOR PREPARING TAKJU USING GERMINATED RICE SEED AND METHOD FOR PREPARING SPARKLING TAKJU USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for producing coarse liquor and effervescent liquor using germinated rice seed is provided to ensure rice flavor and soft texture and have anti-oxidation function and physiological activity. CONSTITUTION: A method for producing coarse liquor comprises a step of saccharifying liquor ingredients including germinated rice seeds using coenzyme, a step of adding hop to the saccharified liquid, and a step of fermenting and maturing. The germinated rice seed is obtained by: immersing rice seeds in water, germinating the rice seeds until the length of the rice seed is 50-100% of average length, and a removing young bud and young root. The liquor ingredients are only germinated rice seeds or mixture of germinated rice seeds and other grains. The coenzyme is koji. The koji is Rhyzophus. Sp, Aspergillus usami or Aspergillus oryzae.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: Scratch check up paper of correct answers
MOBILE TERMINAL AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING IMAGE THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for controlling image of a mobile terminal is provided to selectively control image on web page and reconstitute the web page as needed. CONSTITUTION: A method for controlling image of a mobile terminal comprises: a step(S101) of connecting on the internet through a wireless internet module using a control unit; a step(S103) of selecting at least one or more images on web page; a step(S105) of setting image display mode by user's input; a step(S107,S109) of hiding the selected image according to the setting; a step(S111) of finishing internet connection; and a step(S113) of storing the set information in a memory.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR DISINFECTING FOR A VEHICLE

exch:applicant-name.name: SUNGKYUNKWAN UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION FOR CORPORATE COLLABORATION

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR BINDING UPDATE OF MIPV6

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A binding update method of MIPv6(Mobile Internet Protocol version 6) is provided to block attack in advent and guarantee safe communication. CONSTITUTION: A binding update method of MIPv6(Mobile Internet Protocol version 6) comprises: a step of obtaining HT(Home keygen Token) and CT(Care of keygen Token) from HoT(Home of Test) message and CoT(Care-of Test) message; a step(S26) of extracting HT and CT from BU(Binding Update) message of a mobile node; a step of determining(S27) the BU message as a normal message when the authentication is successful; a step(S28) of transmitting BA(Binding Ack) message to the mobile node; and a step(S29) of terminating the message.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FRESH MEAT SLICER
YOGHURT COMPRISING RUBUS COREANUS MIQUEL, LYCOPENE AND PREPARATION METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: Yogurt containing Rubus coreanus and lycopene and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to improve healthful functions by adding the Rubus coreanus and the lycopene, and to increase incomes of farmers. CONSTITUTION: Yogurt contains 0.1~10 parts by weight of Rubus coreanus and 0.01~5 parts by weight of lycopene. The yogurt further includes one or more selected from a group consisting of Hovenia dulcis fruit, Hovenia dulcis root, Hovenia dulcis leaves, Cassia tora, Dioscorea batatas, Sinomenium acutum, Atractylodes japonica, Poria cocos, Rheum undulatum, Areca catechu, Eucommia ulmoides, Cnidium monnieri etc.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BACKBONE REMEDY APPARATUS

exch:applicant-name.name: KYUNGPOOK NATIONAL UNIVERSITY INDUSTRY-ACADEMIC COOPERATION FOUNDATION

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COMPOSITION FOR GLUCOSE SENSING COMPRISING OF NANOFIBROUS MEMBRANE AND METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING NON-ENZYMATIC GLUCOSE BIOSENSOR USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A glucose sensing composition containing nanofibrous membrane is provided to maintain sensitivity, selectivity, and stability to glucose. CONSTITUTION: A composition for sensing glucose contains a material obtained by dispersing nanofibrous membrane in a solvent. The nanofibrous membrane is obtained by electrospinning mixture of poly(vinyldenfluoride) and poly(aminophenylboronic acid). The ratio of poly(vinyldenfluoride) and poly(aminophenylboronic acid) is 90-99 wt% : 10-1 wt%. The solvent additionally contains additive. The solvent is hydrochloric acid, sulfuric acid, dimethylformimide, diethyl ether, acetone, chloroform, methanol, isopropyl alcohol, methylethyl ketone, tetrahydro furan, toluene, benzene or xylene. A method for producing non-enzymetic glucose biosensor of nanofibrous base comprises: a step of preparing a nanofibrous membrane by electrospinning mixture of poly(vinyldenfluoride) and poly(aminophenylboronic acid); a step of dispersing nanofibrous membrane in the solvent to obtain glucose sensing composition; and a step of depositing the composition on an electrode.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: Functional Underwear For Women
METHOD, APPARATUS AND COMPUTER-READABLE RECORDING MEDIUM FOR ANSWERING QUESTIONS ISSUED BY USER DURING USING CONTENTS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method, an apparatus and a computer-readable recording medium for solving questions of a user between users during the use of contents are provided to supply an answer for a question in real time, thereby satisfying a requirement of a questioner. CONSTITUTION: A question content receiver of a server provides a user interface for asking a question to a questioner terminal(S202). A question content is received from the questioner(S203). At least one user among users who currently access a server is selected as an answerer for the question(S206). An answer content is received from the selected answerer(S208). The received answer content is transmitted to the questioner (S209). The server provides predetermined compensation to the answerer(S210).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: REVOLVING DISPLAY RACK FOR TELEVISION
METHOD, APPARATUS AND COMPUTER-READABLE RECORDING MEDIUM FOR ANSWERING QUESTIONS ISSUED BY USER DURING USING CONTENTS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method, an apparatus and a computer-readable recording medium for answering questions issued by a user during the use of contents are provided to answer questions generated during the use of contents, thereby providing a real time answer for a question. CONSTITUTION: One or more users among users using contents are bounded in one group to configure at least one answerer group. A question content is received from a questioner with a question(S203). One or more answerer groups among the answerer groups are selected(S205). At least one user among users who belong to the answerer group and currently access a current server are selected for an answer for the question(S207). An answer content is received from the selected answerer(S209). The received answer content is transmitted to the questioner(S210).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: Parasol mosquito net
CHANGING TOOL OF PYLON SUPERANNUATED ELEMENT AND CHANGING METHOD FOR PYLON SUPERANNUATED ELEMENT USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: Replacement equipment for a deteriorated diagonal member of a steel tower, and a construction method using the same are provided to safely replace the deteriorated diagonal member by installing a column supporter, an inclined supporter, and a horizontal supporter. CONSTITUTION: Replacement equipment for a deteriorated diagonal member of a steel tower comprises column supporters(10), inclined supporters(11), and horizontal supporters(12). The column supporters support a steel tower instead of a bridge column(5) when the bridge column is replaced. And the column supporters are installed around a column member(3) in an inverted triangle shape. The inclined supporters are installed inclined between the column member and the column supporters. The horizontal supporters are horizontally installed in the bottom of the inclined supporters.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: Shaving soap
KIMCHI, TO WHICH FUNCTIONAL EXTRACT OF BAMBOO IS ADDED AND METHOD OF MANUFACTURING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: Kimchi containing functional Sasa borealis extract and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to remove the specific tastes of salted fish, and to uniformly maintain tastes of the kimchi regardless of seasons with beneficial effects of components for the kimchi. CONSTITUTION: A manufacturing method of Kimchi containing functional Sasa borealis extract comprises the following steps: drying stems and young leaves of the Sasa borealis for 3 days at a temperature of 65~75°C(S1); filtering the dried stems and young leaves with a 300 mesh sieve; extracting the liquid Sasa borealis in a boiling tub for 20 minutes; filtering the extract; drying the residue in 35~40°C; extracting polysaccharide while continuously extracting the residue; and adding the second extract in the kimchi.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LIGHT REFLECTION WASHER
METHOD, APPARATUS AND COMPUTER-READABLE RECORDING MEDIUM FOR ANSWERING QUESTIONS ISSUED BY USER DURING USING CONTENTS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method, an apparatus and a computer-readable recording medium for answering questions issued by user during the use of contents are provided to satisfy needs of a questioner to answer a question between users during the use of contents. CONSTITUTION: At least one user among users who currently access a server is provided as an answer list(S202). A question content is received from a questioner with curiosity(S203). Information about at least one answerer is received. The question content is transmitted to the selected answerer. An answer content is received from the selected answerer(S209). The received answer content is transmitted to the questioner(S210).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: Supply device of car body panels
FIRING ZIG

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A firing jig is provided to reduce temperature difference according to a load area of a plastic object by making uniform temperature atmosphere through an open area. CONSTITUTION: A setter(110) includes first and second plate structures(111a,111b) and a plurality of wires(112a-112g,113a). The first and second plate structures are positioned along both edges opposite to the setter. The first and second plate structures have a rectangular shape and includes a plurality of open areas(111c) and screw connection holes(111d). The wires connect the first and second plate structures.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: Decoration assembling board use for interior
METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR COMPRESSING REFERENCE FRAME IN VIDEO ENCODING/DECODING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method and an apparatus for compressing a reference image during video encoding/decoding are provided to minimize the deterioration of an image due to a compression of the reference image, thereby reducing power consumption and the use of a memory and power consumption. CONSTITUTION: A maximum/minimum value storage unit(108) stores the maximum values and the minimum values of each sub block. A sub block bit calculation unit(109) calculates the necessary average bits of each sub block. A bit allocation unit(110) changeably assigns bits to each sub block. An image is compressed into the assigned bits.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ELECTRIC TYPE HOT WATER BOILER
SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR TESTING RAM MOTION OF PUSH CAR IN COKE PLANT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A RAM operation test system for a coke factory extruder and a method thereof are provided to test whether the center of RAM is twisted or check abnormality of components which are replaced. CONSTITUTION: A RAM operation test system for a coke factory extruder comprises: a RAM location decision portion(1210) which decides whether the location of RAM formed in an extruder is right or not; a RAM operation part(1220) which receives home position determination signals from the RAM location decision portion and moves the RAM forward and backward; an encoder operation part(1230) which operates an encoder formed in the RAM; and a determining unit(1240) which determines the normality of the RAM operation by receiving the encoder operation completion signals.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: Abdominal Breathing Counter
WIRE-ROD MANUFACTURING METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A wire rod manufacture method is provided to reduce red scales of the rod coil by increasing the amount of cooling water of a reducing-sizing mill and minimizing the amount of the cooling water after the reducing-sizing mill. CONSTITUTION: A wire rod manufacture method comprises following steps: milling materials through a rough mill, a finishing mill(FM), and a reducing-sizing mill(RSM) step; and winding the material which is rolled. Before the reducing-sizing mill step, water cooling rate is 60~70% to minimize red scales.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: Band-Aid Simplicity Pen Holder
APPARATUS FOR CONTROLING WEIGHT OF CHARGING CARS AND METHOD FOR CONTROLING WEIGHT OF CHARGING CARS IN THE APPATATUS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A weight control method of a charging car and a weight control method thereof are provided to maintain a fixed amount of load cells which is loaded into a charged path by installing the load cell on each hopper and controlling the weight of the load cell. CONSTITUTION: A weight control method of a weight control method of a charging car comprises following steps of: establishing charging conditions(201); confirming the weight of the pulverized coal within a plurality of hoppers using plural load cells installed on plural hoppers(202); controlling the charge weight on each hopper according to each identified weigh; and enabling a charging process to each hopper using set values according to control.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MOVEMENT CONTROLLER FOR ELASTIC ROBOT STRUCTURES

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to a control method for a painting robot, comprising the following steps: (a) a robot path is set using several path points that are to be traversed by a reference point of the robot and are each defined by space coordinates; (b) the space coordinates of the individual path points are converted into corresponding axis coordinates according to inverse robot kinematics, said axis coordinates reproducing the position of the individual robot axes in the respective path points; (c) axis-related regulators for the individual robot axes are triggered according to the converted axis coordinates; (d) axis-related driving motors are triggered in the individual robot axes by means of the associated axis-related regulators; (e) corrective path values for the individual path points are calculated according to a dynamic robot model, said corrective path values taking into account the elasticity and/or friction and/or inertia of the robot; (f) corrected axis coordinates for the individual path points are calculated from the non-corrected axis coordinates of the individual path points and the corrective path values; (g) the axis-related regulators are triggered using the corrected axis coordinates.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PISTON ROD SEAL FOR AN INSULATING CYLINDER OF A COATING PLANT

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to a piston rod seal (12) for an insulating cylinder (7) of an electrostatic coating plant, comprising a piston rod guide for guiding a piston rod (11) in an axially movable manner. The piston rod (11) supports a doctoring piston to scrape paint residues off the internal wall of the insulating cylinder (7). The piston rod seal (12) further comprises a first seal (17) for sealing the piston rod guide relative to the piston rod (11). According to the invention, a second seal (18) is additionally provided for sealing the piston rod guide relative to the piston rod (11), said second seal (18) being axially offset relative to the first seal (17).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PROCESS AND APPARATUS FOR MAKING SOOT GLASS SHEET AND SINTERED GLASS SHEET

exch:abstract.exch:p: An apparatus and process for making glass soot sheet and sintered glass sheet. Glass soot particles are deposited on a curved deposition surface (103) of a rotating drum to form a soot sheet. The soot sheet is then released from the deposition surface. The soot sheet can tie sintered into a consolidated glass. The soot sheet and the sintered glass can be sufficiently long and flexible to be reeled into a roll (117).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LIQUID LEVEL AND COMPOSITION SENSING SYSTEMS AND METHODS

exch:abstract.exch:p: An automotive urea solution monitoring device is deployed in conjunction with the urea tank of a selective catalytic reduction vehicle. An RF signal of a constant frequency may be generated across a resonant circuit, which may be comprised of an inductor and a PCB trace capacitor, or the like. Electromagnetic radiation is propagated into the automotive urea solution in the urea tank. The conductivity and dielectric properties of the liquid change the impedance of the discrete/trace capacitor and or the discrete/trace inductor. These changes are proportional to ammonia content, temperature, and/or level of the automotive urea solution in the urea tank and are preferably detected by a microcontroller, or the like, and then transmitted to a selective catalytic reduction vehicle engine management system, or the like.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: REDUCED STRAIN REFRACTORY CERAMIC COMPOSITE AND METHOD OF MAKING

exch:abstract.exch:p: A composition is disclosed comprising a fine zircon component having a median particle size of less than 5 μm, a medium zircon component having a median particle size of from 5 μm to 15 μm, and a sintering aid, wherein the composition, after firing, has a strain rate of less than about 1 10/hr. A method for making a green body comprising contacting a fine zircon component having a median particle size of less than 5 μm, a medium zircon component having a median particle size of from 5 μm to 15 μm, and a sintering aid, and then forming the mixture into a desired shape is disclosed.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CONNECTOR ASSEMBLY FOR PRETERMINATED SYSTEMS

exch:abstract.exch:p: Shielded connector assemblies for use in wiring/cabling applications are disclosed. The connector assemblies include first and second jack openings that facilitate interaction between plugs that feature different contact layouts/alignments, e.g., a first plug that features a conventional CAT 5/CAT 6 contact layout and a second plug that features a contact layout according to the IEC 60603-7-7 standard. Cable/plug combinations are also provided wherein the cable features shielded twisted pair (STP) fully shielded twisted pair (FTP) and unshielded twisted pair (UTP) wires. The cable/plug interface includes a housing wherein individual wires are brought into electrical communication with electrical contacts that are exposed relative to the exterior of the housing. The electrical contacts are positioned in quadrants of the plug housing, when viewed in cross-section, such that the plug complies with the contact geometry set forth in the IEC 60603-7-7 standard. The cable/plug is generally a preterminated assembly, whereby the plug is pre-mounted to the cable before shipment to an installation location or distribution channel. A pulling eye assembly may be provided that defines a cavity sized and configured to receive the plug housing and a portion of the cable.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A THIN CAST STRIP PRODUCT WITH MICROALLOY ADDITIONS, AND METHOD FOR MAKING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: A steel product or thin steel cast strip comprised of, by weight, less than 0.25% carbon, between 0.20 and 2.0% manganese, between 0.05 and 0.50% silicon, less than 0.01% aluminum, and at least one of niobium between 0.01% and 0.20% and vanadium between 0.01% and 0.20%, and having a microstructure of a majority bainite and acicular ferrite, and more than 70% niobium and/or vanadium in solid solution. The steel product may have an increase in elongation and an increase in yield strength after age hardening. The age hardened steel product may have niobium carbonitride particles with an average particle size of 10 nanometers and less, and may have substantially no niobium carbonitride particles greater than 50 nanometers. The steel product may have a yield strength of at least 380 MPa or a tensile strength of at least 410 MPa, or both. The steel product or thin cast steel strip may have a total elongation of at least 6% or 10%.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MODIFIED-IMMOBILIZED ENZYMES OF HIGH TOLERANCE TO HYDROPHILIC SUBSTRATES IN ORGANIC MEDIA

exch:abstract.exch:p: Disclosed are preparations of modified interfacial enzymes, particularly lipases and phospholipases, immobilized on a solid support, wherein the enzyme is surrounded by hydrophobic microenvironment, thereby protected from deactivation and/or aggregation in the presence of hydrophilic agents, substrates and/or reaction products. The enzyme may be protected by being covalently bonded with lipid groups which coat the enzyme, or by being immobilized or embedded in a hydrophobic solid support. Also disclosed are processes for the preparation of the hydrophobically protected enzymes. The enzymes may be efficiently used in the preparation of biodiesel.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PHOTOMASK SUBSTRATE, PHOTOMASK SUBSTRATE FORMING MEMBER, PHOTOMASK SUBSTRATE MANUFACTURING METHOD, PHOTOMASK, AND EXPOSURE METHOD USING PHOTOMASK

exch:abstract.exch:p: A photomask substrate having a substantially uniform thickness comprises a first surface on which a mask pattern is to be formed and a second surface, each made of a continuous curved surface. The first surface is formed into a quadrangle composed of a first pair of sides facing each other and a second pair of sides facing each other and has supporting portions at end portions along the respective sides of the first pair. When the photomask substrate is held such that the first surface is in a substantially vertical state, a reference plane parallel to a tangent plane of the first surface at a center point of the first surface is defined to be on the side closer to the first surface than the second surface with respect to the photomask substrate. At this time, a first distance along a thickness direction between the center point of the first surface and the reference plane is shorter than a second distance along a thickness direction between midpoints of the respective sides of the second pair and the reference plane.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ANTI-CORROSION SYSTEM FOR METALS AND PIGMENT THEREFOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to an anti-corrosion system for metals consisting of at least one finish or coating that can be applied to a metal, said finish or coating comprising an organic matrix. The organic matrix also contains anti-corrosion pigments, which are finely distributed throughout the organic matrix. The anti-corrosion pigments are formed from a metal alloy of at least two metals and optionally from inevitable impurities. The invention also relates to a corresponding anti-corrosion pigment.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PROCESS FOR THE PREPARATION OF COPOLYESTERS BASED ON 2,2,4,4-TETRAMETHYL-1,3-CYCLOBUTANEDIOL AND 1,4-CYCLOHEXANEDIMETHANOL

exch:abstract.exch:p: Disclosed is a process for the preparation of high molecular weight, thermoplastic copolyesters by reacting a diester composition comprising a dialkyl ester of terephthalic acid with a diol composition comprising a first diol component comprising 2,2,4,4-tetramethyl-l,3-cyclobutanediol and a second diol component comprising 1,4-cyclohexanedimethanol. The diester composition can be reacted with the first diol component to produce a polyester oligomer that can be reacted further with the second diol component to produce a modified polyester oligomer. The modified polyester oligomer can then be heated to form a copolyester. The process reduces the precipitation of polyd,4-cyclohexylene dimethylene) terephthalate in the reaction mixture.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: WEAR ASSEMBLY FOR EXCAVATING EQUIPMENT

exch:abstract.exch:p: A wear assembly for excavating equipment includes a base fixed to the excavating equipment, a wear member fit over the base, and a lock to releasably hold the wear member to the base. The wear member includes side relief to reduce drag on the system. The wear member and the base each includes a hemispherical front end and a generally trapezoidal rear portion. The base includes a nose and a stop projecting from the nose to cooperate with the lock without an opening being needed to receive the lock into the nose. The lock is an elongate lock positioned generally in an axial direction and which holds the wear member to the base under compressive loads.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: POLARIZATION CONVERSION SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR STEREOSCOPIC PROJECTION

exch:abstract.exch:p: A polarization conversion system separates light from an unpolarized image source into a first state of polarization (SOP) and an orthogonal second SOP, and directs the polarized light on first and second light paths. The SOP of light on only one of the light paths is transformed to an orthogonal state such that both light paths have the same SOP. A polarization modulator temporally modulates the light on the first and second light paths to first and second output states of polarization. First and second projection lenses direct light on the first and second light paths toward a projection screen to form substantially overlapping polarization encoded images. The polarization modulator may be located before or after the projection lenses. The polarization-encoded images may be viewed using eyewear with appropriate polarization filters.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD TO MAKE LOW RESISTANCE CONTACT

exch:abstract.exch:p: Techniques for fabricating contacts on inverted configuration surfaces of GaN layers of semiconductor devices are provided. An n-doped GaN layer may be formed with a surface exposed by removing a substrate on which the n-doped GaN layer was formed. The crystal structure of such a surface may have a significantly different configuration than the surface of an as-deposited p-doped GaN layer.

exch:applicant-name.name: AWECO APPLIANCE SYSTEMS GMBH & CO. KG

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DOMESTIC APPLIANCE, IN PARTICULAR DISHWASHER, WITH A HEAT EXCHANGER

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention proposes a domestic appliance, such as a washing machine, a dishwasher or the like, which permits process heat to be reused by a flow-type heat exchanger (6) for energy-saving purposes.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DEFECT INSPECTION DEVICE AND DEFECT INSPECTION METHOD FOR SILICON WAFER

exch:abstract.exch:p: An apparatus for inspecting defects of a silicon wafer is provided with an infrared light illuminating apparatus for illuminating the silicon wafer by adjusting a light quantity corresponding to a specific resistivity of the silicon wafer, and an imaging section, which is composed of a line sensor array having sensitivity to infrared light and images the silicon wafer.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SOLUBILIZED FORMULATION OF DOCETAXEL WITHOUT TWEEN 80

exch:abstract.exch:p: Lyophilizates containing docetaxel and the use thereof in preparing concentrated liquid formulations, and ready to use formulations for injection, as well as such concentrates and ready to use formulations themselves are disclosed in which Tween surfactants are avoided so that hypersensitivity reactions to Tween surfactants can be avoided and docetaxel can be administered at higher doses and/or for longer periods of time and/or for additional treatment cycles.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BASE STATION DEVICE, USER DEVICE, AND METHOD IN MOBILE COMMUNICATION SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: A base station device is used in a mobile communication system of the MIMO method which performs precoding. The base station device includes: reception means which receives from a user device, a precoding matrix indicator (PMI) indicating a particular precoding vector; means for deciding a flag indicator value indicating whether to use the precoding vector specified by the PMI for downlink communication; control signal generation means for generating a downstream control signal in accordance with the flag indicator value; and means for transmitting signals including the downstream control signal by a downlink.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: TRANSMISSION DEVICE AND TRANSMISSION METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: A transmission device includes: a plurality of transmission antennas; conversion means which prepares a plurality of signal sequences in accordance with a predetermined frequency bandwidth from at least one transmission stream associated with any one of the transmission antennas; precoding means which weights each of the signal sequences by a predetermined precoding vector selected from a codebook containing a plurality of precoding vectors; and means for converting the output signal from the precoding means into signals of the transmission antennas and transmitting the converted signals from the respective transmission antennas. In the precoding means, different precoding vectors are applied to different signal sequences and the correspondence between the different precoding vectors and the different signal sequences is decided by an open loop control not depending on a feedback from a reception device.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR GENERATING VIDEO HOLOGRAMS FOR A HOLOGRAPHIC REPRODUCTION DEVICE WITH FREE ADDRESSING

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to a method for generating video holograms for a holographic reproduction device (HAE) with at least one light modulation means (SLM), wherein a scene (3D-S) split into object points (OP) is encoded as a whole hologram (HΣ) and can be seen as a reconstruction from a visibility region (VR), which is located within a periodicity interval of the reconstruction of the video hologram. The visibility region (VR), together with each object point (OP) of the scene (3D-S) to be reconstructed, defines a subhologram (SH) and the whole hologram (HΣ) is generated from a superposition of subholograms (SH), wherein in a sequence of image contents the difference subholograms (SD) of object points are preferably generated for each picture, differing in regards to the visibility according to the viewer position (VP) in sequential images (P, P) of the sequence. The display device (HAE) comprises means that provide high-quality video holograms in spite of the data amount being significantly reduced.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ARITHMETIC UNIT

exch:abstract.exch:p: An arithmetic unit for simultaneously processing a plurality of threads in which even if a hardware error occurs, the deterioration of performance as a whole can be minimized to continue the processing is provided. An arithmetic unit (100) has an instruction execution circuit (101) capable of selectively executing the mode in which the instruction sequences of the threads are executed and the mode in which the instruction sequence of a single thread is executed, and a switching instruction circuit (102) for instructing to switch between the thread modes to the instruction execution circuit (101).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: VM23 AND VM24, TWO SCORPION PEPTIDES THAT BLOCK HUMAN T-LYMPHOCYTE POTASSIUM CHANNELS (SUB-TYPE KV1.3) WITH HIGH SELECTIVITY AND DECREASE THE IN VIVO DTH-RESPONSES IN RATS

exch:abstract.exch:p: Potassium channels KvI.3 are known to be implicated in immunological diseases and graft rejections. Disclosed are peptides capable of blocking with high affinity and specificity potassium channels KvI.3, their pharmaceutical compositions, and methods for their use to block KvI.3 potassium channels, to treat various immunological conditions and to diagnostic applications. Methods for their chemical synthesis and correct folding are also disclosed. Exemplary peptides correspond to protein components (Vm23 and Vm24) isolated from the venom of the Mexican scorpion Vaejovis mexicanus smithi. Vm23 and Vm24 bind to hKvl.3 channels in an almost irreversible manner, showing a Kd value in the order of 3 picomolar range, when applied to human lymphocytes cultures in vitro. Vm24 was chemically synthesized and used in in vivo experiments to successfully treat sensitized rats (on the DTH-response). Neither Vm24 nor synthetic Vm24 is toxic to mice when injected at relatively high concentrations (assayed up to 10,000 micrograms per kilogram mouse body weight). These peptides (Vm24 and Vm23) and their functional equivalent analogs with at least 83% of sequence identity are lead compounds, candidates for the treatment of various immunological conditions and diagnostic applications.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AN ANTIREFLECTIVE COATING COMPOSITION COMPRISING FUSED AROMATIC RINGS

exch:abstract.exch:p: The present invention relates to an organic spin coatable anti reflective coating composition comprising a polymer comprising at least one unit with 3 or more fused aromatic rings in the backbone of the polymer and at least one unit with an aliphatic moeity in the backbone of the polymer. The invention further relates to a process for imaging the present composition.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CANCER REMEDY CONTAINING ANTIBODY AGAINST PEPTIDE ENCODED BY EXON-17 OF PERIOSTIN

exch:abstract.exch:p: A medicinal composition for treating cancer which comprises an antibody against a peptide region encoded by Exon-17 of periostin. More specifically speaking, a composition for treating cancer which comprises an anti-periostin antibody capable of recognizing a splicing variant of periostin having an anti-cell adhesion effect, which is expressed specifically in the interstitium of a tissue under reconstruction such as a cancer tissue, or a diagnostic method and a diagnostic for cancer with the use of the anti-periostin antibody as described above.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: POLYCARBONATE RESIN AND METHOD FOR PRODUCING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: Disclosed is a polycarbonate resin containing a structural unit represented by the following formula (1). In the formula (1), R represents one group selected from alkyl groups having 1-9 carbon atoms, aryl groups having 6-12 carbon atoms, alkenyl groups having 2-5 carbon atoms, alkoxy groups having 1-5 carbon atoms, aralkyl groups having 7-17 carbon atoms and halogens; n represents an integer of 0-4 which is the number of substituting R's on the benzene ring; Y represents an alkylene group having 1-4 carbon atoms; and p represents an integer of 0-4.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DIMMING ALGORITHMS BASED UPON LIGHT BLUB TYPE

exch:abstract.exch:p: A lighting control circuit for dimming a light is provided with different algorithms that are utilized to dim fluorescent and incandescent lights. Some method of identifying the type of light which is to be dimmed, reports to a control for the lighting control circuit, and the appropriate algorithm is then selected and utilized.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: XEROGELS MADE FROM AROMATIC POLYUREAS

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to a xerogel comprising: 30 to 90 wt.% of a monomer component (a1) of at least one polyfunctional isocyanate and from10 to 70 wt.% of a monomer component (a2) of at least one polyfunctional aromatic amine, of which at least one is selected from 4,4'-diaminodiphenylmethane, 2,4'-diaminodiphenylmethane, 2,2'-diaminodiphenylmethane and oligomeric diaminodiphenylmethane, wherein the sum of the wt.% of the monomer components (a1) and (a2) is 100 wt.% and the monomer components are present in the xerogel in the polymeric form and the volume-weighted mean pore diameter of the xerogel is a maximum of 5 μm. The invention further relates to a method for production of xerogels, the xerogels obtained thus and the use of said xerogels as insulation and in vacuum insulation panels.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ELECTRODE FOR MEMBRANE ELECTROLYSIS CELLS

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to an electrode for membrane electrolysis cells comprising a grooved metal support favouring the gas release and the electrolyte renewal on its surface. The grooved geometry of the support may be obtained by erosion of a metal sheet with abrasive media in a continuous process.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SECURE CONTAINER WITH PRESSURE RESPONSIVE CONDUIT FOR CLOSURE DISRUPTION

exch:abstract.exch:p: Secure product container (10) has opposed closure shells (10P,10A) forming product chamber (IOC). The shells may be separated into an open accessible state (see FIG. IA), in which the closure shells are uncaptured and product (1OG) is accessible. The closure shells may be placed together in a closed state along closure interface (12C) (see FIG. IB), in which the closure shells are captured to enclose the product. A closure capture between the closure shells holds the shells in the closed state. Closure capture (26) has a secured condition (see FIG. 2B) in which the closure shells are captured together in the closed state, and a released condition (see FIG. 2A) in which the closure shells may be uncaptured in the accessible state. Capture release device (12) on active shell (10A) is pressure responsive for releasing the closure capture from the secured condition into the released condition when pressurized. When depressurized, the release device permits the closure capture to be secure from the released condition into the secured condition. Pressure system (14) (shown in FIG. IA) is in fluid communication with the release device for pressurizing the release device to release the closure capture and uncapture the closure shells. The pressure system also depressurizes the release device to permit securing the closure capture and capturing the closure shells.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MOBILE COMMUNICATION SYSTEM, BASE STATION AND MOBILE TERMINAL

exch:abstract.exch:p: A mobile communication system is provided with a mobile terminal (1), and a base station (2) for relaying communication between a network and the mobile terminal (1), and the mobile communication system performs information distribution from the base station (2) to the mobile terminal (1) by MBMS. The base station (2) sets a flag indicting whether there is urgent information or not to an MBMS control channel, and the mobile terminal (1) is informed of whether there is urgent information or not by the flag contents of the MBMS control channel.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: KINEMATIC CHUCKS FOR RETICLES AND OTHER PLANAR BODIES

exch:abstract.exch:p: Devices are disclosed for holding and moving a planar body such as a reticle (25) as used, for example, in microlithography. An exemplary device includes a stage (12) and a body chuck (10). The stage has a movable support surface (17a, 17b). A proximal region (18a, 18b) of a first membrane (16a, 16b) is mounted to the support surface. A distal region (20a, 20b) of the first membrane extends from the support surface and is coupled to the chuck such that the first membrane at least partially supports the chuck. The chuck includes a surface (28) from wh'ich multiple pins (38,40,44) extend. The surface is situated at the distal region. The pins are arrayed to contact and support a respective region of the body. The pin arrangement is configured such that, during-movements of the chuck imparted by the support surface, body slippage relative to the pins due to forces caused by the movement is substantially uniform at each pin.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HEAT PUMP-TYPE HOT-WATER SUPPLY DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: A heat pump-type hot-water supply device includes a heat source-side heat pump unit having a radiation heat exchanger for radiating heat from refrigerant by condensing the refrigerant. The hot-water supply device further includes a hot-water supply unit having a water tank where water is contained, water supply piping for supplying external water into the water tank, water circulation piping communicating with both a bottom section and an upper section of the water tank and circulating water in the bottom section to the upper section of the water tank in a bypassing manner, an absorption heat exchanger located in the middle of the water circulation piping and joined to the radiation heat exchanger of the heat source-side heat pump unit such that the absorption heat exchanger can absorb heat, and a hot-water supply unit for supplying hot water in the upper section of the water tank to the outside. The water supply piping is branched off into a first water supply route and a second water supply route. The first water supply route supplies, without treatment, the water supplied from the outside into the water tank, and the second water supply route supplies the water from the outside into the water tank after improving the quality of the water by a water quality adjustment unit so that the water does not produce scale. Either or both of the water supply routes are used appropriately depending on the quality of water supplied. As a result, scale deposition is suppressed.

exch:applicant-name.name: E.I. DU PONT DE NEMOURS AND COMPANY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PROCESS FOR FORMING AN ORGANIC LIGHT-EMITTING DIODE AND DEVICES MADE BY THE PROCESS

exch:abstract.exch:p: There is provided a new process for forming a light-emitting diode device having first, second, and third subpixel areas. In the process a hole injection layer is applied over an anode layer. The hole injection material has a conductive polymer and a fluorinated acid polymer. A hole transport layer is applied over the hole injection layer. A first electroluminescent material which is either green or red, is applied to the first subpixel areas. A second electroluminescent material which is either red or green, is applied to the second subpixel areas. A hole-blocking layer is applied overall. A blue electroluminescent material is applied overall, followed by deposition of a cathode. The second electroluminescent material emits a color different from that of the first electroluminescent material.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: TOUCHPAD ASSEMBLY WITH TACTILE FEEDBACK

exch:abstract.exch:p: An assembly for a terminal device, the assembly comprises a frame; a panel operable to receive a haptic user input; a member pivotally connected to the frame to define two or more pivot axes and supporting the panel at locations distinct from the pivot axes, the member being arranged in such a way that the length of a part of the member connecting points on the two pivot axes varies in response to the haptic user input, and such that the panel is displaced relative to the frame as said length varies, and a force sensor operable to detect a haptic input applied to the panel. It also includes a transducer, for instance a piezo actuator, operable to provide a tactile feedback to the user through the panel.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MASHUP COMPONENT ISOLATION VIA SERVER-SIDE ANALYSIS AND INSTRUMENTATION

exch:abstract.exch:p: A method, system, and computer program storage device are disclosed for providing security in a mashup comprised of an agglomeration of a plurality of portlets. These portlets are sent from one or more back-end servers, pass through a portal server, and are received by a client browser. The method comprises the steps of developing an isolation boundary between the portlets to isolate each of the portlets from each of the other portlets, and extending said isolation boundary through the portal server and through the browser. Preferably, the portal server bases the isolation boundary on a server-side static analysis and code instrumentation of the portlets. In the preferred embodiment of the invention, each of the portlets is checked for a number of syntactic constraints and marked with a corresponding service domain. The portlets are aggregated into a page-using HTML, and that page is converted into JavaScript.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HALF-BRIDGE CIRCUITS EMPLOYING NORMALLY ON SWITCHES AND METHODS OF PREVENTING UNINTENDED CURRENT FLOW THEREIN

exch:abstract.exch:p: A method for rendering a half-bridge circuit containing normally on switches such as junction field effect transistors (JFETs) inherently safe from uncontrolled current flow is described. The switches can be made from silicon carbide or from silicon. The methods described herein allow for the use of better performing normally on switches in place of normally off switches in integrated power modules thereby improving the efficiency, size, weight, and cost of the integrated power modules. As described herein, a power supply can be added to the gate driver circuitry. The power supply can be self starting and self oscillating while being capable of deriving all of its source energy from the terminals supplying electrical potential to the normally on switch through the gate driver. The terminal characteristics of the normally on switch can then be coordinated to the input-to-output characteristics of the power supply.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ANISOTROPIC ELECTROCONDUCTIVE MATERIAL, CONNECTION STRUCTURE, AND PROCESS FOR PRODUCING THE CONNECTION STRUCTURE

exch:abstract.exch:p: This invention provides an anisotropic electroconductive material which, when an IC chip or flexible wiring is connected to a wiring board through an anisotropic elctroconductive material, does not cause a difference in continuity resistance between individual bumps and between linear terminals. The anisotropic electroconductive material comprises electroconductive particles dispersed in an insulating binder, has a lowest melt viscosity [η] of 1.0 × 10to 1.0 × 10mPa sec, and satisfies formula (1). 1 < [η]/[η] <= 3 (1) wherein [η] represents thelowest melt viscosity of the anisotropic electroconductive material; [η] represents the melt viscosity at a temperature Twhich is 30°C below a temperature Tat which the melt viscosity is the lowest value.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FLEXIBLE WIRING UNIT AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: When a head unit reciprocates, the front-rear length of the lower surface of a flexible substrate facing a metal base changes. On the facing lower surface of the flexible substrate and the upper surface of the metal base, a nonconductive substrate spacer member having a prescribed board thickness constantly exists in between. Therefore, fluctuation of impedances of the flexible substrate due to variation of capacities with the metal base is maintained within a prescribed range. Thus, a flexible wiring unit, which generates no communication error with a structure wherein the moving head unit is wired by using the flexible substrate, is provided.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COMPOSITION FOR TRANSDERMAL OR TRANSMUCOSAL ADMINISTRATION

exch:abstract.exch:p: [PROBLEMS] To provide a composition for transdermal or transmucosal administration which is useful as an anti-Alzheimer's disease drug, an anti-Parkinson's disease drug, an antidepressant drug, a psychotropic drug, a remedy for drug dependence or the like. [MEANS FOR SOLVING PROBLEMS] A composition for transdermal or transmucosal administration, which contains an effective amount of a racemic body or optically active isomer of 1-(benzofuran-2-yl)-2-propylaminopentane or its pharmacologically acceptable salt and a vehicle and can be administered without invading the skin or mucosa, is excellent as an anti-Alzheimer's disease drug, an anti-Parkinson's disease drug, an antidepressant drug, a psychotropic drug or a remedy for drug dependence, since the composition enables the stable accession of an effective amount of the active ingredient into the body or brain via the skin or mucosa without causing any trouble such as a loss in the active ingredient due to the first pass effect in the liver, a pain, an injury or infection.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: OPTICAL INTERCONNECT

exch:abstract.exch:p: An optical interconnect (100. 300, 400, 500, 600) has a plurality of optical data sources (125, 130, 135, 525, 530, 535), a plutality of optical data receivers (155, 160, 165, 555, 560, 565), a diffractive optical element (186, 320, 440, 670) configured to diffract an optical beam (176, 335, 435, 650) from at least one alignment optical source (170, 360, 460, 625) to at leats one sensor (370, 375, 470, 475, 640, 645), and an aligning element configured to align optical beams (120, 345, 445, 570, 650) from the optical data sources (125, 130, 135, 525, 530, 535) to said optical data receivers (155, 160, 165, 555, 560, 565), according to readings from the sensor (370, 375, 470, 475, 640, 645).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PROCESS FOR PREPARING BENZYL PENTAHYDROXYHEXYLCARBAMOYLUNDECANOATE

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to an improved process for preparing benzyl pentahydroxyhexylcarbamoylundecanoate. Benzyl pentahydroxyhexylcarbamoyl-undecanoate has the formula (I).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR THE PRODUCTION OF A CONDUCTIVE POLYMER COMPOSITE MATERIAL

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to a method for the production of an electrically conductive carbon-nanotube-polymer-composite material with reduced surface resistance, in which a carbon-nanotube-polymer-melt mixture is dispersed in a twin-screw extruder and is then extruded.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THREE DIMENTIONAL IMAGING

exch:abstract.exch:p: A method and apparatus are disclosed for providing image data for constructing an image of a region of a three dimensional target object. The method includes the steps of providing incident radiation, via at least one detector detecting an intensity of radiation scattered by the target object, repositioning incident radiation relative to the target object, subsequently detecting the intensity of radiation scattered by the target object, determining a probe function indicating an estimate of at least one characteristic of the incident radiation at one or more depths of the object and providing image data from which an image of one or more regions of the object may be constructed via an iterative process using the probe function.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ENGINE

exch:abstract.exch:p: In an engine which may show a behavior where an engine speed is not always minimized after compression top dead center of a cylinder in which poor fuel injection occurred, the cylinder in which poor fuel injection occurred is detected. A common rail diesel engine (1) includes a individual reference number-of-revolutions output unit (30) for outputting the individual reference number of revolutions Nstdi of each cylinder corresponding to each injector (3) incident to fuel injection thereof, an engine speed sensor (6) for calculating the individual actual number of revolutions Ni of each cylinder corresponding to each injector (3) incident to fuel injection thereof, and fuel injection failure detection means for judging a cylinder temporarily judged as poor fuel injection as a cylinder of poor fuel injection when the plus and minus by a contrast arithmetic operation unit (80) coincide entirely in each cylinder and the absolute value|Ni'|of the difference in number of revolutions at the time of forced stop means is entirely above the absolute value|Ni|of the difference in the number of revolutions at the time of temporary judgment means.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ENGINE

exch:abstract.exch:p: Means for correcting the quantity of fuel injected into an engine cylinder so as to regulate the number of rotations of each cylinder while reflecting the rotation unevenness unique to the engine cylinder. A common-rail diesel engine (1) is an engine (2) having injectors (3) whose valve open timings can be individually controlled, an individual reference number-of-rotations output unit (30) for outputting the individual reference number-of-rotations Nstdi of the cylinder of each of injectors (3) corresponding to the fuel injection by the injector (3), engine number-of-rotations sensors (6) for detecting the individual actual number-of-rotations Ni of the cylinder of each injector (3) corresponding to the fuel injection by the injector (3), and correction amount calculating unit (50) for calculating the correction amount of the quantity of fuel injected from the injector (3) of the cylinder from the difference between the individual reference number-of-rotations Nstdi stored by the individual reference number-of-rotations output unit (30) and the individual actual number-of-rotations Ni calculated by the engine number-of-rotations sensor (6).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NETWORK ENTITY, TERMINAL, COMPUTER-READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING WIDGETS INCLUDING ADVERTISEMENTS FOR ASSOCIATED WIDGETS

exch:abstract.exch:p: A network entity is provided and includes a processor that is configured to send a first widget to a mobile terminal. The first widget is associated with a second widget, and the mobile terminal is configured to present content of the first widget in a display of the mobile terminal and in a manner including a content item related to the second widget. The processor is therefore also configured to receive, from the mobile terminal, a request for the second widget based on the presentation of content of the first widget including the content item related to the second widget. Further, the processor is configured to send the second widget to the mobile terminal in response to the request, where the mobile terminal is configured to receive the second widget and present content of the second widget in the display.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PIEZOELECTRIC THIN FILM RESONANT ELEMENT AND CIRCUIT COMPONENT USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: A piezoelectric thin film resonant element (1) comprises a resonant portion constituted of a laminate structure of a lower surface electrode (3) having an elliptic planar shape and having an inclined portion (3a) which is inclined at a predetermined angle (for example, about 30°) in the range of 25° to 55° at the periphery, an upper surface electrode (5) having an elliptic planar shape, and a piezoelectric film (4) sandwiched between the electrodes.An addition film (8) is provided on a part of a position in opposition to the inclined portion (3a) of the lower surface electrode (3) of the upper surface electrode (5). Consequently, a laminate layer thickness (H) of a part of a laminate film thickness in the inclined portion (3a) of the lower surface electrode (3) of the resonant portion is thicker than a laminate layer thickness (H) in a portion interior from the inclined portion (3a) of the lower surface electrode (3) of the resonant portion.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BONDING WIRE FOR SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: Provided is a high-function bonding wire, which can suppress wire leaning which occurs directly above a ball and a spring failure and has excellent loop linearity, loop height stability and the like, and thus, is applicable to semiconductor mounting technologies of multilayer chip connection, wire thinning, narrow pitch mounting, and the like. The bonding wire has a core material composed of a conductive metal, and a surface layer having a metal different from the core material as a main component on the core material. The bonding wire for semiconductor devices satisfies the inequality of a/b<=0.7, wherein (a) is an average size of a crystal grain in a circumferential direction on a surface of the surface layer, and (b) is an average size of a crystal grain of the core material on a vertical cross-section of a wire axis.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COATING COMPOSITON FOR METAL THIN FILM, AND LUSTER COMPOSITE COATING FILM PRODUCED FROM THE COATING COMPOSITION

exch:abstract.exch:p: Disclosed is a coating composition for a metal thin film, which can coat a deposited film or a sputtering film provided on the surface of a substrate. The coating composition comprises a coating-film-forming component containing 50 mass% or more of an urethane (meth)acrylate which is a reaction product between hydrogenated xylene diisocyanate and/or hydrogenated diphenylmethane diisocyanate, a polyol and a (meth)acrylate having a hydroxyl group.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR GASIFYING SOLID FUEL AND CONCURRENT GASIFIER

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to a method for gasifying solid fuel in a co-current gasifier having a fuel silo (14) and a combustion chamber (32). The method comprises a pyrolysis phase in which the fuel decomposes into pyrolysis products, and a gasification phase in which the pyrolysis products are gasified into product gas. Heat transfer from the combustion chamber (32) to the fuel silo (14) is restricted in the method. This is to ensure that the fuel does not dry and pyrolysis does not take place in the fuel silo. The beginning of the pyrolysis is intentionally transferred as close to the gasification phase as possible, and an attempt is made to make the duration of the pyrolysis phase as short as possible. The rise of the fuel temperature is slowed down by transferring heat generated in the gasification phase to a medium, such as gasification air. In the co-current gasifier according to the invention, between the fuel silo and the combustion chamber, there is a cooling channel (18), which restricts the transfer of heat and also functions as a preheater for the gasification air. The gasifier has an upper floor (16a), which forms the upper surface of the cooling channel, and a lower floor (16b) forming the lower surface of the cooling channel, and the fuel silo is placed above the upper floor and the combustion chamber below the lower floor. The combustion chamber of the gasifier comprises an internal jacket (34), an intermediate jacket (36), an external jacket (38) and a grate (40). The gasification air is arranged to be conducted to the combustion chamber through a space between the intermediate jacket and the external jacket.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: WARE WASHING SYSTEM CONTAINING POLYSACCHARIDE

exch:abstract.exch:p: A method of washing ware, in particular in an automatic institutional ware washing machine, is disclosed, using a detergent composition containing a polysaccharide, which eliminates the need for a surfactant in the rinse step. The polysaccharide provides a layer of polysaccharide on the ware so as to afford a sheeting action in an aqueous rinse step without any added rinse agent.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD OF MANUFACTURING ADDRESSABLE AND STATIC ELECTRONIC DISPLAYS, POWER GENERATING OR OTHER ELECTRONIC APPARATUS

exch:abstract.exch:p: The present invention provides a method of manufacturing an electronic display, power generating or other electronic apparatus. The exemplary method includes depositing a first conductive medium within a plurality of cavities of a substrate to form a plurality of first conductors. A plurality of electronic components in a suspending medium are then deposited within the plurality of cavities, and the plurality of electronic components are oriented using an applied field, followed by a bonding of the plurality of electronic components to the plurality of first conductors. A second, transmissive conductive medium is then deposited and bonded to the plurality of electronic components.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A COMPENSATING MOULD STACK AND METHOD FOR ALIGNING

exch:abstract.exch:p: According to embodiments of the present invention, there are provided a mold stack, a molding system incorporating same and a method of aligning the mold stack. For example, a mold stack (100, 100a) is provided. The mold stack (100, 100a) comprises a first molding cavity defining component (1702), a second molding cavity defining component (1704) and a third molding cavity defining component (1706), with the second molding cavity defining component (1704) being located, in use, in-between the first molding cavity defining component (1702) and the third molding cavity defining component (1706). At least one of the first molding cavity defining component (1702) and the third molding cavity defining component (1706) is associated with a respective compensator (206, 206a, 702), the respective compensator (206, 206a, 702) configured to allow the at least one of the first molding cavity defining component (1702) and the third molding cavity defining component (1706) to align itself relative to the second molding cavity defining component (1704).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A COMPENSATING CORE FOR USE WITH A MOLDING SYSTEM AND THE MOLDING SYSTEM INCORPORATING SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: Disclosed are a compensating core for use with a molding system and the molding system incorporating same. A core insert (105, 105a, 105b) for use in a molding system is provided. The core insert (105, 105a, 105b) comprises a core base (202, 202a) for defining, in use, a portion of a molding cavity (120); a core support (204, 204a) for supporting, in use, the core base (202, 202a) relative to a core plate of the molding system; a compensator (206, 206a) associated, at least partially, with the core support (204, 204a) to permit at least a degree of axial movement to the core base (202, 202a).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: WIPER DRIVER

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to a wiper drive (1) with an output shaft (2) for securing a wiper arm and with an annular seal (12) which surrounds the output shaft (2) and is arranged supported radially on the inside on the output shaft (2) and radially on the outside on a further component. According to the invention, it is provided that the seal (12) is supported on the drive shaft with two encircling sealing beads (15, 16) which are spaced apart in the axial direction, axially enclose between them an encircling groove (19) and respectively define an inner bearing surface (17, 18).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COMPOSITIONS USEFUL FOR REDUCING NEPHROTOXICITY AND METHODS OF USE THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: The present invention provides compositions and methods to reduce renal damage caused by nephrotoxic drugs. The invention provides compositions comprising an anionically substituted oligosaccharide, a nephrotoxic drug and a pharmaceutically acceptable carrier, where the oligosaccharide is present in an amount effective for substantially inhibiting the nephrotoxic effect of the drug.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR IMPREGNATING CONTINUOUS FIBERS WITH A COMPOSITE POLYMER MATRIX CONTAINING A THERMOPLASTIC POLYMER

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to a method for the impregnation of continuous fibres, that comprises coating said fibres with a polymer matrix containing at least one thermoplastic semi-crystalline polymer having a glass transition temperature (Tg) lower than or equal to 130°C, and nanotubes of at least one chemical element selected from the elements of the columns IIIa, IVa and Va of the periodic table. The invention also relates to the composite fibres that can be obtained by said method, and to the use thereof.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THIN FILM TREATMENT APPARATUS

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to a thin film treatment apparatus (8) comprising a rotor (16) having at least one cylindrical section (26), at least one wiping blade (32, 33, 34, 35, 36, 41) being arranged on said cylindrical section, said wiping blade comprising at least two teeth (42, 43, 44, 42', 43', 44'), which is characterized in that at least part of the teeth (42, 43, 44, 42', 43 ', 44') form an angle α towards the vertical direction which is more than 0° the mean angle αof all the teeth being less than 14°.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THIN FILM TREATMENT APPARATUS

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to a thin film treatment apparatus (8) comprising a rotor (16) having at least one cylindrical section (26), at least one wiping blade (32, 33, 34, 35, 36, 41) being arranged on said cylindrical section, said wiping blade comprising at least two teeth (42, 43, 44, 42', 43', 44'), which is characterized in that the thickness (T) of the wiping blade or the teeth (42,43,44,42',43 ',44'), respectively, is more than 5 mm.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR THE DETERMINATION OF AQUEOUS POLYMER CONCENTRATION IN WATER SYSTEMS

exch:abstract.exch:p: The concentration of an anionically charged polymer in an aqueous solution is determined with a thin solid film having a polymer matrix and a cationic dye. A sample of an aqueous solution containing at least one anionically charged polymer to be tested is applied to the film sensor. The absorbance of the film sensor is measured after the sample has been applied. The absorbance of the film sensor is then compared with a calibration curve of the absorbance of samples containing known concentrations of the anionically charged polymers to determine the concentration of anionically charged polymer in the sample.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CONNECTION BASE INTERACTING WITH AN ADAPTER FOR FORMING THEREWITH A MECHANICAL CONNECTOR FOR THE WIPER BLADE FOR AN AUTOMOBILE

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to a connection base (1) for carrying a wiping blade and to be attached to an adapter (5) that can be connected to an actuation arm for forming with said adapter (5) a mechanical connector for a wiper blade for an automobile, the adapter (5) having an elongated shape with first (7) and second (9) ends, characterised in that it comprises a retaining linear guide (27, 29) for the first end (7) of the adapter and removable attachment means (13) of the second end (9) supported on the one hand by the adapter and on the other hand by the base (1). The invention also relates to a conform adapter (5), to a mechanical connector formed by the adapter and the connection base, to a planar wiper blade and to a wiping device.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A REGIOSELECTIVE COPPER CATALYZED SYNTHESIS OF BENZIMIDAZOLES AND AZABENZIMIDAZOLES

exch:abstract.exch:p: The present invention relates to a process for the regioselective synthesis of compounds of the formula (I), wherein R0; R1; R2; R3; R4; R5; A1; A2; A3; A4; Q and J have the meanings indicated in the claims. The present invention provides a direct copper catalyzed regioselective process to a wide variety of unsymmetrical, multifunctional/-substituted benzimidazoles or azabenzimidazoles of formula I starting from 2-halo-nitroarenes and/-substituted amides. The process is useful for the production of pharmaceuticals, diagnostic agents, liquid crystals, polymers, herbicides, fungicidals, nematicidals, parasiticides, insecticides, acaricides and arthropodicides.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MECHANICAL METHODS FOR CHARGING A CAR BATTERY, RELATED SYSTEMS AND INFRASTRUCTURE

exch:abstract.exch:p: The methods, system, and infrastructure described herein relate to charging a rechargeable battery of a vehicle The method described includes the steps (a) while the vehicle is stationary, rotating a shaft of an electric traction motor of the vehicle using mechanical energy, (b) converting rotational into electrical energy using the electric traction motor as an electrical generator, and (c) storing electrical energy in the rechargeable battery A system descnbed for charging a rechargeable battery of a vehicle includes a rechargeable battery, an electric traction motor, and an external vehicle interface configured to rotate the shaft of the electric traction motor using mechanical power while the vehicle is stationary An infrastructure descnbed for charging a rechargeable battery of a vehicle includes one or more charging stations, each station including an external vehicle interface configured to rotate a shaft of an electric traction motor using mechanical power while the vehicle is stationary.

exch:applicant-name.name: E.I. DU PONT DE NEMOURS AND COMPANY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HOLE TRANSPORT MATERIALS

exch:abstract.exch:p: There is proviced a hole transport compound having Formula I or Formula II: (Ar)N-Ar-[T]-ArN(Ar)Formula I (Ar)N-Ar-[T]-Ar-N-Ar[T]-Ar-N(Ar)Formula II Aris the same or different at each occurrence and can be phenylene, naphthylene, or binaphthylene. Aris the same or different at each occurrence and can be phenyl, biphenyl, terphenyl, naphthyl, or binaphthyl. m and n are the same or different and are an integer greater than 0. T is the same or different at each occurrence and is a conjugated moiety including at least one triarylamino group. The T moiety is connected in a non-planar configuration.

exch:applicant-name.name: KABUSHIKI KAISHA HAYASHIBARA SEIBUTSU KAGAKU KENKYUJO

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NOVEL FRACTIONATION PRODUCT OF ROYAL JELLY, METHOD FOR PRODUCTION OF THE SAME, AND USE OF THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: Disclosed are: a fractionation product of royal jelly, which still retains a useful physiological activity of royal jelly and has little concerns that an allergic condition may be induced; a method for producing the fractionation product; and use of the fractionation product in various compositions including a food/beverage, an animal feed, a fish bait, a pet food and an external preparation for the skin such as a cosmetic product each containing the fractionation product. Specifically disclosed are: a fractionation product of royal jelly, which comprises 1 part by mass of 10-hydroxy-2-decenoic acid and less than 0.05 part by mass of a protein derived from royal jelly, which has a useful physiological activity of royal jelly, and which has such a property that no allergenicity against the fractionation product is detected by the passive cutaneous anaphylaxis on a rat using a serum from a mouse immunized with such an amount of the fractionation product that 45 μg of 10-hydroxy-2-decenoic acid is contained in the fractionation product; a method for producing the fractionation product; and use of the fractionation product.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ULTRASONIC GAS CONCENTRATION MEASURING METHOD AND DEVICE USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: An ultrasonic gas concentration measuring device includes two ultrasonic vibrators which transmit and receive ultrasonic waves, a temperature sensor, and a pressure sensor which are arranged to oppose to each other in a pipe where a sample gas flows. The device further includes concentration calculation means for calculating a sample gas concentration according to a propagation velocity correction coefficient based on a pressure. Thus, it is possible to provide a method and a device which can accurately measure a gas concentration regardless of the pressure of the sample gas.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ACTIVATED BASE METAL CATALYSTS

exch:abstract.exch:p: Nitro-compounds are hydrogenated with an activated Ni catalyst that has an average particle size (APS) less than 25 μm and is doped with one or more elements from the list of Mg, Ce, Ti, V, Nb, Cr, W, Mn, Re, Fe, Ru, Co, Rh, Ir, Pt, Cu, Ag, Au and Bi via its/their addition to the alloy before activation and/or doped with one or more elements from the list of Mg, Ce, Ti, V, Nb, Cr, W, Mn, Re, Fe, Ru, Co, Rh, Ir, Ni, Cu, Ag, Au and Bi by their adsorption onto the surface of the activated catalyst. This invention also includes the hydrogenation of nitro-compounds with an activated Ni catalyst that has and APS less than 20 μm and is doped with one or more elements from the list of Mg, Ce, Ti, V, Nb, Cr, W, Mn, Re, Fe, Ru, Co, Rh, Ir, Pt, Pd, Mo, Cu, Ag, Au and Bi via its/their addition to the alloy before activation and/or doped with one or more elements from the list of Mg, Ce, Ti, V, Nb, Cr, W, Mn, Re, Fe, Ru, Co, Rh, Ir, Ni, Cu, Pd, Pt, Mo, Ag, Au and Bi by their adsorption onto the surface of the activated catalyst.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ACTIVATED BASE METAL CATALYSTS

exch:abstract.exch:p: Nitro-compounds are hydrogenated with an activated Ni catalyst whose Ni/Al alloy also contained one or more elements from the list of Cu, Ag and Au prior to activation. In combination with the Group IB elements mentioned above, this catalyst can also be doped with other elements via their addition to the Ni/Al alloy prior to activation and/or they can be adsorbed onto the surface of the catalyst either during or after the activation of the alloy. The suitable doping elements for the alloy prior to activation in combination with the group IB elements mentioned above are one or more of the elements from the list of Mg, Ti, Ce, Cr, V, Mo, W, Mn, Re, Fe, Co, Ir, Ru, Rh, Pd, Pt and Bi. The suitable doping elements that may be adsorbed onto the surface of the catalyst that was previously doped in the alloy prior to activation with the group IB elements mentioned above are one or more elements from the list Mg, Ca, Ba, Ti, Ce, V, Cr, Mo, W, Mn, Re, Fe, Ru, Co, Rh, Ir, Pd, Pt, Ni, Cu, Ag, Au and Bi.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD, APPARATUS AND COMPUTER PROGRAM PRODUCT FOR PROVIDING AN OBJECT SELECTION MECHANISM FOR DISPLAY DEVICES
