exch:abstract.exch:p: An apparatus for providing an object selection mechanism for touch screen devices may include a processing element. The processing element may be configured to receive an indication of a detection of an event associated with a display, determine a type of the event, determine a candidate object associated with the type of the event, and generate a user interface component based on the determination of the candidate object.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ACTIVATED BASE METAL CATALYSTS

exch:abstract.exch:p: Nitro-compounds are hydrogenated with an activated Ni catalyst that is doped during and/or after activation with one or more elements from the list of Mg, Ca, Ba, Ti, Zr, Ce, Nb, Cr, Mo, W, Mn, Re, Fe, Co, Ir, Ni, Cu, Ag, Au, Rh, Ru and Bi whereas the Ni/Al alloy may not, but preferentially can contain prior to activation one or more doping elements from the list of Ti, Ce, V, Cr, Mo, W, Mn, Re, Fe, Ru, Co, Rh, Ir, Pd, Pt and Bi. If the Ni/Al alloy contained one or more of the above mentioned suitable alloy doping elements prior to activation, the resulting catalyst can then be doped with one or more of the elements from the list of Mg, Ca, Ba, Ti, Zr, Ce, V, Nb, Cr, Mo, W, Mn, Re, Fe, Ru, Co, Rh, Ir, Ni, Pd, Pt, Cu, Ag, Au and Bi by their adsorption onto the surface of the catalyst.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR DETERMINING A CONTROL PARAMETER FOR A FUEL INJECTOR OF AN INTERNAL COMBUSTION ENGINE

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to a method for determining a control parameter for a fuel injector of an internal combustion engine. The problem of enabling more precise determination of the control parameter, even if the fuel pressure (FUP) present on the fuel injector varies, is solved in that the fuel pressure (FUP) present on the fuel injector during the injection (I1, I2, I1', I1'') is concluded while allowing for the time of the fuel pressure value detection and/or the crankshaft angle position of the internal combustion engine during the detection of the fuel pressure value, and that the control parameter is determined based on the fuel pressure (FUP) that was concluded. The invention further relates to a corresponding device.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: VESICLE USEFUL FOR EXTERNAL PREPARATION FOR SKIN, AND EXTERNAL PREPARATION FOR SKIN COMPRISING THE VESICLE

exch:abstract.exch:p: Disclosed is a technique for allowing an active ingredient as an agent for improving or maintaining the dermal environment to reach a dermis. Specifically disclosed is a vesicle comprising the following components 1) to 3): 1) an α,ε-bis(γ-N-(C)acylglutamyl)lysine and/or a salt thereof; 2) ceramide and/or a derivative thereof; and 3) one or more members selected from a glycerin fatty acid ester, a polyglycerin fatty acid ester and a pyroglutamic acid glycerin fatty acid ester. The acyl group in the α,ε-bis(γ-N-(C)acylglutamyl)lysine is preferably a lauroyl group. The ceramide or the derivative thereof is preferably ceramide type-2 or-3. The vesicle can enclose an active ingredient. The vesicle can be contained in an external preparation for the skin.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CLIENT DEVICE, SERVER DEVICE, AND PROGRAM

exch:abstract.exch:p: If a client device (100) receives a message containing a random number from a server device (200) during a handshake of an agreement process, the client device (100) creates a biometric authentication negotiation message containing biometric authentication method information and transmits the biometric authentication negotiation message to the server device. After this, the client device (100) executes biometric authentication according to the reported biometric authentication method information and encrypts the random number by a secret key. Moreover, the client device (100) generates an authenticator from the biometric authentication method information, the encrypted random number, and the client certificate as a result of the biometric authentication and transmits an authentication context containing these to a server device (200). The server device (200) verifies the authentication text and establishes a secure session by one handshake.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD OF BROADCASTING SYSTEM INFORMATION IN COMMUNICATION CELLS FOR HANDOFF

exch:abstract.exch:p: A method of operating a network infrastructure entity (100) in which a mobile communication device (102) is capable of handover from a first wireless communication network (107) to a second wireless communication network (112) is described. System information of the second wireless communication network (112) is broadcast, over a control channel of the first wireless communication network (107), to a plurality of mobile stations (102) communicating with the first wireless communication network. The system information includes a system time of the second wireless communication network (112) measured at a predefined time point of a frame structure of the first wireless communication network (107) and at a transmitter of the first wireless communication network (107). The system information may further include neighbor cell information and slot offset of control channel.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MEMBRANE CLEANING USING AN AIRLIFT PUMP

exch:abstract.exch:p: A membrane module (5) comprising a plurality of porous membranes (6), a gas-lift pump apparatus (11) in fluid communication with the module (5) for providing a two-phase gas/liquid flow such that, in use, the two-phase gas/liquid flow moves past the surfaces of the membranes (6) to dislodge fouling materials therefrom. The gas-lift pump device (11) includes: a vertically disposed chamber (12) of predetermined dimensions submersed to a predetermined depth in a liquid medium (15), wherein the chamber (12) has an upper portion (10) in fluid communication with the membrane module (5) and a lower portion (13) in fluid communication with the liquid medium (15); a source of gas (14) in fluid communication with the chamber (12) at a predetermined location therein for flowing gas at a predetermined rate into the chamber (12) to produce the two-phase gas/liquid mixture and to produce a flow of the mixture into the membrane module (5). The dimensions of the chamber (12), the submersion depth of the chamber (12), the rate of flow of gas and the location of gas flow into the chamber (12) are selected to optimize a flow rate of the two phase gas/liquid mixture into the module (5).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHODS AND APPARATUS FOR IMPROVED UTILIZATION OF AIR LINK RESOURCES IN A WIRELESS COMMUNICATIONS SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: Methods and apparatus for improving the utilization of air link resources in a wireless communications system, e.g., an OFDM MIMO system, including a base station with multiple transmit antennas are described. Superposition signaling in the downlink is employed. The superimposed signal includes a first transform result signal and a second lower power signal. The first transform result signal is generated from a first signal, which uses position modulation, e.g., including null components and high power non-null components. Different components of the first transform result signal are directed to different transmit antennas. The first transform result signal communicates information to a first wireless terminal, e.g., a weak receiver. The non-null received elements of the first transform result signal are utilized by a second wireless terminal, e.g., a superior receiver, as pilots to determine a channel estimate. The second wireless terminal uses the determined channel estimate to demodulate received second signals.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: 3-CYCLOPROPYL-4-(3-THIOBENZOYL)PYRAZOLES AND THEIR USE AS HERBICIDES

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to 3-cyclopropyl-4-(3-thiobenzoyl)pyrazoles of general formula (I) and to their use as herbicides. In formula (I), R, R, R, X and Y represent groups such as hydrogen and organic groups such as alkyl. Rrepresents hydrogen or a protecting group such as tosyl.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MICRO-ELECTROMECHANICAL SYSTEM BASED SELECTIVELY COORDINATED PROTECTION SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR ELECTRICAL DISTRIBUTION

exch:abstract.exch:p: Electrical distribution systems implementing micro-electromechanical system based switching devices. Exemplary embodiments include a method in an electrical distribution system, the method including determining if there is a fault condition in a branch (211-213) of the electrical distribution system, the branch having a plurality of micro electromechanical system (MEMS) switches, re-closing a MEMS switch of the plurality of MEMS switches (215-217), which is furthest upstream in the branch and determining if the fault condition is still present. Exemplary embodiments include an electrical distribution system, including an input port for receiving a source of power, a main distribution bus electrically coupled to the input port, a service disconnect MEMS switch disposed between and coupled to the input port and the main distribution bus and a plurality of electrical distribution branches electrically coupled to the main distribution bus.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BIAXIALLY ORIENTED POLYESTER FILM FOR AUTOMOBILE DRIVING MOTOR AND ELECTRICALLY INSULATING MEMBER COMPOSED OF THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: Disclosed is a biaxially oriented polyester film for automobile driving motors, which has high hydrolysis resistance required for insulating films for automobile driving motors in addition to dimensional stability against heat. This biaxially oriented polyester film for automobile driving motors is excellent in delamination characteristics.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FILTER INCLUDING ELECTROSTATICALLY CHARGED FIBER MATERIAL

exch:abstract.exch:p: Provided is a cigarette filter and method for potentially reducing particle breakthrough. The filter 10 includes an adsorbent 12 including adsorbent particles dispersed within the filter and a plug 14 of electrostatically charged fibers. Preferably, the adsorbent is activated carbon. In a preferred embodiment, the electrostatically charged fiber material is located downstream of the activated carbon. Preferably, the electrostatically charged fiber material has permanent electrostatic charges that electrostatically capture the carbon particles to reduce carbon particle breakthrough. In an embodiment, the electrostatically charged fiber material is randomly oriented so as to mechanically capture particles entrained in mainstream smoke. Also provided are a method of making the filter, a smoking article incorporating the filter, a method of making the smoking article and a method of treating mainstream tobacco smoke.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHODS OF FABRICATING METAL CONTACT STRUCTURES FOR LASER DIODES USING BACKSIDE UV EXPOSURE

exch:abstract.exch:p: Methods of fabricating a metal contact structure for a laser diodes are provided, wherein the method comprises providing a UV transparent semiconductor substrate, a UV transparent semiconductor epilayer defining a ridge disposed between etched epilayer edges, the epilayer being disposed over the UV transparent semiconductor substrate, and a UV opaque metal layer disposed over the epilayer ridge, applying at least one photoresist layer (positive photoresist, image reversal photoresist, or negative photoresist) over the opaque metal layer and epilayer edges, and selectively developing regions of the photoresist layer via backside exposure to UV light with the opaque metal layer used as a photolithographic mask.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CONTROLS AND DISPLAYS FOR ACQUIRING PREFERENCES, INSPECTING BEHAVIOR, AND GUIDING THE LEARNING AND DECISION POLICIES OF AN ADAPTIVE COMMUNICATIONS PRIORITIZATION AND ROUTING SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A user interface for managing electronic messages, a method for transmitting messages, a method for transmitting the messages to devices and a user interface for determination of adaptive priority and a routing system are provided to offer the messages after automatically setting priorities to the messages, thereby saving message receiving time. CONSTITUTION: A priority system(30) receives a plurality of messages(34). If the messages are received as audio phone message, the priority system or a user interface(20) calls a voice recognizer. After the messages are received, the priority system classifies the messages to determine priority values related to urgency or priority.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD OF PROVIDING E-BOOK SERVICE UTILIZING TEXT INFORMATION AND SYSTEM THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for providing an electronic book service using text information and a system thereof are provided to transmit a request after including the text information corresponding texts included in a document, thereby efficiently providing an electronic book register function. CONSTITUTION: A printer monitoring module(162) recognizes a print job of a virtual print processed by a print command. A printed document image generating module(164) generates a printed document image corresponding to a document. A printed document text information extracting module(165) extracts printed document text information.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ASSISTANT INSTRUMENT FOR SURGICAL OPERATION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An auxiliary instrument is provided to minimize damage to a skin in a surgery by firmly supporting the skin of a patient. CONSTITUTION: A secondary instrument for operation supports a skin of a surgical patient. The instrument forms the operation space between the skin and organization. The instrument comprises a steering wheel(10), a body(14), a skin holder(20), and a driving part. The body is connected to the steering wheel. The skin holder part is connected to the body. The skin holder part supports the skin. The driving part applies the power to the skin holder.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LASER PROCESSING APPARATUS AND METHOD USING BEAM SPLIT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A laser processing apparatus using laser beam division and a method thereof is provided to minimize a physical point power resistance from a low dielectric material during an additional process by completely removing a remaining amount of low dielectric material. CONSTITUTION: A laser processing apparatus comprises a laser generator(120) and a lens unit. The lens unit divides a laser beam radiated from the laser generator into more than two beams. The lens unit is composed of two lenses. Cross sections of the two lenses contact with each other. The cross sections of the two lenses are arranged in parallel.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SCANNER OPTICAL SYSTEM OF MULTILAYERED PRISM TYPE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An optical system for a scanner is provided to reduce space by forming a plurality of prisms to be overlapped using total reflection. CONSTITUTION: A lamp(301) transfers light to a document(300). A prism lens(302) transfers light source in which a lamp is radiated and reflected to a lens(304). The lens forms light passing by the prism lens to a charge-coupled device element(305). The charge-coupled device element changes an optical signal into an electric signal.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: TAPPING SCREW

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A tapping screw is provided to obtain a strong fastening force of the screw by forming a cut shape in a screw thread, and by forming the diameter and the external diameter of the screw thread identically. CONSTITUTION: A method of manufacturing a tapping screw comprises the following steps: processing a first moldable material by forging a head unit(21) using a forging of a material supplied in a wire form; molding a screw unit(22) with a moving and fixing die to the outer circumference of a body of the first moldable material; and cutting the material with a cutting protrusion formed in the moving and fixing die.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SEMICONDUCTOR LIGHT EMITTING DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A semiconductor light emitting device is provided to decentralize current between a semiconductor layer and a reflection electrode layer by forming a patterned ohmic layer between the reflection electrode layer and the semiconductor layer. CONSTITUTION: A conductive layer(151) is formed in the lower part of a reflection electrode layer(155). A first conductivity semiconductor layer(110), an active layer(120) and a second conductivity semiconductor layer(130) are formed in the lower part of the reflection electrode layer and the conductive layer. A conductivity supporting member(160) is formed on the reflection electrode layer. An ohmic layer is formed between the reflection electrode layer and the light emitting structure. The conductive layer comprises at least one among a conductive type metal, a ITO(Indium Tin Oxide), a IZO(Indium zinc oxide) and an AZO(Aluminum-doped Zinc Oxide).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A SOLAR PHOTOVOLTAIC GENERATOR WITH VERTICAL ROTATION CONTROL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A solar electric generator with vertical rotation control member is provided to maximize the safety of a solar power generation module by dispersing the load of a module frame. CONSTITUTION: A vertical rotation control member(400) is supported with a first sub-poster. The first sub-poster is combined in a main poster(100) with a hinge. The vertical rotation control member is combined in a module frame(350) with the hinge. The module frame is easily controlled with the vertical rotation control member.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A SOLAR PHOTOVOLTAIC GENERATOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A solar electricity generator is provided to improve the safety of a solar power generation module by dispersing the load of a module frame using a main poster and horizontal and vertical rotation control members. CONSTITUTION: A solar electricity generator comprises a vertical rotation control member(400), a center module frame(300), a main poster(100), a horizontal rotation control member and a control member(900). The main poster is vertically fixed on the ground. A main shaft is on the center of a center module frame locating on the top of the main post. A first sub-poster is connected to the main poster. The vertical rotation control member rotates a module frame(350) up and down according to position changing of the sun. The horizontal rotation control member is connected to the main poster through a second sub-poster. The horizontal rotation control member rotates module frame right and left according to position changing of the sun. The control member controls vertical rotation control member to face to a solar power generation module. A drive motor rotates the vertical rotation control member.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A SOLAR PHOTOVOLTAIC GENERATOR WITH HORIZONTAL ROTATION CONTROL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A solar photovoltaic generator is provided to prevent twisting, deflection, and shaking of a module frame by combining a horizontal rotation control unit to the module frame with a hinge. CONSTITUTION: A solar photovoltaic generator comprises a horizontal rotation control unit(500) which is supported with a second sub poster(750). A second sub poster is combined with a main poster(100) through a hinge(600). An arm(800) with the hinge is installed on the upper end of the horizontal rotation control unit. The horizontal rotation control unit rotates in 360°C in order to easily control a module frame(350).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A SOLAR PHOTOVOLTAIC GENERATOR WITH 360°C ROTATABLE ARM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A solar photovoltaic generator is provided to efficiently focus solar energy by meeting with the sunlight at a right angle by rotating an arm in 360°. CONSTITUTION: A solar photovoltaic generator comprises a fixing plate and an arm(800). A protrusion(810) inserted to a guide groove is formed in the inner side of the fixing plate. The fixing plate is fixed to the outside of a center module frame. The arm comprises a hinge shaft(820). The hinge shaft can rotate through one side of the fixing plate.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THE TEXTILE WHERE THE EXPRESS BRIGHTNESS COLOR WHICH IS PRODUCED WITH THE DYEING DEVICE WHICH EXPRESSES AN EXPRESS BRIGHTNESS COLOR AND THAT DYEING DEVICE IS EXPRESSED

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A dyeing apparatus capable of improving brightness of textile and textiles processed with the same apparatus are provided to improve quality of the textile by improving the brightness of the surface or the rear surface of the textiles. CONSTITUTION: A dyeing apparatus capable of improving brightness of textile includes a rotating body and a dyeing container. The rotating body includes a cylindrical printing roller(11), a shaft(12) and a roller unit. The printing roller is made of rubber, metals or synthetic resin. The dye is spread on the outer circumference of the printing roller. The dyeing container includes a plurality of partitions(21), a receiving space(22) and a dye supply opening(23).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: TIRE CUTTING APPARATUS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A tire cutting device is provided to reduce volume and weight when a waste tire is kept by effectively cutting waste tires using a blade and a fixing jig. CONSTITUTION: A tire cutting device comprises a main body(11), a blade(13), tire fixing guide plates(14), and a securing jig(16). The main body comprises a tire loading space part(10). The blade is installed on one side of the tire loading space part. The blade cuts the tires, reciprocating forward and backward due to a hydraulic cylinder. The tire fixing guide plate holds both sides of the tire. The securing jig supports the opposite side of the tire. The securing jig has a groove(15).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SPREADER FOR IMPLANT SURGERY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A spreader for an implant operation is provided to lift a sinus membrane vertically and more widely, to reduce the operational time and cost, and to provide convenience and safety to a user. CONSTITUTION: A spreader for an implant operation comprises: a connection unit(20) formed on the upper side of a body(10) to be connected with a drive unit; and a lifting unit(30) formed in the lower side of the body to divide and lift a sinus membrane. The lifting unit comprises the following: a pillar unit(31) extended from the body while being formed in the same central rotation axis to the body; and a protrusion(32) projected to one side from the pillar unit while being formed on the same surface of an end surface(31a) of the pillar unit. The protrusion comprises a base part with the same thickness of the diameter of the pillar unit. The thickness of the protrusion gets thinner to the end.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: WIRELESS MOBILE PHONE RECHAGER HOLDER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cellular phone receipt box is provided to prevent damage to a cellular phone by attaching a wireless charging pad to a receipt box. CONSTITUTION: A cellular phone receipt box with a wireless charger performs a cellular phone acceptance function and a wireless charge function. A wireless charge pad is attached to the cellular phone receipt box. The receipt box is suitable for the vehicle.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DEVICE FOR CONNECTING A WIPER BLADE TO A WIPER ARM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A connection apparatus of a wiper arm and a wiper blade is provided to be used regardless of the form of the wiper arm by comprising components which can be used in various shapes of the wiper arm. CONSTITUTION: A connection apparatus of a wiper arm and a wiper blade comprises a first adapter(140), a second adapter(250), and an adapter connecting member(260). The first adapter is fixed on a wiper blade(110). The first adapter comprises a joint(130), first lateral walls(141,142), and a first upper wall. A pivot axis(131) is formed on the joint. The second adapter comprises second side walls(251,252) and a second upper wall(253). The second adapter is installed on the first adapter.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CODEBOOK GENERATING METHOD FOR MULTI-POLARIZED MIMO SYSTEM AND DEVICE OF ENABLING THE METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A codebook generation method for -polarized MIMO(Multi-Input Multi-Output) and a device for the same are provided to generate a pre-coding matrix when antennas have multi-polarization through single polarized pre-coding matrix, thereby generating the pre-coding matrix with superior performance. CONSTITUTION: A single polarized pre-coding matrix is allocated in a diagonal block(S210). A zero matrix is allocated to remaining blocks (S220). By combination of the single polarized pre-coding matrix and the zero matrix, a pre-coding matrix is generated(S230). According to transmission rank, at least one column vector is selected(S240). A rotation free coding matrix is generated(S250). The phase of elements is controlled(S260). The elements are included in the pre-coding matrix.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CODEBOOK GENERATING METHOD FOR MULTI-POLARIZED MIMO SYSTEM AND DEVICE OF ENABLING THE METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A codebook generation method for a multi-polarized MIMO(Multi-Input Multi-Output) system and a device for the same are provided to reconstruct pre-coding matrix according to transmission rank, thereby efficiently offering a codebook. CONSTITUTION: A single polarized pre-coding matrix allocation unit(510) assigns single polarized pre-coding matrix to diagonal blocks. A zero matrix allocation unit(520) assigns zero matrix to remaining blocks. A pre-coding matrix generation unit(530) generates a pre-coding matrix. According to transmission rank, a pre-coding matrix reconfiguration unit(540) reconstructs the pre-coding matrix by selection of one or more column vectors. A phase shift unit(560) controls phase of the elements of the reconstructed matrix.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COMPOSITION FOR REDUCING THE EXUDATION OF SERUM PROTEINS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A composition containing di-saturated phospholipid is provided to reduce mucosa exudation and skin serumproteins and treat lung diseases and atopic dermatitis. CONSTITUTION: A cosmetic composition contains di-saturation phospholipid as an active ingredient. The di-saturated phospholipid is isolated from porcine or portcine. The di-phospholipid is dipalmitoylphoaphatidyl and/or dipalmitoylphosphayyl. The composition further contains organic acid containing calcium and a carboxy group. The organic acid containing is the carboxy group lactic acid, succina acid, fumaric acid or citric acid. The composition further contains glycerol.

exch:applicant-name.name: INDUSTRY FOUNDATION OF CHONNAM NATIONAL UNIVERSITY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FIBROUS ADSORBENT AND MANUFACTURING METHOD FOR VOC ABSORBENT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A fibrous adsorbent for adsorbing a volatile organic compound and a method for manufacturing the adsorbent are provided to appropriately control a pore of fiber and adsorption quantity of the volatile organic compound. CONSTITUTION: A fibrous adsorbent for adsorbing a volatile organic compound comprises: a step of manufacturing a fiber precursor composition by adding 0.1 ~ 5 weight% of manganese precursor after dissolve polyacrylo nitrile resin into a solvent; a step of manufacturing the fiber through an electric radiation by adding 20 ~ 30kV voltage using the fiber precursor composition; a step of increasing a temperature of the fiber to 250 ~ 300°C and oxidation-stabilizing the fiber under air atmosphere for 0.5 ~ 3 hours; a step of carbonizing the oxidation-stabilized fiber to 800 ~ 1000°C in inert atmosphere or a vacuum condition; and a step of activating the carbonized fiber at 600 ~ 800°C and steam atmosphere.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MICROLITHOGRAPHY PROJECTION OPTICAL SYSTEM, METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING A DEVICE AND METHOD TO DESIGN AN OPTICAL SURFACE

exch:abstract.exch:p: In general, in one aspect, the invention features a microlithography projection optical system (101) that includes a plurality of elements (310-360) arranged to image radiation from an object plane (103) to an image plane (102), at least one of the elements being a reflective element that has a rotationally asymmetric surface positioned in a path of the radiation. The rotationally asymmetric surface deviates from a rotationally symmetric surface by about 10 nm or more and the optical system is a microlithography projection optical system.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THERAPEUTIC OR PROPHYLACTIC AGENT FOR CEREBRAL ANEURYSM

exch:abstract.exch:p: [PROBLEMS] To provide a medicinal agent which is effective for the treatment and prevention of cerebral aneurysm. [MEANS FOR SOLVING PROBLEMS] Disclosed is a therapeutic or prophylactic agent for cerebral aneurysm, which comprises a cysteine protease inhibitor as an active ingredient. The cysteine protease inhibitor is preferably an epoxysuccinic acid amide derivative or a salt thereof.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: GAME DEVICE, GAME PROCESSING METHOD, INFORMATION RECORDING MEDIUM, AND PROGRAM

exch:abstract.exch:p: A game device (200) includes: a storage unit (201) which stores a position or a player character, a position of an enemy character, an elapse time which has elapsed after the appearance of the enemy character, and a candidate of a position where a new enemy character is to appear; a measurement unit (202) which measures the elapse time after the appearance of the enemy character and causes the storage unit (201) to store the elapse time; a calculation unit (203) which calculates a reference distance serving as a judgment reference of the position where the new enemy character to appear according to the stored elapse time, wherein the reference distance monotonously increases as the elapse time increases; and an appearance setting unit (204) which selects one of the candidates stored in the storage unit (201) which candidate exists at such a distance from the player character that is the nearest to the reference distance and makes a new enemy character appear at the selected candidate position.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SLOW RELEASE PHARMACEUTICAL COMPOSITION MADE OF MICROPARTICLES

exch:abstract.exch:p: Pharmaceutical composition made of microparticles for the slow release of an active substance at least during a period covering the 6th month after injection of said composition, said composition comprising a group of microparticles made of a copolymer of the PLGA type which incorporate an active substance in the form of a water insoluble peptide salt; said copolymer furthermore comprising at least 75 % of lactic acid and an inherent viscosity between 0.1 and 0.9 dl/g, as measured in chloroform at 25 °C and at a polymer concentration of 0.5 g/dL; said microparticles furthermore having a size distribution defined as follows :-D (v,0.1) is between 10 and 30 micrometers,-D (v,0.5) is between 30 and 70 micrometers,-D(v,0.9) is between 50 and 1 10 micrometers.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR PERFORMING MEDIA INDEPENDENT HANDOVER MEASUREMENT AND REPORTING

exch:abstract.exch:p: The method and apparatus are used for media independent handover (MIH) measurement and reporting in wireless communications. A periodicity for measurement and reporting is set on the MIH function through an MIH protocol message or an MIH_SAP primitive and on the link layer device through an MIH_LINK_SAP primitive. A new MIH_SAP primitive, MIH protocol message or MIH_LINK_SAP primitive is added to configure the periodicity. A new information element (IE) field for measurement reporting period may be added.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THERMAL SURGERY SAFETY APPARATUS AND METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: A laser surgical method is disclosed including: providing a laser surgical device including a handpiece including: an optical delivery component that transmits laser energy from a source to a treatment volume; and an accelerometer configured to provide information indicative of the position of the handpiece. The method includes using the handpiece to transmit laser energy from the source to a plurality of positions within the treatment volume; using the accelerometer, providing information indicative of the position of the handpiece; determining information indicative of an amount of energy delivered at each of the plurality of positions within the treatment volume based on the information indicative of the position of the handpiece, and displaying a graphical representation indicative of the amount of energy delivered at each of the plurality of positions within the treatment volume.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: TRANSPORT FORMAT COMBINATION SELECTION IN A WIRELESS TRANSMIT/RECEIVE UNIT

exch:abstract.exch:p: A method for selecting a transport format combination (TFC) in a wireless transmit/receive unit (WTRU) is disclosed. The WTRU is configured to process more than one coded composite transport channel (CCTrCH) for uplink transmission. The WTRU estimates a transmit power for each of a plurality of available TFCs and selects a TFC for each CCTrCH such that the sum of the estimated WTRU transmit power for selected TFCs is within a maximum WTRU transmit power.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: RADIO LINK AND HANDOVER FAILURE HANDLING

exch:abstract.exch:p: The method and apparatus disclosed are used for handling RL and handover failures based on context transfer details and RACH procedures that enhance the failure handling procedures. After an RL failure, a user equipment (UE) includes the identity of an evolved Node-B (eNodeB) and/or cell as an information element (IE) in an RRC connection request and/or a cell update message or any other RRC message along with a UE identity.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR INTEGRATING A SOFT MOBILE VOIP CLIENT IN A CELLULAR PC CARD

exch:abstract.exch:p: A method and apparatus for integrating a Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) client in a wireless PC card are disclosed. A soft mobile phone client is combined with a cellular PC card to create a single physical device that is capable of providing VoIP services to a computer user through the cellular capabilities of the device itself, or alternatively, through any other Internet connectivity available to the computer. When a user inserts the VoIP client/ Cellular PC Card into a computer, a graphical user interface (GUI) within the connection manager software is launched allowing the user to communicate VoIP function commands to the VoIP client. A check for Internet connectivity may be performed, at which time the Radio portion of the enhanced PC card may be put into an idle state if connectivity is detected, or may alternatively establish Internet connectivity through the cellular portion of the enhanced PC card. (Key words: UMA (universal mobile access), SIP, GAN, IEEE 802.21, access stratum module, softphone, softmobile.)

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LINK LAYER QUALITY OF SERVICE PARAMETER MAPPING

exch:abstract.exch:p: A detailed QoS parameter mapping of 3GPP QoS parameters to IEEE 802.21 MIH link QoS parameters. The detailed mapping includes an IEEE 802.21 Supported Number of Class of Service (CoS) parameter to indicate supported 3GPP QoS classes (conversational, streaming, interactive, and background). IEEE 802.21 MIH capable networks may use the detailed mapping to improve access-independent mobility management. A wireless transmit/receive unit (WTRU), an access point, and other network infrastructure capable of performing the detailed QoS parameter mapping are also disclosed.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PIPERAZINE AND [1,4]DIAZEPAN DERIVATIVES AS NK ANTAGONISTS

exch:abstract.exch:p: The present invention relates to a compound of Formula (I) wherein Ris hydrogen or lower alkyl; is hydrogen, fluoro, hydroxy or lower alkyl; Ris hydrogen or lower alkyl; Ris-CHR-A Ris hydrogen, lower alkyl, fluoro, CF, CHOH or cycloalkyl; A is aryl or heteroaryl, which rings are unsubstituted or substituted by (R)o; Rmay be the same or not when o is more than one, and is heteroaryl, lower alkyl, lower alkoxy, cyano, halogen, lower alkyl substituted by halogen, lower alkoxy substituted by halogen or NRR; o is 1, 2 or 3; R, Rare independently hydrogen or lower alkyl; Ris lower alkyl; Ris lower alkyl, lower alkoxy or halogen; n is 1 or 2; m is 1 or 2; or to a pharmaceutically suitable acid addition salt thereof. The invention includes all sterioisomeric forms, including individual diastereoisomers and enantiomers of the compound of Formula (I) as well as racemic and non-racemic mixtures thereof. It has been found that the present compounds are high potential NK-3 receptor antagonists for the treatment of depression, pain, psychosis, Parkinson's disease, schizophrenia, anxiety and attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AIR CONDITIONER AND SIGNAL TRANSMISSION METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: [PROBLEMS] When applying a conventional transmission method to an air conditioner already arranged in a building or a house, a portion between a coolant pipe as a communication medium and an in-room unit and an out-of-room unit should be insulated and the steel pipe in the vicinity of both ends of the coolant pipe should be replaced by an electrically insulating device. [MEANS FOR SOLVING PROBLEMS] An air conditioner includes an in-room unit (2) connected to one end of coolant pipes (3, 4) and an out-of-room unit (1) connected to the other end of coolant pipes (3, 4). The air conditioner is characterized in that a signal coupling unit (7) is arranged for coupling an AC control signal to the coolant pipes (3, 4) and causing a predetermined impedance for the AC electric signal. This configuration eliminates the need of the conventional electrically insulating device and can perform signal transmission between the in-room unit (2) and the out-of-room unit (1) with a simple device structure.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SIGNAL TRANSMISSION METHOD AND SIGNAL TRANSMISION METHOD FOR AIR CONDITIONER

exch:abstract.exch:p: [PROBLEMS] When applying a conventional transmission method to an air conditioner already arranged in a building or a house, a portion between a coolant pipe as a communication medium and an in-room unit and an out-of-room unit should be insulated and the steel pipe in the vicinity of both ends of the coolant pipe should be replaced by an electrically insulating device. [MEANS FOR SOLVING PROBLEMS] An air conditioner includes an in-room unit (2) connected to one end of coolant pipes (3, 4) and an out-of-room unit (1) connected to the other end of coolant pipes (3, 4). The air conditioner is characterized in that a signal coupling unit (7) is arranged for coupling an AC control signal to the coolant pipes (3, 4) and causing a predetermined impedance for the AC electric signal. This configuration eliminates the need of the conventional electrically insulating device and can perform signal transmission between the in-room unit (2) and the out-of-room unit (1) with a simple device structure.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NITRIDE SEMICONDUCTOR LIGHT EMITTING ELEMENT AND METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING NITRIDE SEMICONDUCTOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: Provided is a nitride semiconductor light emitting element having improved optical output with improved qualities, such as crystal qualities, of a nitride semiconductor laminated on an AlN buffer layer. An AlN buffer layer (2) is formed on a sapphire substrate (1), and on the buffer layer, nitride semiconductors of an n-type AlGaN layer (3), an InGaN/GaN active layer (4) and a p-type GaN layer (5) are laminated in sequence. On the surface of the n-type AlGaN layer (3), an n-electrode (7) is formed, and on the p-type GaN layer (5), a p-electrode (6) is formed. The n-type AlGaN layer (3) operates as a clad layer for confining light and carriers. The AlN buffer layer (2) is manufactured by alternately supplying an Al material and an N material at a growing temperature of 900°C or higher.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: GRATING-BASED SENSOR COMBINING LABEL-FREE BINDING DETECTION AND FLUORESCENCE AMPLIFICATION AND READOUT SYSTEM FOR SENSOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: A grating-based sensor is disclosed that has a grating structure constructed and designed for both evanescent resonance (ER) fluorescence detection and label-free detection applications. One and two-dimensional gratings are also disclosed, including gratings characterized by unit cells with central posts, central holes, and two-level, two-dimensional gratings. A readout system for such sensors is also disclosed. Various applications for the biosensors are described, including cell-based assays for assessing the effect of drug compounds, proteins, peptides and other materials on cell function. A biosensor embodiment optimized for a luminescent response at two different wavelengths is also described. Such luminescent response could be produced by fluorescence (either native or from an attached fluorophore), phosphorescence, chemi-luminescence, or other luminescence technology. Two different luminescence technologies could be combined on the same biosensor chip.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: RANDOM-ACCESS MULTI-DIRECTIONAL CDMA2000 TURBO CODE INTERLEAVER

exch:abstract.exch:p: An interleaver that implements the LCS turbo interleaver algorithm utilized by the CDMA2000 standard is described. The interleaver includes a first computation unit for receiving an input address and computing a first sequential interleaved address during a first clock cycle in response thereto. A second computation unit is included for receiving an input address and computing a second sequential interleaved address during the first clock cycle in response thereto. The interleaver further includes a comparator for determining whether the first or the second sequential interleaved address is invalid and generating a signal in response thereto. The output of the comparator provides a control signal to a switch which selects the first or the second sequential interleaved address as an output interleaved address for the first clock cycle. The interleaver is further designed to move in a forward direction or a reverse direction.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHODS FOR AUTOMATIC INSERTION, DEBUBBLING, CLEANING AND CALIBRATION OF A SPECTRAL PROBE DURING DISSOLUTION TESTING

exch:abstract.exch:p: A dissolution test apparatus includes an optical probe, an automated actuator. The probe takes an optics-based measurement in dissolution media contained in a test vessel and transmits the measurement to an analytical instrument situated remotely from the vessel. The optical probe is movable by the actuator into and out from the vessel. The dissolution test apparatus may include a bubble removal apparatus that communicates with the optical probe and is configured for transmitting a variable vibrating force to the probe, wherein bubbles are removed from a light path gap of the probe. In another dissolution test apparatus, the bubble removal apparatus rotates the probe to remove bubbles. Another dissolution test apparatus includes a movable cleaning mechanism, a movable calibration mechanism, or both mechanisms.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SURFACE ACOUSTIC WAVE DEVICE, SURFACE ACOUSTIC WAVE FILTER EMPLOYING SAME AND ANTENNA DUPLEXER, AND ELECTRONIC APPARATUS EMPLOYING SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: A surface acoustic wave device (10) comprises a substrate (1) containing lithium niobate, a comb type electrode (22) provided on the upper surface of the substrate and consisting of a plurality of electrode fingers (22a), and a protective film (4) having a corrugated upper surface and covering the comb type electrode (22). Assuming the pitch width of the comb type electrode (22) is p, the width of one electrode finger (22a) is p1, the width between the electrode fingers (22a) is p2, and the thickness of the comb type electrode (22) is h, the following relations: p1+p2=p and h/(2xp)>=4.5% are satisfied. With such an arrangement, appropriate reflection characteristics are achieved and a surface acoustic wave device (10) having good temperature characteristics and electric characteristics is obtained.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SHAFT FURNACE AND METHOD FOR OPERATING A FURNACE

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to a method for operating a shaft furnace (10). According to said method, an upper region (14) of the shaft furnace (10) is charged with raw materials which sink in the shaft furnace (10) under the influence of gravity. Part of the raw materials is melted and/or at least partially reduced by the action of the atmosphere inside the shaft furnace (10). A treatment gas is introduced in a lower region (18) of the shaft furnace (10) by means of at least one lower admission opening (32), said treatment gas at least partially influencing the atmosphere inside the shaft furnace (10). The introduction of the lower treatment gas is dynamically modulated such that, during the modulation, the operating variables, that is pressure pand/or volume flow (I), are varied at least temporarily over a time span of <= 40 s, especially <= 20 s, preferably <= 5 s and especially preferably <=1 s. According to the invention, an addition gas is introduced via at least one addition opening (42) at a distance from the lower admission opening (32), the operating variables of the gas, that is pressure pand/or volumen flow (II), being at least temporarily varied, and/or a shaft furnace gas is derived by means of a shaft furnace gas line (50) connected to the inside (34) of the shaft furnace (10), for removing gaseous reaction products, the operating variables of the shaft furnace gas, that is pressure pand/or volume flow (III), being at least temporarily varied. The variation of the operating variables of the addition gas and/or the shaft furnace gas is carried out according to the invention in such a way that the pressure pand/or the volume flow (I) inside (34) the shaft furnace (10) is at least partially increased.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PHYSICAL DEVICE(PHY) SUPPORT OF THE USB2.0 LINK POWER MANAGEMENT ADDENDUM USING A ULPI PHY INTERFACE STANDARD

exch:abstract.exch:p: A protocol may enable support of the USB 2.0 LPM (Link Power Management) Addendum by a ULPI PHY (Universal Serial Bus Transceiver Macrocell Low-Pin Interface Physical Layer Device), facilitating transmitting the reserved PID (Physical Interface Device) token, used in the LPM Extended Transaction, through a ULPI bus. Bits [3:0] of a ULPI Tx Cmd (Transmit Command) byte may be reused, with the value of those bits being 4'b0 for a transmission (normally indicating a No PID transmission), by configuring the ULPI PHY to qualify the selected four Tx Cmd bits (bits [3:0] of the Tx Cmd) with the Opmode code. The ULPI PHY may thereby interpret bits [3:0] of the Tx Cmd byte based on the value of the Opmode, and may not transmit the Extended PID when the Opmode is set to 2'b10, that is, when the Opmode is indicative of bit-stuffing and NRZI encoding being disabled, for example during a Chirp transmission. When the Opmode code is set to 2'b0, indicative of normal bit-stuffing, and the Tx Cmd bits [3:0] are set to 4'b0 during a transmission (Tx Cmd bits[7:6] = 2'b01), then the PHY may transmit the Extended PID, followed by the rest of the extended transaction onto a USB.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NOVEL MALONIC ACID SULFONAMIDE DERIVATIVE AND PHARMACEUTICAL USE THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: It is intended to provide a novel compound which has ATreceptor agonism and is capable of being expected as a pharmaceutical and to provide a therapeutic or preventive method for various diseases. A novel malonic acid sulfonamide derivative, a pharmacologically acceptable salt thereof and a solvate thereof of the invention has a therapeutic and/or preventive effect on various diseases due to ATreceptor agonism and is useful as a pharmaceutical for treating and/or preventing diseases associated with the renin-angiotensin-aldosterone (RAAS) system.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AIR DEMAND FEEDBACK CONTROL SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR SULFUR RECOVERY UNITS

exch:abstract.exch:p: A Claus plant with multiple parallel thermal stages that provide a combined effluent to downstream catalytic stages includes a controller that allows independent and individual control for each of the thermal stages as a function of measured chemical composition of the thermal stage effluents and catalytic stage effluent.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ADAPTIVE SUNLIGHT REDIRECTOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: Longitudinally adjacent plane mirrors (106-114) are pivotally interconnected in a columnar array (56) by non-stretching linkages (120) which constrain movement of the mirrors such that their normal vectors (115) remain parallel. Pivotable couplings (122, 124) in two mirrors permit movement of the mirrors with respect to mutually perpendicular axes (,) and prevent movement of the mirrors with respect to a third axis (). Two actuators (117A, 117B) coupled to one of the pivotable couplings controllably move a selected mirror with respect to the mutually perpendicular axes (,). A first frame (116) couples the mirror columns together so that movement of the selected mirror moves all the mirrors in unison. The actuators controllably move the mirrors to orient the normal vectors such that the mirrors specularly reflect incident light in a preselected direction.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LIGHTING DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: A lighting control device (1) is provided with an irradiation light generating unit (11) that inputs an irradiation signal, coating correction means (12, 13) that correct the irradiation signal to make an irradiated object (20) coated with the irradiation light, and an irradiation light projecting unit (2) that carries out projection by using the irradiation signal subjected to the correction processing. Irradiation light includes the coating light that coats the irradiated object (20) and background light that becomes a background of the irradiated object (20). The lighting control device (1) is provided with a first coating correction unit(12) that corrects the irradiation signal so as to cut the contour of the coating light in accordance with the shape of the irradiated object (20) and a second coating correction unit (13) that corrects the contour of the coating light in accordance with a relationship between the origin position of the irradiated object (20) and a position of the irradiation light projection unit (2).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ELECTRIC CONTROL METHOD FOR CRANE WITH MULTIPLE HOISTED POINTS

exch:abstract.exch:p: An electric control method and its equipment for crane with multiple hoisted points, the control method includes as follows steps: a. ready mode, for detecting whether the high and low voltage power distribution system, main drive system, control system, etc, have failure or not; b. rope pre-tensioning mode, where every rising motor adopts torque control, offers torque given value, and makes sure if the rope is tensioned or not by the weighing sensor; c. suspending stop mode, every rising motor adopts speed control, the controller sets motor torque amplitude limiting value, performs loading sling, works out the centroid place of sling object; d. associated hoisting mode, every rising electromotor adopts speed control, the torque amplitude limiting of motor is the same as the suspending stop mode, ever and again monitoring and amends to keep the sling object balanced hoisting. The electric control means improves automatic control level, task efficiency, reduces misplay of manual work. The technique can be used in various synchronization control cranes.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DOUBLE MIAN GIRDER AND MULTI HANGING POINT CRANE

exch:abstract.exch:p: A double girder and multi hanging point crane comprises main girders, a lifting mechanism, a translating mechanism (4) and an electric control system, characterized in that said main girders are double main girders (1,2) highly and lowly arranged, each main girder having variable sections and being high and narrow compound girders composed of three-box-typed main girders; the lifting mechanism is composed of multi sets of hoisting systems (3), each set of hoisting systems (3) respectively connected to and controlling multi hanging points and synchronously driving above all hanging points through the electric control system; a rope arranging mechanism is arranged at the hoisting systems (3), and a mono-connecting and multiplayer twisting rope system is adopted; the translating mechanism (4) is main girder bidirectionally self-translating mechanism arranged at the two ends of the lower main girder; the electric control system is an electric control system of multi hanging point crane hyperstatic system.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: WIRE ROPE SPACE ANTI-INTERFERENCE ARRANGEMENT FOR CRANE WITH MULTIPLE HOISTING POINTS

exch:abstract.exch:p: A wire rope space anti-interference arrangement for a crane with multiple hoisting points is disclosed. The hoister comprises a main girder (10), a movable pulley block (3), a fixed pulley block (5) and a hoister (1). Leading pulleys (2) are provided in the upper space of the upper cover board of the main girder (10). Hoister steadiers (7) with different height are provided at two ends of the cover board. Corresponding to the height of the hoister steadiers (7), the leading pulleys (2) are mounted at different height. Connecting lines are located between the vertical center lines of the hoister winding drums provided at two ends of the main girder (10) and the center lines of the respectively corresponding leading pulleys (2) of the hoister winding drums. A same small fleet anger (E) is formed between the connecting lines and the center line of the main girder (10), corresponding to the fleet anger between the hoister (1) at the same end and the main girder (10). The two fleet angers between the hoisters (1) at two ends and the main girder (10) are opposite. The anti-interference arrangement is simple, its manufacture, installation and maintain is handy, its operation is of highperformance, safe and reliable. The arrangement is applied to the crane for hoisting the superheavy article such as drilling platform and so on.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PROCESS OF MAKING CARBON ELECTRODES

exch:abstract.exch:p: A process for preparing carbon electrodes is presented. In particular, a process for preparing carbon electrodes including the steps of combining calcined coke, a liquid pitch binder and carbon fibers derived from mesophase pitch to form an electrodestock blend; extruding the electrodestock blend to form a green electrodestock; backing the green stock to form a carbonized electrodestock; and graphitizing the carbonized stock by maintaining the carbonized stock at a temperature of at least about 2500.degree. C. for no more than about 18 hours is presented. The electrodes prepared by the inventive process are also presented.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: WIRELESS COMMUNICATION METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR ENCODING AND DECODING BEAMFORMING VECTORS

exch:abstract.exch:p: A wireless communication method and apparatus for encoding and decoding beamforming vectors are disclosed. A base station sends explicit signaling for a beamforming vector of a wireless transmit/receive unit (WTRU) and implicit signaling for beamforming vectors of interfering WTRUs. Each WTRU uses its own beam forming vector to estimate the beamforming vectors of each of the other WTRUs.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APATITE AND METHOD FOR PRODUCTION THEREOF, AND APATITE BASE MATERIAL

exch:abstract.exch:p: An apatite which contains metal atoms having photocatalytic function and other metal atoms, characterized in that above metal atoms having photocatalytic function comprise metal atoms absorbing the energy corresponding to the light energy of a visible light; and an apatite base material using the apatite. A product using the apatite base material can exhibit photocatalytic function even when it is placed in a room.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ARACHIDONIC ACID-CONTAINING OIL AND METHODS FOR THE PRODUCTION THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: The present invention relates to processes for the production of arachidonic acid containing oils, which preferably are substantially free of eicosapentaneoic acid. The invention also relates to compositions containing oils having very high amounts of arachidonic acid in triglyceride form, and to uses of such oils. In a preferred embodiment, Mortierella alpina is cultivated using conditions which yield triglyceride oil having particularly high levels of arachidonic acid residues, biomass is harvested and the oil is extracted, recovered, and used as an additive for infant formula.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PREPREG, PROCESS FOR PRODUCING PREPREG, SUBSTRATE, AND SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: This invention provides a prepreg that can cope with a demand for a film thickness reduction, enables different applications, functions, performances or properties or the like to be imparted respectively to both sides of the prepreg, and enables the amount of a resin composition to be set depending upon a circuit wiring pattern to be buried. There are also provided a process for producing the prepreg, a substrate comprising the prepreg, and a semiconductor device. The prepreg is characterized by comprising a core layer including a sheet-like base material, a first resin layer provided on one side of the core layer and formed of a first resin composition, and a second resin layer provided on the other side of the core layer and formed of a second resin composition, a conductor layer being provided on the first resin layer, at least one of a requirement that the first resin layer is different from the second resin layer in thickness and a requirement that the first resin composition is different from the second resin composition in composition, being satisfied.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COLLAPSIBLE COLANDER AND BOWL

exch:abstract.exch:p: A collapsible container consists of three parts: a rigid top rim, a flexible center band, and a rigid base. This combination of sections allows the container to easily collapse to about one-third of its original height. The container is also quite stable when expanded and is self-supporting. In various embodiments of the invention, for example, the upper rim may be expandable, the base may include holes or mesh to serve as a colander or strainer, or the base may be configured as a tube to function as a funnel.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NAME TOOTHBRUSH

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A name-marked toothbrush is provided to prevent users from mixing a toothbrush with other users due to personal hygiene by easily recognizing their toothbrush. CONSTITUTION: A name-marked toothbrush comprises a rubber unit formed on a PP body of the handle of a toothbrush to write down a name of a user. The rubber unit can be formed during the process of injecting rubber on the PP body. A protrusion is formed along the outer edge of the rubber unit to write words in between the protrusion using a ballpoint pen. Various words or simple drawings can be marked to the rubber unit by securing a part in which a palm of a user does not contact with the rubber unit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CREDIT CARD HAVING CONTENTS AND DRVIVING METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A credit card with contents and a driving method thereof are provided to supply a discriminated customer service. CONSTITUTION: A circuit board is formed on a substrate. A storage device(616) is formed on the circuit board. An input and output pad is formed on the storage device. The storage device has a security area storing contents authenticated through an authentication apparatus(615) of a credit card(614). The storage device comprises a flash memory area.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MOBILE MEDIA CARD AND DRVIVING METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A mobile media card and a driving method thereof are provided to supply a differential service to a client through the contents of a credit card company. CONSTITUTION: An IC(Integrated Circuit)(111) is formed on a credit card board, and a magnetic bar is formed on the board. A credit card number is formed on the board, and a signature portion is prepared on the board. The IC includes authentication information for the authentication through a mobile device, and contents storage media(112) is formed on the credit card. The authentication information is encoded.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COMPUTER POWER OR HARD DISK CONTROL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A control method of computer power and hard disks is provided to select a hard disk in one computer by a remote controller, thereby using different OS(Operating System). CONSTITUTION: A J1 supplies board power by USB(Universal Serial Bus) power source. A J2 is a part for computer power operation. A J3 connects a power source to a control unit in a computer main body. If the J3 is in non-connection state, a computer is turned on only by a remote controller. If the J3 is in connection state, only a hard disk 1 is operated by a power switch of the computer main body. The hard disk 1 is operated through hard disk control connector of Q1, Q2, and J6. A hard disk 2 is operated through hard disk control connector of Q3, Q4, and J7.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: INVERTER BOOSTER PUMP SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An inverter booster pump system and a control method thereof are provided to improve the operation efficiency of a pump by selecting and operating the pumps according to use flow rate. CONSTITUTION: An inverter booster pump system comprises a third large-capacity pump(13), a fourth large-capacity pump(14), a first small-capacity pump(11), and a second small-capacity pump(12). The first small-capacity pump and the second small-capacity pump have the capacity corresponding to 1/2 of the large-capacity pump capacity. The second large-capacity pump, the fourth large-capacity pump, the first small-capacity pump, and the second small-capacity pump are installed between an intake pipe(21) and a water supply pipe(25) in parallel.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FRICTION STIR WELDING TOOL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A friction stir welding tool is provided to reduce a maintenance cost by preventing a damage and deformation of a tip-end unit of the friction stir welding tool, and to increase a lifetime of the tool. CONSTITUTION: A friction stir welding tool(20) comprises a tip-end unit, a body, and a rear unit(23). The diameter of the tip-end unit is formed in 2.5 millimeters. The length of the tip-end unit is formed in 6.7 millimeters. The material for forming the friction stir welding tool is cemented carbide with a hardness of HRC 88 or HRC91.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: GOLD PLATING AND SILVER PLATING METHOD FOR ELECTROCONDUCTIVE FABRIC

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A gold and silver plating method for conductive fiber is provided to improve productivity of fiber to apply the method for a high tech textile industrial field, and to offer chemical resistance and corrosion resistance properties to the fiber. CONSTITUTION: A gold and silver plating method for conductive fiber includes the following steps: inputting fiber materials(S10); performing a degreasing, an etching, a neutralization, an acid treatment and an activation processes(S20); repeating a nickel plating and a copper plating processes on the fiber(S30); performing a gold or a silver plating processes(S40); and performing a dehydration process and a drying process after discoloration prevention processing(S70).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NAIL CUTTER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A nail clipper is provided to prevent scattering of fingernail pieces, and to ease an operation of clipping nails by fixing an elastic member with a controlling screw to move the elastic member front and back. CONSTITUTION: A nail clipper(1) comprises the following: a collecting space(12) collecting all of fingernail pieces cut from fingers from a user in a case; a pin insertion hole formed in the front and the back surface to be penetrated; a protrusion in the upper and the lower side to prevent a holding member(3) from separating; the holding member and an elastic member(4) formed in the inside of the case; and an insertion hole penetrating a fixing unit(14) to fix a pin(5) in the same position of the pin insertion hole, and to fix a pushing unit pushed from the outer force. The elastic member comprises: a cutter(18) in one end of an elastic unit pushed by a pushing unit; a screw fixing hole in the other end; and a controlling screw with a loop(20) to move the elastic member back and forth.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HAIR OF CHALKBOARD ERASER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A duster for a blackboard eraser is provided to conveniently handle an eraser by forming the upper part of a main body into a concave shape, to enhance esthetics, and to prevent vibrations or noise. CONSTITUTION: A duster for a blackboard eraser comprises: a suction hole(5) which is formed lengthwise on the upper surface portion of a main body(1) and which has a slope on one side.; a motor, a suction fan and a dust barrel(2) which are installed inside the main body; a brush(4) which passes through the suction hole and is installed in the body; a connector which is perpendicularly projected to the bottom surface along the edge of the suction hole of the upper surface portion of the main body; an inlet part of a dust pack(7) which is fitted in the connector; and an exhaust hole formed on the main body and a concave handle.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: RRING BINDER FOR MEMOING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A ring binder for memo paper is provided to easily fix the memo paper and individually withdraw the paper without special glue and clip by fixing the memo paper with a cover using an expanding ring. CONSTITUTION: A ring binder for memo paper comprises: many pieces of memo paper(100) which are laminated; a holder member which includes a cover and a supporting part of the top and bottom side and in which a middle portion supports the one-side end of the laminated memo paper; and an expanding ring(300) which is fixed covering the one-side of the holder member and prevents the memo paper from breaking away using self-elasticity. The expanding ring is made of elastic materials and has various colors.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: STRUCTURE OF READING ETC

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A structure of reading etc is provided to reduce fatigue of eye for long time by applying uniform illuminance to over the lens. CONSTITUTION: A reading lamp structure comprises a light guide plate(3). The light guide plate is installed in an internal reflection side. A plurality of light sources are installed the side of the light guide plate. The lens(7) is installed at the front of the light guide plate. The light of the light source is diffracted by the light guide plate and is diffused-reflected. The light is uniformly radiated on the light emitting surface(701) of the lens.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PUBLIC RELATIONS,TOURIST BUSINESS, SELLING SOLUTION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A solution for promotion, tourist business, and local special product sale is provided to offer local news or video data for tourist promotion through internet, thereby maximizing promotion effect. CONSTITUTION: High quality video data is transmitted to the center. Among the transmitted video data, captions are inserted in real time video data with high products value. The video data is transmitted through internet in real time. A local government and an outside manufacturer manage data according to each region and local product data.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THREE-DIMENSIONAL IMAGE SENSING SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A three dimensional shape measuring system is provided to improve accuracy compared to a mirror scheme and to measure the three dimensional shape of an object regardless of the height. CONSTITUTION: A three dimensional shape measuring system comprises a work-stage(130), a plurality of projection units(110), an imaging unit(150), and a controller(140). The controller selectively operates or stops two or more of the projection units according to the shape of an object. Therefore, the three dimensional shape measuring system measures the three dimensional shape of the object using the grid image light received in the imaging unit through the turned-on projection units.

PURPOSE: A degradable vertical drain board in which a macromolecule synthesis technology is applied is provided to prevent environmental contamination by using a biodegradable polyester resin. CONSTITUTION: A degradable vertical drain board comprises a core and a filter. The core is a pressed body which is made of freshly synthesized polyester resin as the main component. The core has a plurality of water paths. The filter surrounds the core. A core material contains α-cyclodextrin and adipic acid(9).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A POINT CHISEL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A perforated point chisel is provided to improve work efficiency by increasing breaking force of a hammer due to the weight reduction of a point because only a perforated point breaks concrete by receiving the hitting force of a hammer. CONSTITUTION: A perforated point chisel(10) comprises a sleeve shank(20) and a perforated point(30). The sleeve shank is directly attached to a holder. The perforated point is assembled and disassembled through the sleeve shank. A joint point chisel is composed of a general shank and a screwed joint point. The screwed joint point is assembled with and disassembled from the general shank though a screw structure.

exch:applicant-name.name: DONG KUK ELECTRIC MACHINERY CO., LTD.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LIGHTING POLE WITHIN SOLAR MODULE AND MANUFACTURING METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A lighting pole within a solar module and a manufacturing method are provided to supply a stable power generation and supply regardless of the height of the sun by installing an amorphous flexible a sun light module at a street pole. CONSTITUTION: A sunlight street light(1) generates electricity through a photovoltaic module(8). The generated electricity is charged into a battery(2). The sunlight street light comprises a sunlight exclusive battery, a controller, a sine wave inverter(4), and an LED lamp(11). The battery, the controller and the sine wave inverter are installed at an exclusive box(3). The LED lamp is connected to an electric pole and a street light arm(10).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THE HOME DELIVERY BUSINESS MACHINERY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A home delivery service ordering machine is provided to connect a separate e-market, thereby enabling a consumer to buy an item that local government guarantees through internet. CONSTITUTION: An EPG(Electronic Program Guide) screen is composed. A guarantee system about products according to each local government is programmed. If a consumer selects an item, explanation and video data about the items are attached. The consumer confirms a cost according to a class of the selected item. The consumer directly performs a video call with a producer. The consumer charges the item by a credit card.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ROBUST ELECTROLYZER DEVICE AND DESIGN METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A durable electrolyzer device and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to remove dangerous factors of short circuit between coils by holding the coils butted up against a fixture. CONSTITUTION: A durable electrolyzer device contains an electrolyte solution and transfers hydrogen gas produced through electrolysis to a combustion chamber of an internal combustion engine. The combustion chamber includes a vent through which the exhaust gas after thermonuclear reaction of fuel and hydrogen gas mixed in the combustion chamber is discharged. A solution tank(1) for the electrolyte solution is sealed up with a lid on which negative and positive electrodes(2,3) for connection of power source are screwed.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AUTO GLARE SHIELDED WELDING MASK

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An auto anti-glare welding mask using a liquid crystal glass as a shield is provided to remove the inconvenience of taking of the welding mask to see a welded part, and to provide an easy usage of the welding mask. CONSTITUTION: An auto anti-glare welding mask includes an anti-glare lens for a welding mask. The anti-glare lens comprises an anti-glare coated inner lens, an outer lens, and a liquid crystal lens in between the inner and the outer lens. An auto anti-glare function is performed by the liquid crystal lens only activates when a user is welding by forming a circuit. The basic anti-glare function of the welding mask is performed by the inner and the outer lens.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CASES SOAP WATER EMISSIONS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A soap case is provided to easily drain water gather in the inside, and to reduce wasting of soap by melting the soap with backward flowed water. CONSTITUTION: A soap case capable of easily draining water from the inside comprises the following: a supporting board with holes in the bottom to drain water; and a supporting board without any holes in the bottom. The holes in the supporting board with holes are connected to the supporting board without any holes from the upper side with a cylindrical form to drain the water from the upper supporting board with holes, but to prevent the water from backward flowing up from the supporting board without any holes.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CARBONATED BEVERAGES SAVER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A carbonated drink reservoir is provided to efficiently and conveniently prevent leakage of carbonic acid included in carbonated drink by standing the reservoir upside down, and to preserve the specific taste of the carbonated drink. CONSTITUTION: A carbonated drink reservoir has structure for standing the reservoir upside down. If an ordinary bottle storing carbonated drink is not preserved for a long time, because the carbonic acid is leaked after opening the bottle and the specific taste of the drink is eliminated. The structure of the carbonated drink reservoir prevents the leakage of the carbonic acid and preserves the tastes of the drink.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PEN SAVER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A pen including a protection device for a lead is provided to prevent the lead of pen from being damaged by impact when the pen is dropt or separated from the hands of a user. CONSTITUTION: A pen including a protection device for the pen and a lead of pen has a structure in which a handle part is pressed and the lead of pen comes out when holding the pen and the lead of pen again enters into the inside of the pen when releasing the pen.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MODULE-BOX OF SWIVELING SIGN

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A module box for a swiveling type cubic sign is provided to inform optimal contents by easily replacing the contents whenever required. CONSTITUTION: A frame member(20) unites a side panel(10). A side panel is fixed with the frame member and is possible to be combined or separated to a plurality of sides of the module box. An axis support member is fixed with a frame member and is included in the upper side or the lower-part of the module box. A rotary panel(12) revolves.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR AUTOMATICALLY REMOVING SOOT OF WATER TANK SMOKE TUBE WITHIN MIDSIZE AND LARGE BOILER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus for automatically removing soot of a water tank smoke tube in midsize and large boilers is provided to operate coil-shaped removing units with low power by connecting all coil-shaped removing units to a vertical operating frame. CONSTITUTION: An apparatus for automatically removing soot of a water tank smoke tube in midsize and large boilers comprises a coil-shaped removing unit(4), a vertical operating frame(10), and a hydraulic cylinder(21). The coil-shaped removing unit is inserted inside a number of connection pipes of an upper water tank(2). The coil-shaped removing unit removes soot of the smoke tube through vertical operation. The vertical operation frame corresponds to the smoke tubes and crossly connects vertical and horizontal connecting rods. The hydraulic cylinder is connected to a hydraulic motor(20).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: UP-DOWN DEVICE FOR PIN JIG USING MOVABLE PULLEY AND PIN JIG USING MOVABLE PULLEY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A pin jig lifting apparatus using a movable pulley and a pin jig using the movable pulley are provided to prevent malfunction and an upper tube from being inclined to one side during the movement of the upper tube. CONSTITUTION: A pin jig lifting apparatus using a movable pulley comprises a fixed body(210), a fixed pulley(220), an upper tube support(230), a movable pulley(240), and a wire(250). The fixed body is fixed inside an upper tube at fixed height. The fixed pulley is fixed on the fixed body. The upper tube support is fixed below the upper tube . The movable pulley which is fixed on the upper tube support is vertically moved with the upper tube support. One end of the wire is fixed with the fixed body.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR CONTROLLING CLUTCH FOR AIRCONDITIONER COMPRESSOR OF HYBRID VEHICLE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for controlling a clutch for driving an air conditioner compressor of a hybrid vehicle is provided to improve an air conditioner operation efficiency using one machinery compressor by operate a separation(OPEN) or a bonding(CLOSE) control of the clutch connected between an engine and ISG according to on/OFF and EV / HEV driving mode of an air conditioner switch.
