CONSTITUTION: A method for controlling a clutch for driving an air conditioner compressor of a hybrid vehicle comprises: a step of distinguishing whether a driving mode of the hybrid vehicle is a EV driving mode or HEV driving mode and whether an air conditioner switch is on or off; and a step of controlling a clutch which is connected between an engine and ISG into a separation(OPEN) or bonding(CLOSE) by distinguishing a conversion of the driving mode from the EV driving mode to the HEV driving mode and the conversion of the air conditioner switch from on to off.

exch:applicant-name.name: GWANGJU INSTITUTE OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: EDITER SYSTEM FOR UCC WEB PRINTING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An editing system for UCC(User Created Contents) web printing is provided to offer templates of various shapes, thereby enabling a user to produce design which is suitable for the taste of a user. CONSTITUTION: Upload function setup web pages are provided. Through the web pages, contents in which photograph or image information are conversed into a preset type. The contents match ID information so that a database is constructed. If a specific contents purchase is requested, a specific contents amount is charged.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CHECK ENDORSEMENTING APPARATUS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A securities endorsement apparatus is provided to automatically endorse a user identification tag to securities by extracting user identification information from a user identification tag. CONSTITUTION: An inputting unit(100) inputs securities. An identification information recognizing unit(200) recognizes the user identification. A printing unit(500) prints the user identification on the securities. A controlling unit(700) controls the printing part in order to print the acknowledged user identification on the securities. A discharging unit(600) discharges securities in which the user identification is printed.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR SEARCHING TELEPHONE BOOK

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A telephone number searching method is provided to perform automatic character string conversion and telephone number searching according to key input without additional previous manipulation, thereby simplifying user of a telephone. CONSTITUTION: In input waiting state of a telephone number, combination of special characters and numbers are inputted through a key of a phone. In Korean input mode, the combination is converted to a Korean character string. The Korean character string is searched in a telephone directory. The searched telephone number is displayed on a screen. According to request of a user, a phone call is made by the combination of the special characters and numbers or the telephone number.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: REAL TIME MOVING PICTURE REMOTE CONTROL DEVICE USING DYNAMIC IMAGE MOBILEPHONE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A real time moving picture remote control device using a video phone is provided to enable a manager at a remote place to easily grasp a remote place facility through voice, text, and image data. CONSTITUTION: A real time moving picture remote control device using a video phone includes a video phone(100), a camera(200), a sensor(300) and a controller(400). The video phone is installed on one side of a remote place that a user wants to monitor and can transmit an image. The camera photographs a remote place to output an image signal. A sensor senses a state of a remote place to output a measurement value. The controller transmits an image and a measurement value that a camera and a sensor output to the outside through a video phone.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THE CREAM PUFF BUN

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A choux cream bread for selling on the street is provided to ensure nutritional balance and to enjoy soft and sweet bread taste. CONSTITUTION: A choux cream bread comprises wheat dough and choux cream inside the dough. The choux cream contains 42-48 weight% of corn starch, 32-37 weight% of sugar powder, and 18-22 weight% of dried milk. The choux cream further contains 0.1-0.3 weight% of edible coloring agent, 0.5-2 weight% of salt, and 0.1-0.3 weight% of flavors.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: WIRE STRAIGHTENER AND SYSTEM FOR STRAIGHTENING WIRE USING WIRE STRAIGHTENER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A wire straightener and a wire straightening system using the same are provided to maintain the optimum speed of wire feed by automatically regulating the wire feed speed. CONSTITUTION: A wire straightener(100) comprises a power generator(30), a rotator(40), a correction roll assembly(60), and a correction block assembly(70). The power generator produces torque. A through path(41) is formed in the rotator to transport a wire in the longitudinal direction. The rotator is fitted with bearings on both ends and revolves with the torque from the power generator. The correction roll assembly is provided in one or more pairs on both sides of the rotator and presses the wire to be transported. The correction block assembly is provided between the correction roll assemblies and gives a bending force to the wire while guiding the movement of the wire.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ANTI-ROTATION APPARATUS AND SYSTEM FOR STRAIGHTENING WIRE USING ANTI-ROTATION APPARATUS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An anti-rotation apparatus for wires and a wire straightening system using the same are provided to prevent the twisting of a wire transported straight. CONSTITUTION: An anti-rotation apparatus(400) comprises a body, a lower support, an upper support, and a pressing unit(470). The lower support is fixed to the body and comprises a lower roller(453) which revolves while supporting the lower side of a wire transported straight. The upper support is fixed to the body on one side and selectively presses the upper side of the wire on the other. The pressing unit presses the upper support downward.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CUTTING ASSEMBLY AND SYSTEM FOR STRAIGHTENING WIRE USING CUTTING ASSEMBLY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cutting assembly and a wire straightening system are provided to enable processes through an operator as one discharging device supports the wire until the wire is cut and automatically discharges the cut wires. CONSTITUTION: A cutting assembly comprises a cutting device(10) and a discharge device(30). The cutting device has a cutter(16). The cutter rotates around a rotary shaft(14). The cutting device cuts the wire(W) transferred at a fixed length. The discharge device guides and supports the wire until the wire is cut by the cutting device. The discharge device discharges the cut wire to a lower part.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CHAMFERING MACHINE AND PROOFREADING SYSTEM USING THE CHAMFERING MACHINE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A chamfering machine and a wire straightening system with the same are provided to securely fix a wire by engaging a first and a second block of a clamping part through an interlinked structure. CONSTITUTION: A chamfering machine comprises a clamping part(700), a grinding part(800), a reciprocating cylinder, and a transfer device. The clamping part fixes the wire(W) to prevent the movement of the wire. The grinding part is installed on one side of the clamping part. The grinding part cuts one end of the wire fixed by the clamping part. The reciprocating cylinder horizontally reciprocates the clamping part and the grinding part, so one end of the wire is grinded by the grinding part.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SYSTEM FOR STRAIGHTENING WIRE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A wire straightening system is provided to improve workability and productivity by continuously simultaneously straightening a wire and cutting the straightened wire. CONSTITUTION: A wire straightening system comprises a straightening device(10), a cutting device(100), a transport device(110), and a support device(130). The straightening device presses a wire(W) by rotating with the torque provided from a power generator and transports the wire. The cutting device cuts the straightened wire to a certain length. The transport device moves the straightening device to the opposite direction of the wire feed direction. The support device is connected to both sides of the straightening device and supports the axial movement of the straightening device.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A FERMENTED DEODORANT COMPOSITION COMPRISING WORMWOOD AND RICE BRAN

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A fermented deodorant composition containing mugwort and rice bran and a method of manufacturing thereof are provided to manufacture an effective deodorizing agent, and to insure an environment-friendly and simple manufacturing method. CONSTITUTION: A method of manufacturing fermented deodorant composition containing mugwort and rice bran comprises the following steps: mixing 8~15 parts by weight of vermiculite, 1~1.5 parts by weight of carbon source, and 0.5~1.5 parts by weight of fermented germs by the 100 parts by weight of the rice bran; fermenting the mixture for 2~4 days at 25~40 deg C; drying the mixture at 45~50 deg C until the moisture content of the mixture is within 7~15%; and mixing the fermented mixture and a mugwort powder with a ratio based on the weight of 4:6~7:3.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A VACUUM PUMP FOR AN AIRTIGHT CONTAINER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A vacuum pump for a sealed container is provided to rapidly secure the high vacuum with simple structure of the pump, and to improve work efficiency of the vacuum pump by simplifying the entire structure including an air exhaust structure. CONSTITUTION: A vacuum pump for a sealed container includes a container body(10), a lower driving body(20), a suction pipe(30), a press power transmitter(40), a lower supporting body(50), and a spring(60). The container body includes a cylindrical space part on the inner side central part. The lower driving part is combined to a cylindrical space bottom part. The suction pipe penetrates the center part of the lower driving body and the top of the suction pipe is combined to the container body. The press power transmitter is contacted to the lower driving body. The spring is positioned between the bottom driving body and the bottom supporting body.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: STRUCTURE OF BUS DOOR RETAINER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A bus door retainer structure is provided to increase safety due to the vibration of a door generated in motion as locking is generated by relative exercise between retainers of a door side and a vehicle body side. CONSTITUTION: A bus door retainer structure comprises a door retainer(11) and a pillar retainer(21). The door retainer is connected to a motor(12) mounted on a door and rotates at a fixed angle. An inserting projection is formed on one side of the door retainer. The pillar retainer is installed on the pillar. One side of the pillar retainer is opened. The pillar retainer has a coupling hole.

PURPOSE: Mineral concentrate for food addition and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to offer safety for taking the concentrate for a long time without toxicity or side effects, and to reduce activation of GST[Glutathion-S-Transferase]. CONSTITUTION: Mineral concentrate for food addition includes 2~5 parts by weight of sodium citrate, 4~8 parts by weight of potassium chloride, 8~16 parts by weight of refined sugar and 5~9 parts by weight of sodium carbonate. The composition is formed by diluting the sodium citrate, the potassium chloride, the refined sugar and sodium carbonate with water. The weight ratio of the sodium citrate, the potassium chloride, the refined sugar and sodium carbonate is 2~5 : 4~8 : 8~16 : 5~9 respectively.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SAVING METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR X-RAY MACHINE VIDEO SIGNAL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A video signal storage method and apparatus for an x-ray machine are provided to simplify the configuration of the apparatus by excluding a separate video signal converter and to prevent reduction of resolution. CONSTITUTION: A video signal storage method for an x-ray machine comprises the steps of: acquiring an analog image by scanning X ray through a transferred object and receiving the X ray in a light receiving part(1), detecting the acquired image into continuous image signal(2), dividing the image signal and reproducing one of the divided image signals(3), and storing the other image signal as an RGB image signal(4).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: REPEATER FOR RELAYING MULTI BAND SIGNALS AND CONTROL METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A repeater for relaying multiband signals and a control method thereof are provided to filter multiband frequency signals by selective activation of filtering routes of different frequency band, thereby performing relay between a base station and a terminal by acceptance of using frequency bandwidth and newly allocated additional frequency bandwidth. CONSTITUTION: Input units(111,121) receive a multiband frequency signal. The multiband frequency signal is transmitted from a BS(base station) and a terminal. For filtering of the multiband frequency signal, a multipath unit(200) selectively activates a filtering route of different frequency band. The multipath unit filters the activated filtering route. Output units(130,140) perform high voltage amplification and output of the filtered multiband frequency signal.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR CONTROLLING PARKING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method and a system for controlling parking are provided to accurately recognize a parking space in a uneven road surface state. CONSTITUTION: A parking control system(100) comprises: a searcher(110) for parking space which searches a parking space using an ultrasonic sensor and measures a size of the parking space; a road sensor(130) which detects concavo-convex of the road and measures a location and size of the concavo-convex; a decision unit(140) for the parking space which decides an effective size of the parking space by reflecting the location and size of concavo-convex in the measured parking space; and a parking control part which creates a park route and controls a steering angle in the basis of the effective size of the parking space. The road sensor detects a concavo-convex of the road in a driving using a G sensor and measures the location and size of concave-convex using a dead-reckoning device.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LID OF ICE CREAM COURAGE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A lid of an ice cream container is provided to maintain sealing force and locking intensity by a plastic edge wall of the ice cream container, and to reduce manufacturing costs of the lid while maintaining a clean look of the ice cream container. CONSTITUTION: A lid of an ice cream container includes a printing layer(11) and a plastic edge wall. The plastic edge wall is insert-injected on the bottom of the printing layer by an upper stopper rim and a lower stopper rim. The advertisement contents are printed on the upper surface of the printing layer. The plastic edge wall is used in the container having a stopper rim.

exch:applicant-name.name: G MAX I & C CO LTD

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PROGRAMMING CONTROL ON THE LINE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for controlling a system program during a call with a key phone is provided to check a state of a key phone system by wire call with a customer and perform remote manual control and maintenance of the key phone system at the same time. CONSTITUTION: For program input during a call, a user presses a shortcut button. The user presses a program entry button. The user inputs the program after consultation of the program. If the user does not select the shortcut button, all buttons pressed during a call is recognized by DTMF(Dual Tone Multi-Frequency) tone. By logical software manipulation, program control of a key phone system is performed during a call.

exch:applicant-name.name: G MAX I & C CO LTD

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: REMOTE CONTROL AND REMOTE MAINTENCE WITH SINGLE LINE PHONE AND CELLUR PHONE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A remote control method of a key phone using a general phone and cellular phone and a remote maintenance method for the same are provided to rapidly execute a system program of a key phone system through the general phone and cellular phone, thereby offering rapid AS(After Service) of an item. CONSTITUTION: A function code of a key button is generated. Program entry during a call is selected. An input mode during a call is selected to be used by a general phone and cellular phone. By pressing a dial button of the general phone, a program is inputted as usual program input. A program code value is translated into language of a key phone system program. The program input is normally processed.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COUNTER ROTATING DRIVE MECHANISM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A counter rotating drive mechanism is provided to implement a compact and safe structure by arranging an intermediate gears inside a pair of panels at the same time. CONSTITUTION: A driving member and a driving axis are rotated together. An electric driving unit(140) which is arranged symmetrically around the driving member receives the rotation of the driving member. A plurality of counterclockwise gears(150) is arranged symmetrically between a plurality of transmission units around the driven axis in radial direction. The counterclockwise gear make the rotation of the transmission unit reversely turned. The driven member is arranged in the center of the plural counterclockwise gears. The driven member receive the rotation of the counterclockwise gear and is rotated with the driven axis.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MULTIWATERTANK

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A multifunctional water tank is provided to improve portability and installation of the water tank because the water tank is lighter than an ordinary tank, and to improve usability of the water tank to effectively store and utilize water. CONSTITUTION: A multifunctional water tank uses waterproof fabric as a material for the water tank. A support(3) of the water tank is interlinked with protrusions. The multifunctional water tank is freely transferred and installed by using the waterproof fabric. The multifunctional water tank is used for efficiently storing and utilizing water in the water tank.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THERMOELECTRIC MODULE USING NON-SYMMETRIC THERMOELECTRIC ELEMENTS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A thermoelectric module is provided to simplify a process and reduce manufacturing cost by implementing the role of an electrode and the role of an adhesive which mechanically connects an insulating substrate and a thermoelectric element. CONSTITUTION: A top and a bottom insulating substrates(110,120) are prepared. An asymmetrically projected protrusion unit(131) is formed in a p-type device and a n-type device. A thermoelectric element(130) is arranged in order to be faced with the protrusion unit of the n-type device and the p-type device. A complex junction layer(140) welds the top and bottom insulating substrate and the thermoelectric element. The complex junction layer provides the moving path(A) of a hole or an electronics.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A PISTON AND CONNECTING ROD CONJUNCTION STRUCTURE FOR A VEHICLE'S ENGINE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A connecting rod connection structure of a piston for a vehicle engine is provided to improve intake efficiency by making a piston stay at a bottom dead point and a top dead point. CONSTITUTION: A connecting rod connection structure of a piston(10) for a vehicle engine comprises the piston, and a connecting rod(20) and a piston pin(30). A connecting rod connection shaft(31) of the piston pin is inserted to a pin hole(21) of the connecting rod. A piston connection sleeve(32) inserted and united in the pin hole of piston is located on both side terminal of the connecting rod connection shaft. The connecting rod connection shaft and the piston connection sleeve are eccentrically connected.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR IMPROVING CERTIFICATION MEANS AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus for improving an authentication method and a method for controlling the same are provided to separately manage payment information in a mobile terminal without transmission of the payment information to a seller, thereby completely eliminating outflow of the payment information. CONSTITUTION: A download unit(111) downloads a total payment program. A memory unit(112) stores at least one primary payment unit list. A display unit(114) displays a selected final payment unit list. An authentication request unit(116) requests authentication to an authentication server.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND APPRATUS FOR ISSUE PROVISIONAL RECOGNITION MERCHANDISE COUPON

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus for issuing a provisional gift certificate and a method thereof are provided to issue a gift certificate provided online in a provisional state. CONSTITUTION: A payment method information input unit(130) inputs at least one payment unit. A gift certificate issuance request information input unit(110) inputs gift certificate issuance request information. A display unit(120) displays available payment unit lists. A transmission unit(140) transmits selected specific payment unit information.

exch:applicant-name.name: KOREA INSTITUTE OF CERAMIC ENGINEERING AND TECHNOLOGY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MANUFACTURING METHOD OF HIGH PURITY TUNGSTEN TRIOXIDE POWDER USING WASTE HARD METAL AND TUNGSTEN TRIOXIDE MANUFACTURED BY THE METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method of manufacturing high purity tungsten trioxide powder and a tungsten trioxide manufactured thereby are provided to insure environment-friendly property by reusing waste sludge or waste cemented hard metal. CONSTITUTION: A method of manufacturing high purity tungsten trioxide powder using waste cemented hard metal comprises the following steps: decarbonizing the waste cemented hard metal including tungsten carbide; crushing the waste cemented hard metal using a milling machine while thermal processing to oxidize the tungsten carbide; selectively removing metallic components contained in the waste cemented hard metal using magnetic separator with magnetic force; and removing a metal or metal oxide contained in the waste cemented hard metal using solubility difference with the tungsten trioxide at an acid solution.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ORGANIC LIGHT EMITTING DISPLAY AND METHOD FOR FABRICATING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An organic light emitting display and a method for fabricating the same are provided to prevent the deterioration of an organic light-emitting layer by blocking out-gassing from a color unit. CONSTITUTION: An organic light emitting display comprises a substrate, an organic light-emitting layer(220), a first electrode(214), a second electrode(222), a color unit(206), and a barrier layer(212). The substrate comprises a red, a green, and a blue sub pixel region. The organic light-emitting layer implements the white. The organic light-emitting layer is interposed between the first electrode and the second electrode. The color unit is formed within the red, the green, and a blue sub pixel region. The color unit generates out-gassing. The barrier layer is formed with a thermosetting property or a photo curable material. The barrier layer isolates the out-gassing.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND APPRATUS FOR ISSUE PROVISIONAL RECOGNITION MERCHANDISE COUPON

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for issuing a provisional gift certificate and an apparatus thereof are provided to eliminate necessity of separate authentication/security tool installation for electronic commerce. CONSTITUTION: At least one primary payment unit list is saved. Gift certificate issuance request information is inputted. An available secondary payment unit list is received from an authentication server(200). The primary payment unit list is compared with the secondary payment unit list. An available final payment unit list is displayed. Gift certificate information is transmitted to a receiver terminal.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SYSTEM FOR DETECTING OPERATING STATUS OF VEHICLE SUPPLIES THROUGH VEHICLE NETWORK AND METHOD OF DETECTING OPERATING STATUS USING THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A system for detecting the operation of vehicle expendables through a vehicle network and a method for detecting the operation of vehicle expendables using the same are provided to enable safe driving by informing a driver of the replacement time of vehicle expendables in case the vehicle expendables do not work properly. CONSTITUTION: A system for detecting the operation of vehicle expendables through a vehicle network comprises sensing modules(110a,110b), a multimedia hub(120), and an output unit(140). The sensing module senses the operation state of the vehicle expendables. The multimedia hub determines the normal operation of the vehicle expendables through the sensing module connected by the vehicle network. In case the vehicle expendables do not work properly, the multimedia hub generates replacement messages of the vehicle expendables. The output unit receives the replacement messages of the vehicle expendables and outputs the messages visually and acoustically.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LOAD WHEEL STRUCTURE FOR OUTSIDE ELECTRODE FORMATION TO CHIP CERAMICS ELECTRON PARTS OF CHANGE POSSIBILITY IS DAMAGE PART

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A load wheel structure is provided to accurately operate the chamfering of an inserting hole by separately forming an inserting part. CONSTITUTION: A load wheel(10) inserts an electronic component into a grip belt. The load wheel is formed to a cone type and forms a preventing plate with a constant height to a center axis of a cylinder of one side. The load wheel forms a plurality of holes to the longitudinal direction of an outer circumference. A groove of polygon is formed in both side walls of the hole. An inserting part(20) is inserted to the longitudinal direction in the hole of the load wheel and forms a plurality of part holes(21) in a surface.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: GRIP BELT STRUCTURE FOR CHIP CERAMICS ELECTRON PARTS TRANSFER CONSIST OF BEARING POWER STRENGTHENING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A grip belt structure for a chip ceramic electronic part which has improved support force is provided to reduce the loss factor of components by inserting the components into home position due to the support force of a belt. CONSTITUTION: A grip belt structure for a chip ceramic electronic part which has improved support force comprises a grip belt(10), and a damping plate(20). The grip belt is made of metal materials. The grip belt is formed in a shape of a thin plate. Holes(11) are formed on the surface of the grip belt in a rectangular shape. The damping plate covers the hole on the surface of the grip belt. The damping plate comprises an insertion part in which an inserting hole(21) for electronic components is formed. The damping plate is made of the rubber materials.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FOUNDATION STRUCTURE AND THE METHOD OF WALL AND CUT OFF WALL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A steel construction structure for a retaining wall body used for the wall formation and the wall formation method using the same are provided to simply and conveniently construct a main wall using the rigidity of the securely installed retaining wall body. CONSTITUTION: A steel construction structure for a retaining wall body used for the wall formation comprises a steel structure(1). The steel structure is used for the retaining wall body construction. The steel structure comprises a board. A hole(h) is formed on the board. A coupling member(2) is inserted to the hole. The coupling member is included or connected in or to a main wall(W).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ANTENNA APPARATUS WITH SOLAR CELL, RADIO REPEATER AND TERMINAL USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An antenna apparatus with a solar cell is provided to prevent the Interference between antennas by selecting the antenna according to propagation environment. CONSTITUTION: An integrated solar cell/ an antenna device comprises a solar cell array(300) and a thin film type antenna(110). The solar cell array comprises a plurality of solar cells. The solar cell array collects the sunlight. The thin film type antenna is formed with a solar cell array to be one body. The device comprises a first support member and the second supporting member which are combined with each other.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NANO SCALE BIO CHIP SCANNER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus for analyzing a biochip is provided to irradiate line-type light with a constant intensity and to reduce fluorescence intensity. CONSTITUTION: A nano scale biochip scanner(100) comprises: a stage(130) for laminating a substrate(120) having the biochip; plural light emitting units(140) which are formed at the stage and outputs line-type light to both sides of the substrate; and a camera placed at the upper portion of the substrate. The light emitting unit comprises: a geometric optic system for forming emitted light; an optical splitter and plural mirrors for dividing the line light to plural paths; and a light emitting device for irradiating line-type light divided from the optical splitter.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: IONIC POLYMER-METAL COMPOSITE AND METHOD OF FABRICATING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An ionic high molecule-metal complex and a method of manufacturing thereof are provided to apply the ionic high molecule-metal complex for manufacturing a soft robotic actuator, an artificial muscle or a dynamic sensor without an electromagnetic wave and heat when operating. CONSTITUTION: An ionic high molecule-metal complex comprises the following: an ionic polymer membrane(510); metal electrodes(540a,540b) facing each other with the ionic polymer membrane in the middle; and nano structures(530a,530b) included in one of the metal electrodes while electrically connected to each other. The ionic polymer membrane contains a fluorocarbon polymer with an ionic group, or a styrene/divinylbenzene system polymer with an ionic group. The ionic group is a sulfonate group or a carboxylate group.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A TIRE REINFORCEMENT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A tire reinforcement plate is provided to extend service life by preventing damage to the outer surface of a tube and the inner surface of a rubber layer. CONSTITUTION: A tire reinforcement plate comprises a cylindrical rubber layer(110), a reinforcement plate(130) and a tube(120). The cylindrical rubber layer is contacted with a road. The tube is formed inside the rubber layer and is filled with air. The reinforcement plate is formed between the rubber layer and the tube. The reinforcement plate corresponds to the rubber layer. The reinforcement plate has a spiral shape.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BURNER AND METHOD FOR COMPLETE COMBUSTION OF LIQUID ORGANIC EFFLUENT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A perfect combustion apparatus of liquid organic waste and a method thereof are provided to improve perfect combustion performance by increasing residence time of high temperature burning combustion gas by generating vortex and smoothly mixing air. CONSTITUTION: A perfect combustion apparatus of liquid organic waste comprises a combustor(100), a re-combustion chamber(200), and a ventilation housing. The combustor is composed of an air inlet pipe(110), an inner and an outer auxiliary pipe(130,120). The combustor comprises a vaporizer(140), a pre-heater(150), a backflow plate(148), and an orifice. A larger diameter portion of a mixing part(145) of the vaporizer and the backflow plate form a first combustion chamber within the inner auxiliary pipe. The re-combustion chamber secondly burns air supplied through the air inlet pipe, combustion gas, and residues. The ventilation housing supplies the air delivered with a ventilation fan to a flow path between the air inlet pipe and the outer auxiliary pipe.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: RECEIVER FOR REDUCING POWER CONSUMPTION, AND DIGITAL BROADCASTING RECEIVE SYSTEM HAVING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A receiver for reducing power consumption and a digital broadcasting receiving system with the same are provided to predict an end point of time based on received data to turn off a receiver at exact timing, thereby minimizing unnecessary power consumption. CONSTITUTION: A receiver for reducing power consumption and a digital broadcasting receiving system with the same include a frame boundary detector(30) and a link controller(25). The frame boundary detector receives a plurality of TS packets and generates a control signal for reducing power spent in a receiver. The link controller controls the operation of the frame boundary detector in response to a control signal.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR REMOTE CONTROLLING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A remote control system and a method for the same are provided to use a mobile communication network, thereby realizing remote control in areas where mobile communication is possible. CONSTITUTION: A control terminal(110) forms a control signal for control of a remote control target. The control terminal transmits the control signal through a mobile communication network. The control terminal performs reception and display of video information through the mobile communication network. A control target terminal(120) perform a control command corresponding to the control signal. The control target terminal forms the video information about the control target. The control target terminal transmits the video information to the control terminal through the mobile communication network.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DETECTOR HARNESS CABLING STRUCTURE OF VIDEO PROCESSING DEVICE FOR MEDICINE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A detector harness cabling structure of an image processing device for a medicine is provided to smoothly operate a detector by lifting a detector harness with the detector. CONSTITUTION: A medical treatment image processing comprises a support stand, an up and down movement unit, and a detector(130). The up and down movement part ascend and descend along the height of the support stand. The detector detects the radiation. The radiation is projected from the irradiator. A detector harness cabling structure comprises a harness guide opening and a pair of guide plates(160). The harness guide opening guides the detector harness(140).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SOLAR PHOTOVOLTAIC GENERATOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A solar photovoltaic generator is provided to limit the circulation of a solar module by installing a safety pin limiting a circulation. CONSTITUTION: A support stand(1) is perpendicularly installed. A solar module(3) is installed on the top of the support stand to be circulated to the top and bottom direction. An altitude control device(4) is provided to circulate the solar module around a rotator(2). A platform(10) is fixed in the lower part of the solar module. A base is fixed in the upper end of the support stand. A safe pin is installed in order to be projected in the base.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A CHAIR FOR AN OPERATION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A chair for an operation is provided to improve surgical operation efficiency by proceeding the operation while maintaining a half-risen posture of a user during a long time, and to reduce a burden from the user. CONSTITUTION: A chair for an operation comprises the following: a waist supporting unit(10) elastically supporting the waist of a user; a hip supporting unit(20) supporting the hip from the back; a thigh supporting unit(30) supporting the thigh from the front; a shin supporting unit(40) supporting the shin from the front; a frame(50) connecting the hip supporting unit, the thigh supporting unit, and the shin supporting unit; and a connection unit(60) installed in one side of the frame while being combined to the side of an operation table. The hip supporting unit is possible to adjust the height. The hip supporting unit, the thigh supporting unit, and the shin supporting unit can be formed in a horizontal rod form.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HIERARCHICAL STRUCTURE AND METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A layered structure and a method for manufacturing the same are provided to minimize or remove after treatment by reducing the size of blocks in the minimum scale area. CONSTITUTION: A layered structure comprises one or more nano objects arranged in a specific pattern. The nano objects have a length of 1~100 nano-meters and are formed in the matrix of the layered structure. The nano object is one of quantum dot, nano sphere, nano particle, nano tube, nano wire, and line pattern.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MULTI-VESICULAR LIPOSOME, THE METHOD PREPARING THEREOF AND THE PHARMACEUTICAL OR COSMETIC COMPOSITION CONTAINING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for preparing a multi-vesicular liposome is provided to quickly release drugs to a specific site and to enable easy and efficient absorption. CONSTITUTION: A method for preparing a multi-vesicular liposome comprises: a step of dissolving one or more biologically active materials and measuring mole osmosis concentration to obtain a first aqueous phase; a step of dissolving a lipid mixture of an acid amphiphilic material in an organic solvent; a step of capsulating the biologically active material to form a water-in-oil emulsion; a step of mixing the water-in-oil emulsion in a second aqueous phase to obtain a W/O/W emulsion or a disperse water-in-oil emulsion in a second aqueous phase; and a step of removing an organic solvent to form a multi-vascular liposome.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COVER SUBSTRATE WITH LAYER OF COMPOSITE OXIDES FOR SOLAR CELL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cover substrate for a solar battery in which composite oxide layers are included is provided to improve a durability of the solar cell module and to improve maximum output amount of a solar cell module by increasing a solar transmittance of the cover substrate and decreasing a reflectivity. CONSTITUTION: A method for manufacturing photocatalyst composition comprises: a step of growing up a titanium dioxide particle using a hydrothermal synthesis reaction after hydrolyzing titanium compound and adding alcohol and acid; a step of improving the dispersibility of titanium dioxide photocatalytic sol through an aqueous synthesis reaction adding the acid after mixing the titanium compound with the with ; a step of obtaining the photocatalytic sol by mixing each product which are obtained through the hydrothermal synthesis reaction and the aqueous synthesis reaction; a step of synthesizing a water soluble binder of a colloidal silica sol; and a step of mixing the photocatalytic sol, the water soluble binder, alcohol and inorganic oxide powder.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: INTERMEDIATE SHAFT ASSEMBLY FOR VEHICLE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An intermediate shaft assembly for vehicles is provided to have stable collision absorbent performance in a vehicle crash by managing sliding power applied between an outer shaft and an inner shaft. CONSTITUTION: An intermediate shaft assembly for vehicles comprises an outer shaft(1), an inner shaft(2), a bushing assembly(3), and a bearing assembly(4). A hole is longitudinally formed in the outer shaft. The inner shaft is inserted into the hole of the outer shaft. The bushing assembly surrounds the inner shaft. The bearing assembly is located between the bushing assembly and the outer shaft. The bearing assembly is contacted with the bushing assembly and the outer shaft.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR ESTIMATING CHANNEL IN A MOBILE COMMUNICATION SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A channel estimating device of a mobile communication system and a method for the same are provided to use MMSE(Minimum Mean Square Error) matrices of compression type in user of MMSE technique, thereby reducing memory capacity and processing time. CONSTITUTION: A first operator(510) changes initial channel estimation values into initial CIR(Channel Impulse Response). An aligner(512) defines sections in the initial CIR to groups. The aligner aligns the groups in descending order of electricity. A processor(514) consecutively revises group CIRs of the groups according to aligned order by compression matrices. A remover(518) generates optimized CIR. A second operator(520) changes the CIR into channel estimation values of frequency domain.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: INTERMEDIATE SHAFT ASSEMBLY FOR VEHICLE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An intermediate shaft assembly for a vehicle is provided to efficiently manage sliding power between an inner shaft and an outer shaft within a design value range by managing the protrusion of a plate. CONSTITUTION: An intermediate shaft assembly for a vehicle comprises an outer shaft(1), an inner shaft(2), a plate(3), and a bearing member(4). A hole is formed longitudinally to the outer shaft. The inner shaft is inserted into the hole of the outer shaft. The plate is contacted with the inner shaft. The bearing member is located between the plate and the outer shaft. The bearing member is contacted with the outer shaft and the plate. The plate comprises a base plate and a protrusion(32) connected to the base plate. The protrusion is formed into a groove formed on the outer wall of the inner shaft.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: RECOMBINANT ADENOVIRUS COMPRISING TISSU-SPECIFIC PROMOTER AND TUMOR-TARGETING TRANS-SPLICING RIBOZYME AND USES THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A recombinant adenovirus containing a trans-splicing ribozyme targeting tissue-specific promoter and a cancer-specific gene is provided to ensure improved treatment efficiency for gene target tissue and to be used as an anticancer drug or a cancer diagnosis agent. CONSTITUTION: A recombinant adenovirus contains: a tissue-specific promoter; a trans-splicing ribozyme which is operably linked to the promoter; and a therapeutic gene linked to a 3'-exon of ribozyme or a reporter gene. A cancer-specific gene is hTERT[human Telomerase Reverse Transcriptase] mRNA[messenger RNA], AFP[alphafetoprotein] mRNA, CEA[carcinoembryonic antigen] mRNA, PSA[Prostate-specific antigen] mRNA, or CKAP2[Cytoskeleton-associated protein 2] mRNA. The ribozyme is a trans-splicing group I ribozyme which specifically targets hTERT mRNA. A pharmaceutical composition for anticancer drugs contains the recombinant adenovirus as an active ingredient. A method for imaging cancer comprises: a step of introducing the recombinant adenovirus to cancer cells; and a step of detecting a reporter protein in the cancer cells.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BATH ADDITIVE COMPOSITION CONTAINING CAPSAICIN

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A bathing composition containing capsaicin is provided to ensure pain-killing effect and decomposition effect and neutralize flavor of capsaicin. CONSTITUTION: A bathing composition contains 0.05-1.0 weight parts of capsaicin and 2-3 weight parts of Cnidium officinale powder based on 100 weight parts of Pyroligneous liquor. The composition further contains 0.2-1.0 weight parts of L-menthol. The Pyroligneous liquor is a Pyroligneous liquor which is matured for two years without impurities and toxin.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DOUGH COMPOSITION FOR CUT NOODLES AND CLEAR SOUP AND METHOD FOR PREPARING THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A dough composition for knife-cut noodles and clear soup and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to maintain chewy texture of the dough composition containing a large quantity of sorghum powder, and to facilitate digestion while protecting a stomach. CONSTITUTION: A dough composition for knife-cut noodles and clear soup includes 70 ~ 100 parts by weight of sorghum powder and 5 ~ 15 parts by weight of glutinous Indian millet meat juice. The composition includes soy cooking oil, grape seed oil and sunflower oil. Dough for the knife-cut noodles is manufactured by mixing wheat flour, the sorghum powder and the glutinous Indian millet meat juice(S4).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SOFT WATER APPARATUS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A water softener is provided to obtain a massage effect during taking a shower by including a pump in the side of an outlet pipe and controlling a discharge pressure of the soft water. CONSTITUTION: A water softener comprises: a hollow housing(100) in which one or more raw water feeding pipe(110) is connected; one or more ion exchange resin part(200) softening raw water which is filled inside the housing and flows in through the raw water feeding pipe; a soft water pipe(300) which is connected to the ion exchange resin part and in which the soft water generated from the ion exchange resin part flows; and one or more pump(400) which are installed on a route of the soft water pipe and control the discharge pressure of the soft water.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: STRUCTURE OF NOZZLE MODULE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: Flow structure of a nozzle module is provided to wash an object on the exterior of the nozzle module by applying ultrasonic energy to cold water with a vibrator, and to improve convenience in usability of a product on which the nozzle module is installed. CONSTITUTION: Flow structure of a nozzle module comprises a cold water pipe(211), a hot water pipe(212), an upper housing, a vibrator(223), and a lower housing(224). The cold water pipe and the hot water pipe are connected in the upper housing. The vibrator is formed on an upper inner side of the upper housing. The vibrator adds ultrasonic energy to cold water. The lower housing sprays lukewarm water to the outside.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR ATTACHING AND DETACHING OF FILTER FOR ULTRASONIC WAVE CLEANER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus for detaching a filter of an ultrasonic cleaner is provided to automatically separate a filter cartridge from a cartridge separation part by operating a control part and a stepping motor, and to prevent water leakage. CONSTITUTION: An apparatus for detaching a filter of an ultrasonic cleaner comprises a filter cartridge(100), a cartridge detaching part(200), a cartridge receiving part, a stepping motor, and a control part. A gear is formed on a side of the filter cartridge. The stepping motor supplies power to a motor gear. The motor gear is rotated to separate the filter cartridge from the cartridge detaching part. The control part operates the stepping motor when the fixed time passes by.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CONDENSING BOILER HAVING A FUNCTION OF COMPUTING AND DISPLAYING A QUANTITY OF ENERGY SAVING AND METHOD OF COMPUTING AND DISPLAYING A QUANTITY OF ENERGY SAVING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A condensing boiler having a function of computing and displaying is provided to let a user to easily understand the benefit of a condensing boiler by visually displaying the amount of saved energy, fuel amount, and the fuel cost. CONSTITUTION: A condensing boiler having a function of computing and displaying comprises following steps. The amount of condensate is measured. The condensate is created by the condensation of steam included in exhaust gas. The amount of the saved is calculated by a controller(50). The energy is produced by the calorie emitted by the condensation of the steam corresponding to amount of the condensate. The controller displays the amount of the saved energy through a display unit(51).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PROBE SCRUBBER FOR PROBE CARD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A probe scrubber for a probe card is provided to improve removal efficiency of a foreign material attached to a probe by conveniently exchanging a pad member according to the change of the probe card type. CONSTITUTION: A cleaning unit(130) eliminates a foreign material. A lifting unit(120) shuttles the cleaning unit to the upward/downward direction. A circulating part(140) is located between the cleaning unit and the lifting unit and rotates the cleaning unit. The cleaning unit comprises the plate(131) of a rectangular shape, a pad member(132) attached to the upper and the lower side of the plate. The pad member with different materials is attached to both sides of the plate.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A BROOM HAVING A SUPPORT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A broom equipped with a supporting unit is provided to prevent teeth of the broom formed with thick fibers attached in the bottom from bending, and to facilitate sweeping operation by preventing garbage from slipping out. CONSTITUTION: A broom comprises the following: a handle(11) located in the uppermost side of the broom to grip with a hand when sweeping; teeth of the broom(13) moving garbage while sweeping; a body(12) in which one side of the body is connected to the upper side of the teeth of the broom, and the other side is connected to the lower side of the handle; and an inner supporting unit(14) combined with the lower side of the body while laid under the teeth of the broom to across the body from one side to the other side to prevent the garbage from slipping out. The body additionally comprises an insertion groove to insert the inner supporting unit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HARD CAPSULE THE CONTENTS RECLAIMER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A hard capsule content getter is provided to collect 99% of contents by revolving 180° a lower part capsule and separating the content in other route using a lungs capsule. CONSTITUTION: A capsule supplied to an auxiliary body(21) along a capsule guide plate(10) is supplied in a location(30) through a capsule feeding apparatus(20) and returns to original position after a supply. A regulatory body(39) of capsule height is adjusted in advance according to a type of capsule. Top and bottom capsule hold(32)(41) move the capsule to a location in which the capsule is held and the capsule is caught tightly. A bottom body(40) moves to the bottom and capsule is separated when the capsule is held. The capsule hold puts the empty capsule when the contents are discharged and a capsule collecting tray(70) revolves.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ATMOSPHERIC PLASMA GENERATOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An atmospheric plasma generator is provided to enhance the uniform division of the second gas and mixing of the second gas and reactive particles by comprising a separate flow path in the second gas region. CONSTITUTION: Electrode portions(102, 104, 106, 108) generate the plasma by applying a high frequency voltage in a first gas. The electrode portion is arranged in parallel to a flow of the first gas flowing in into the plasma region for the plasma production. The electrode portion comprises an electrode for applying the high frequency voltage and an electrode for applying ground voltage. An electrode for applying the high frequency voltage and an electrode for applying ground voltage are arranged alternately. Second gas service pipes(130a, 130b, 130c) supply the second gas for reacting with chemical species.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SENSOR CONNECTOR OF AIR CONDITIONER FOR AUTOMOTIVE VEHICLES

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A sensor connector for an automotive air conditioner is provided to facilitate the first insertion of the aspiration hose into a sensor connector. CONSTITUTION: A sensor connector for an automotive air conditioner comprises an in-car sensor(52), a through-pipe(54), a declined part(72), and a tension hook part(74). The in-car sensor detects the temperature of the indoor air. The through-pipe is coupled with the aspiration hose. The aspiration hose inhales indoor air to pass through the in-car sensor. The declined part is connected to the hose connection part of the through-pipe. The diameter of the declined part is reduced along the insertion direction of the aspiration hose. The tension hook part is formed in the declined part. The aspiration hose hangs on the tension hook part.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FREE INK TYPE BALLPOINT PEN REFILL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A free ink type ballpoint pen refill is provided to evenly mix an ink composite using a mixing member when an coloring agent including metallic or the titanium oxide with a heavy specific gravity is precipitated. CONSTITUTION: A free ink type ballpoint pen refill comprises: an ink storage pipe; a writing tip(16) which is combined on tip-end part of the ink storage pipe and in which a ball is rotatably assembled; an ink composite(20) saved inside the ink storage pipe; and an ink follower(22) which blocks a rear part of the ink storage pipe and moves to the writing tip side as storage quantity of the ink composite diminishes. A viscosity of the ink composite is 5~1000mPa.s(B type Viscometer, and 20°C) and a stirring member(30) is installed inside of the ink composite.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PREPARATION METHOD OF YELLOWISH SAPPHIRE BY ELECTRON BEAM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method of preparing a yellow sapphire by radiating an electron beam through a colorless sapphire is provided to obtain a yellow sapphire with consistent colors and without any damage to the crystal. CONSTITUTION: A method of preparing a yellow sapphire comprises a process of radiating an electron beam through a colorless sapphire. The process of radiating the electron beam comprises the following steps: measuring the size of the selected colorless sapphire; selecting the energy range of the electron beam corresponding to the size of the colorless sapphire; deciding the dose of the electron beam using a color development rate to obtain the yellow sapphire; and radiating the electron beam with the energy range and the dose previously selected. The electron beam is radiated in an energy range of 2~10 megavolt and a dose of ten trillion~one quintillion electrons per centimeter.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: WAFER LEVEL CAMERA MODULE AND MANUFACTURING METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A wafer level camera module and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to facilitate focus adjustment between an image sensor and a lens and use a wafer lens with a different focus distance, thereby improving yield. CONSTITUTION: A wafer level camera module and a manufacturing method thereof include a wafer(101), a bonding unit(130), a transparent member(102), a wafer lens(120), and a spacer(121). On the wafer, an image sensor(103) is mounted. The bonding unit is applied so that the height of the bonding unit can be adjusted. The transparent member is welded on the wafer through the bonding unit so that the image sensor is sealed up. The wafer lens is settled on the upper part of the transparent member. The spacer is on the transparent member and wafer lens so that the wafer lens is settled at a fixed interval.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DOOR OF AIR CONDITIONING SYSTEM FOR AUTOMOTIVE VEHICLES

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A door of an automotive air-conditioning system is provided to closely attach a mold and a combination part of a rotary shaft by surface-contacting a mold for injecting a sealing member and the combination part of the rotary shaft. CONSTITUTION: A door of an automotive air-conditioning system comprises a sealing member(8). The door is pivotally installed around a rotary shaft(7) on an air path of the case for an air conditioner. The sealing member is injected to a part(7a) of the rotary shaft and blocks a gap between the rotary shafts of the door. Planes(20) are formed on a peripheral part of the rotary shaft when the sealing member is injected and a mold is coupled with the peripheral part.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LABELING MACHINE WITH A LABEL PRESSING DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A labeling device with a label compressor is provided to compress a label on a container and prevent a container from being rotated on the labeling device. CONSTITUTION: A labeling device with a label compressor comprises a transferring device(31), a label attaching device(32), and a label compressor. The transferring device comprises upper and lower conveyor belts(311,312). The upper and the lower conveyor belt forms a container arrangement space to accept the container. The upper and the lower end of the container are contacted by the upper and the lower conveyor belt. The label attaching device attaches the labels to the container on the transferring device. The label compressor is positioned on the lower part of the label attaching device.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR VERIFICATION OF CHANNEL QUALITY INFORMATION AND BASE STATION SUPPORTING THE METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A verification method of channel quality information and a base station which supports the method are provided to selectively apply reliable CGI among received CGIs, thereby improving entire data transmission efficiency of a system. CONSTITUTION: In CQI(channel quality information), service supporting of a base station and a terminal is confirmed according to confirmation result of information type. If the base station and terminal supports service according to the information type, whether the CGI satisfies CGI regulation according to characteristic of the information type is confirmed(S740,S750). If the CQI satisfies the CQI regulation, the CQI is applied to a system(S780). If the CQI does not satisfies the CQI regulation, the CQI is discarded(S790).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ILLUMINATION APPARATUS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An illumination apparatus is provided to prevent flicker of a lighting by including a plurality of light emitting diodes. CONSTITUTION: A lighting device comprises a case(100), a light emitting diode module, an electrical connector member, and a driving unit. The case comprises a receiving unit. A plurality of light emitting diode modules are arranged in the receiving unit. The electrical connector member electrically interlinks a plurality of light emitting diode modules each other. The driving unit applies the driving voltage to the light emitting diode module.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HEMICARCERAND COMPOUND CAPABLE OF MOLECULAR STORAGE AND SEPARATION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A hemicarcerand compound is provided to use tetrathiahemicarcerand as an environmental pollutant remover, molecule reactor, molecule reservoir, and molecule information reservoir by applying guest selectivity and carcerand isomerism. CONSTITUTION: A hemicarcerand compound has a structure represented by chemical formula 1. In chemical formula 1, R and R' are independently selected from a group consisting of a linear or branched (C1-C20) alkyl group, a linear or branched (C1-C20) alkoxy group, a linear or branched (C1-C20) an alkoxy (C1-C5) alkyl group, an (C6-C12) aryl (C1-C20) alkyl group, an (C1-C12) alkylthio (C1-C20) alkyl group, an (C6-C12) arylthio (C1-C20) alkyl group, an (C6-C12) aryl group, a hydroxyl (C1-C20) alkyl group, a carboxyl group, a carboxy (C1-C20) alkyl group, an amino (C1-C20) alkyl group, and a mercapto (C1-C20) alkyl group; and X is selected from a group consisting of hydrogen, a linear or branched (C1-C7) alkyl group, a hydroxyl (C1-C20) alkyl group and a carboxy (C1-C20) alkyl group.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THE NON-TOXIC FLAME REFARDANT WHICH USES THE INORGANIC COMPOUND

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A non-toxic flame retardant is provided to maximize product quality due to an improved adhesive force and fire retardancy, to improve the safety, corrosion resistance, and heat resistance of a flame retardant coating agent. CONSTITUTION: A non-toxic flame retardant using an inorganic compound is prepared by the steps of: pulverizing inorganic compounds based on magnesium oxide, zinc oxide, titanium oxide, aluminum oxide, silicon oxide, ammonium hydroxide, magnesium hydroxide, and inorganic phosphate to fine particles less than 15~20 nm; mixing the inorganic compound 40~65 wt% with aqueous and oily coating agents, stirring the mixture for 60 minutes, and then naturally aging the mixture for 2~5 days; stirring the naturally aged inorganic flame retardant particles and a coating agent two times at a high velocity and a low velocity in a ratio of 1:2, respectively; aging the stirred inorganic flame retardant coating agent at 45~55 °C for 20 hours at a low velocity; and aging the aged inorganic flame retardant coating agent at 15~20 °C for 5~30 days.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LED PACKAGE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An LED package is provided to prevent generation of a void by discharging an encapsulating material to the outside of a package mold through an exhausting part formed between the main part of a lens settling part and a lens. CONSTITUTION: A package mold(120) stores the part of a lead frame(110) inside and forms a molding material injection space(123). A lens settling part(125) is formed into a concavo-convex part inside the package mold of the upper part of the molding material injection space. An LED chip(130) is mounted in the lead frame inside the package mold. An exhausting part(127) is formed by separating the main part of the lens settling part from the lens. A sealing agent is arranged between the bottom surface of the lens and the package mold.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ANTI-MICROBIAL LAYER A CLOTHES HANGER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An anti-microbial hanger is provided to maintain a good feeling of wearing of clothes after hanging it in the inside of a wardrobe for a long time, and to prevent the clothes from getting moldy. CONSTITUTION: An anti-microbial hanger is formed to put an anti-microbial substance in a case to combine with a hanger. The hanger comprises the following: an upper garment hanger(100) including a ring(10) to hang clothes on a line, an aromatic net(30) combined with the lower side of the ring, a cover(40) in a curved form to combine with the aromatic net, and a fixture(41) in the inside of the cover; a case loop(52) combined with the fixture of the upper garment hanger; a case(50) connected to the case loop; and the anti-microbial substance(60) in the inside of the case.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MECHANISM THAT HAVE INTERRUPT FUNCTION OF LORD-BREAK SWITCH

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A mechanism that have an interrupt function of a load break switch is provided to prevent a trouble due to a short circuit by preventing a ground switch from being inserted into a main switch. CONSTITUTION: An integrated mechanism comprises an operating module. The operating module comprises a first manipulation unit(400) and a second manipulation unit(600). The first manipulation unit open and closes a main switch. A second muddle opens and closes a ground switch. One of the first and the second manipulation unit is interlinked with a stopper(700). The other manipulation unit and the stopper includes a limiting unit(900). The first and second manipulation unit are limited operated at the same time.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DISPLAY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A display is provided to improve the transmission efficiency in transmitting a signal of multi-level and implement a timing controller by driving a current in a push and pull type. CONSTITUTION: A display includes a timing controller(100), a data driver(300), and a first and a second terminating resistor. The timing controller transmits a transmission signal with a differential type and drives the current of a full type. A data driver restores data from the transmission signal. The first and the second terminating resistor are between terminating terminal of transmission signals and a data driver.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FEED FORWARD TYPE ELIMINATOR OF THE PHASE NOISE IN THE PORTABLE TERMINAL AND METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A phase noise cancellation apparatus of a portable terminal using feed forward type and a method for the same are provided to separate phase noise signals generated by high power transmission signals, thereby preventing reception sensitivity degradation of digital TV broadcasting. CONSTITUTION: A portable terminal includes a GSM(Global System for Mobile Communications) signal processing block(100), a phase noise cancellation apparatus(200), and a DVB-H receiver(300) of a DVB-H(Digital Video Broadcasting-Handheld) signal processing block. A first RF(Radio Frequency) transmission unit transmits a first RF transmission signal through a first antenna. A phase noise detection unit(210) detects phase noise by input and output signals of a power amplifier in a first RF transmitter. A phase noise cancellation unit(220) combines the phase noise with a first RF transmission signal of the power amplifier. The phase noise cancellation unit cancels the phase noise in the first RF transmission signal.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MANUAL TRANSMISSION FOR CAR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A manual transmission for a car is provided to improve assemble by suppressing the axial direction movement of a driven gear and simplifying an assembling structure of a driven gear. CONSTITUTION: A needle bearing is axis-installed in an output shaft(10) of a manual transmission. The driven gear is installed at the outside the needle bearing. A fixing member holds the driven gear. A washer member(5) is inserted into a recess which is formed on the outer circumference of an output shaft. A ring(7) is installed at the outside of the washer member.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FRONT-WHEEL DRIVE MANUAL TRANSMISSION FOR CAR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A front drive manual transmission for a vehicle is provided to remove noise by removing a drive gear for detecting vehicle speed from a differential case. CONSTITUTION: A front drive manual transmission for a vehicle comprises a principal shaft, a gear part, a constant velocity joint, and a differential case(2). The generating power of an engine is delivered to the principal shaft. The gear is connected to the principal shaft. The constant velocity joint transfers the generating power of the principal shaft to the tire of a vehicle. The differential case is installed outside the principal shaft and the gear. A drive gear for detecting vehicle speed is removed from the differential case.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ROLL PRINTING METHOD AND COLOR FILTER MANUFACTURED THEREBY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A roll printing method and a color filter which is manufactured using the same are provided to reduce processing time and manufacturing costs when roll printing by cleaning a printing board, which penetrates all printing rolls, only once instead of cleaning the printing board, which penetrates each printing roll, many times. CONSTITUTION: A roll printing method comprises the following steps: a step of transferring the coating material of a first printing roll to a pattern unit of a printing board as the printing board penetrates and contacts with the first printing roll; a step of forming a first pattern through the transfer of coating material pattern which remains in the first printing roll into a board; a step of moving the location of the printing board after a first pattern forming step; and a step of Repeating all previous steps while successively forming patterns of printing rolls(2,3,4).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: STAPLER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A stapler is provided to conveniently remove staples which fix plural papers by easily breaking staples by forming one or more cut grooves on the staple. CONSTITUTION: A stapler comprises a magazine part(100), a handle part(200), a cut groove forming part, and a base(400). The magazine part is charged with staples(10). The staple has a connecting bar and a pair of bent needles. The tie bar is integrated with the upper end of the bent needles. The handle part has a driver plate(210). The driver plate extrudes staples inside the magazine part. The handle part is coupled with or separated from the magazine part. The cut groove forming part forms one or more cut grooves on the staples. The base has a bent groove(410).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: POT FOR HEAT TREATMENT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A pot for heat treatment is provided to double the service life with the original shape by minimizing the deformation even in a long time use. CONSTITUTION: A pot for heat treatment comprises a pot bottom(19) and a pot sidewall(17). The pot bottom is manufactured separately from the pot sidewall and supported by contacts a support brick(9) by contacting the support brick provided in a furnace. The pot sidewall forms a skirt(21) by being extended surrounding the pot bottom. A noncombustible seal(27) of ring shape is placed in the inner edge where the pot bottom and the pot sidewall meet each other. An angle(23) is covered outside the noncombustible seal and fixed to the pot bottom in order to keep the noncombustible seal pressed onto the pot sidewall and the pot bottom.

exch:applicant-name.name: PUSAN NAT UNIV IND COOP FOUND
PUSAN NATIONAL UNIVERSITY INDUSTRY-UNIVERSITY COOPERATION FOUNDATION

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COLOR TRANSFORMATION SYSTEM FOR VECTOR IMAGE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An automatic color converting system based on a vector graphic is provided to automatically convert a color into a color suitable for a corresponding background image in a work that a character is drawn on various selectable background images. CONSTITUTION: An automatic color converting system based on a vector graphic comprises a format interpreter, a color extractor, a scene DB, a conversion matrix DB, a conversion matrix extractor, a color converter, a format generator, and a graphic engine. The format interpreter classifies an inputted vector image by an object with a color attribute. The color extractor extracts color data corresponding to each object from the classified objects in the format interpreter. The scene DB comprises lots of different background images and a reference image made by reference light.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD OF CONTROLLING A SEMICONDUCTOR PROCESS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A semiconductor process control method is provided to accurately measure CD(Critical Dimension) of a pattern within a short time by appropriately using an OCD(Optical Critical Dimension) measuring instrument and an in-line-SEM equipment. CONSTITUTION: The critical dimension of films formed on wafers is measured by using a OCD equipment(ST102). The optical characteristic of the films is adjusted if the average critical dimension of the films is not in a predetermined normal range(ST104). The average critical dimension of the patterns on the wafers is measured by a critical dimension measuring instrument(ST108). The real critical dimensions of the wafers is measured by using the in-line-SEM equipment by a progress unit(ST112). The average critical dimension is corrected based on the real critical dimensions(ST116).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A WINDOW FRAME FOR VENTLIATING SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An upper end frame combine used ventilation device of a window frame is provided to be easily disassembled when a plate glass is replaced due to broken. CONSTITUTION: An upper end frame combine used ventilation device of a window frame comprises a glass fixing member(6) and an opening and closing drive unit(30). The glass fixing member controls a fixing member which fixes and protects a plate glass. The opening and closing drive unit is laid under an accommodating groove of a side cover bundle(20). The opening and closing drive unit controls the inflow of outside air by compulsorily rotating an opening and closing flip(15).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SWEEPING APPARATUS FOR ROAD CLEANING VEHICLE HAVING LOCKING CYLINDER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cleaning device for a road cleaning vehicle is provided to improve workability for steadily keeping ascent and descent of the locking cylinder and to reduce the manufacturing cost. CONSTITUTION: A cleaning device for a road cleaning vehicle comprises a cylinder brush(100), a side brush(200), a suction mouth(300), a supporting frame(310) and a suction mouth locking cylinder(350). The cylinder brush and a side brush are mounted on car body frame(1) to rotate. The suction mouth is mounted close to the rear end of the side brush and intakes garbage on the road. The supporting frame is installed to be ascended and descended to the car body frame. The suction mouth is fixed on the supporting frame. The suction mouth locking cylinder locks and unlocks a piston which is sliding within a cylinder(C) when the supporting frame is ascended and descended.

exch:applicant-name.name: KOREA UNIVERSITY RESEARCH AND BUSINESS FOUNDATION

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COMPOSITION FOR TREATING ATOPIC DERMATITIS COMPRISING TAXIFOLIN 3-O-β-D-GLUCOPYRANOSIDE ISOLATED FROM THE EXTRACT OF THE ROOTS OF RHODODENDRON MUCRONULATUM AS AN ACTIVE INGREDIENT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A composition containing Taxifolin 3-O-β-DGlucopyranoside for treating atopic dermatitis is provided to suppress COX-2(cyclooxygenase-2) and iNOS(inducible Nitric Oxide Synthase) and to reduce eosinophile and IL-4, 5, and 13 level. CONSTITUTION: A pharmaceutical composition for preventing or treating atopic dermatitis contains Taxifolin 3-O-β-DGlucopyranoside of chemical formula 1 and a pharmaceutically acceptable carrier. The Taxifolin 3-O-β-DGlucopyranoside is isolated from Rhododendron mucronulatum roots. The composition is used in the form of a powder, gel, ointment, cream, liquid, or aerosol. A cosmetic composition for relieving atopic dermatitis contains Taxifolin 3-O-β-DGlucopyranoside of chemical formula 1 and a cosmetically acceptable carrier. The composition is used in the form of a paste, gel, cream, gel, lotion, powder, soap, surfactant-containing cleansing oil, wax foundation, or spray.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HIGH-PERFORMANCE FLOOR MORTAR COMPOSITION USING THE PLASTICIZER COMPOUND AND MANUFACTURING METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A mortar composition for a high-performance floor and a method of manufacturing thereof are provided to improve mobility and intensity of the mortar composition by reducing work unit quantity for 20%, and to prevent the mortar composition from cracking. CONSTITUTION: A mortar composition for a high-performance floor is consisted with 15~25wt% of cement, 65~80wt%of sand, 2~6wt% of fly ash, 1~5wt% of powder slag, 1~5wt% of crack reduction material, and 0.25~0.8% of admixture. The admixture is a plasticizer compound composed with 70~90wt% of inorganic binder, and 10~30wt% of superplasticizer. The inorganic binder is selected from the group consisting of limestone and silica.

PURPOSE: A composite steel pipe and a non-excavation type pipe laying method using the same are provided to reduce the internal coat cost of a complex steel pipe by installing an inner protective cover and then, installing a horizontal bracing ring and a vertical support. CONSTITUTION: A composite steel pipe comprises barrel steel pipes(9,9'), a buffer material for adhesion(13), an outer lining material(15), an inner protective cover for temporary installation(23), an inner horizontal racing ring(29) for temporary installation, an inner vertical support for temporary installation(31), a shock-absorbing sheet(19) for a joint part, and a lining sheet(21) for a joint part. The inner protective cover is installed inside a steel pipe. The inner horizontal racing ring for temporary installation is installed inside the inner surface protective cover at fixed intervals. The inner vertical support for the temporary installation is installed at fixed intervals on the inner horizontal racing ring for temporary installation. The shock-absorbing sheet is installed on the exterior of both joint parts.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AIR CURTAIN WITH PROTECTING AND FILTERING FILM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An air curtain equipped with a shelter filtration membrane is provided to seclude inflow of a floating foreign substance and pest by mounting a structure of the shelter filtration membrane in which antiseptic solution is transferred to one-way while absorbed on the surface through a film transport unit on the air curtain. CONSTITUTION: An air curtain equipped with a shelter filtration membrane comprises: a main body(10) which is mounted on the upper side of a building gateway and forms an inner flow path by including an inlet(11) and an outlet; a liquid tank combined with the bottom side of the main body; a shelter filtration membrane(200) which is mounted on the liquid tank and in which an antiseptic solution is transferred to the upper side of the inlet while absorbed on the surface; and a film transport unit(300) which transfers the shelter filtration membrane to one-way and in which one side is installed on the upper side of the inlet and the other side is installed on the liquid tank.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: RECHARGEABLE DRAWER FOR PORTABLE DIGITAL DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A rechargeable drawer for a portable digital device is provided to prevent a charging device and a charging code from being left alone by keeping a portable digital apparatus inside a drawer. CONSTITUTION: A portable charge receipt box comprises a case(1), a drawer(2), and a charger circuit(10). The drawer is received into the case. The charger circuit is installed inside the drawer. A power line(9) is expanded to the outside of the case. At least one of charger terminal apparatuses(21,22,23) is leaded into the drawer. Portable digital apparatuses(5,6,7) are connected to a charger terminal.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CHILD GROWTH MAT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A child growth stimulating mat using a physical or an electric stimulus is provided to insure an effective growth of a child compared to conventional methods including a dietary therapy by stimulating growth points of the child while lying on the mat.
