CONSTITUTION: A child growth stimulating mat comprises the following: a mat(10) marked with a body shape(20) of a child on the upper side(11); stimulators(14,15,16) separately located at growth points including knees(21), a waist(22), elbows(23), ankles(24), wrists(25), or shoulders(26); and a controller(12) included in one side of the mat or a separate body to control an electric power supply or an operation of the stimulators. The stimulators comprises a heating unit heating the growth points, a vibration unit giving a mechanical vibration, or a low frequency electrode unit giving a low frequency electric current.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FLASH MEMORY DEVICE OF VERTICAL STRUCTURE AND METHOD FOR FABRICATING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A flash memory device with a vertical structure and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to improve the degree of integration without the reduction of the feature size of a device by increasing the number of bits saved in each unit element by dividing a charge trap layer into two or more regions. CONSTITUTION: A first select transistor is formed on a substrate(400). An insulating layer(450) and a conductive layer(460) are by turns repeatedly laminated on the outcome of the substrate in which the first select transistor is formed. A through hole exposing a channel region(440) of the first select transistor by passing through the insulating layer and the conductive layer is formed. A blocking layer and a charge trap layer(480a) are formed in the inner wall of the through hole. The charge trap layer is divided into two or more regions. A tunneling layer(490) is formed in the inner wall of the through hole in which the charge trap layer is formed. A channel region(500) of the cell transistor is formed by filling the through hole to a semiconductor layer. A second select transistor is formed on the cell stack.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PHOTO MASK HAVING PELICLE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A photomask is provided to prevent a growing foreign material on a substrate surface from being generated by secluding a particle attached to the surface of a mask pattern. CONSTITUTION: A substrate(100) comprises a mask pattern(110). A pelicle layer(120) is arranged on the upper side of the substrate to be separated with an uniform interval and protects the mask pattern. A frame(130) is attached to the upper side with the photomask and supports the pellicle layer. An organic compound control filter(140) is formed to be separated with the pellicle layer and the substrate with an uniform interval. The organic compound control filter prevents the mask pattern from being contaminated by an organic chemical compound penetrating inside after passing through the pellicle layer. The organic compound control filter is installed to be opened or closed to the direction of up and down or right and left.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: VENDING MACHINE AND CONTROL METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A vending machine for a hangover settlement drink is provided to automatically discharge a hangover settlement drink in the vending machine by measuring alcohol index in a drunkometer. CONSTITUTION: The main body(200) of a drunkometer is inserted into an installation space. A vending machine body(100) forms a coin slot(110) and a paper money slot(112) in the upper part. The vending machine body forms a drink discharging unit discharging a hangover settlement drink and a coin outlet discharging a change in the lower part. The vending machine body forms an advertisement unit(120) in the front side.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR RETURNING ROBOT TO CHARGING STATION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A system for returning a robot to a charging stand and a method thereof are provided to correctly find the charging stand by making the robot rotate and move in a uniform distance when the robot detects a preset boundary. CONSTITUTION: A system(100) for returning a robot to a charging stand comprises a signal detecting part(110) and a robot movement part(120). The signal detecting part detects a region signal. When the robot movement part detects one or more radiation regions among a plurality of radiation regions, the robot is continuously moved. When the robot movement part detects a boundary between a preset radiation region and a separated region, the robot is rotated towards the charging stand.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MOBILE-TERMINAL FOR PROVIDING VARIATION OF IN-OUT DOOR POSITION AND METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A mobile terminal for providing internal/external location change information and a method thereof are provided to offer the internal/external location change information by event information change in real time, thereby offering suitable service to users. CONSTITUTION: An internal/external location decider(120) analyzes a GPS signal of a GPS(Global Positioning System) receiver(110). The interior/exterior location decider decides current location of a portable terminal. If interior/exterior location of the portable terminal is changed, a location change sensor(130) outputs a corresponding event signal, event information includes interior/exterior location change information of the portable terminal. According to the event signal, the location information transmitter(170) transmits the event information to a preset terminal(200) through a communication network.

exch:applicant-name.name: SUNGKYUNKWAN UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION FOR CORPORATE COLLABORATION

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD OF UTILIZING USER-USER INFORMATION ELEMENT AND HAND-HELD TERMINAL PERFORMING THE METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for utilizing a user-user information element and a portable terminal for the same are provided to enable a caller to transmit a message to a caller without caller information setting and additional channel setting. CONSTITUTION: A calling terminal inserts a message of a caller into a user-user information element(S503). The calling mobile transmits the user-user information element in a receiving terminal(S505). The receiving terminal receives the user-user information element. The receiving terminal extracts the message of the caller from the user-user information element (S506). The receiving terminal changes contents of the user-user information element to a phone book data form. The receiving terminal stores the message(S510).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PORTABLE TERMINAL AND METHOD FOR DISPLAYING AND IMFORMATION IN THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A portable terminal and a method for displaying and information in the same are provided to implement grouping designation by dragging a closed loop on a pointing device. CONSTITUTION: An input display unit(710) includes a pointing device that indicates receiver items in thumbnail format, and a user is able to indicate a user by pointing a desirable object. When the user performs a dragging operation in closed loop format within a desirable range in the input display unit, a control unit(720) designates as one group a receiver item included in the closed loop. According to the indication from a user, a memory unit(730) stores the grouping result.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PORTABLE TERMINAL AND VIBRATION DELIVERY METHOD IN IT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A portable terminal and a vibration delivery method for the same are provided to realize sensing delivery by touching, thereby improving emotional satisfaction of a user. CONSTITUTION: According to indication of a user, a calling terminal writes out a vibration pattern sentence(S110). The vibration pattern sentence is transmitted from the calling terminal to a receiving terminal. The receiving terminal stores the vibration pattern sentence in an inside storage unit(S140). A user of the receiving terminal inputs play indication of the vibration pattern sentence to the receiving terminal(S160). The receiving terminal generates a vibration pattern according to the vibration pattern sentence(S180).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SYSTEM FOR SERCHING MUSIC CONTENTS AND METHOD THEREFOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A system for searching music contents and a method thereof are provided to display on a screen the contents related to a music-concerned search keyword. CONSTITUTION: When a keyword is received through a communication network(100), a search server(10) searches and outputs a website-concerned information related to the keyword. A content providing server(20) communicates with the search server through a communication network. The content providing server outputs music-concerned contents corresponding to the inputted keyword when the music-concerned keyword is inputted. The search server judges whether or not the received keyword is related to music. The music-concerned contents include the information about the position on which the music-concerned contents are displayed.

exch:applicant-name.name: AJOU UNIV IND ACAD COOP FOUND

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: UBIQUITOUS MONITORING SYSTEM CAPABLE OF PERFORMING INTEGRAL MONITORING FOR SMART OBJECTS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A ubiquitous monitoring system capable of performing integral monitoring for smart objects is provided to perform integrated monitoring about various smart objects of ubiquitous space by inferring function information, performance information, or status information of each smart object and ubiquitous service. CONSTITUTION: One or more monitoring agents(120_1~120_n) perform reception and transmission of sensing data of sensing nodes. A monitoring module(140) collects sensing data from one or more monitoring agents. An analysis module(150) infers function information, performance information, or status information of each smart object. The analysis module infers function information, performance information, or status information about ubiquitous service. A monitoring viewer(180) displays the inference result to a user.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: UNIFICATION OF EARPHONEJACK AND USBJACK BY MP3 FIRMWARE SETTING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A unified device of an earphone jack and a USB jack are provided to reduce manufacturing costs by forming an earphone jack and a USB jack in a body. CONSTITUTION: A CPU controls two ICs by outputting a turn-on/off command to ICs by firmware setting. The CPU can block a signal to a USB. The CPU can also block a signal to an earphone jack. The switching mechanism is executed by firmware setting. As a result, a user can use a jack as a USB jack or an earphone jack.

exch:applicant-name.name: KOREA INSTITUTE OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR ENHANCING THE DETECTION SENSITIVITY OF CAPILLARY ELECTROPHORESIS USING IMPROVED SAMPLE INJECTION MODE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for improving the detection sensitivity of capillary electrophoresis is provided to control the width and concentration of a sample and to improve detection sensitivity. CONSTITUTION: A method for improving the detection sensitivity of capillary electrophoresis comprises: a step of injecting a running buffer to a capillary(step 1); a step of injecting pH 11.0-13.0 to form a base area(step 2); a step of injecting a sample to be measured(step 3); a step of re-injecting the running buffer of step 1(step 4); and a step of detecting a sample stacked through steps 1 to 4(step 5). The running buffer of step 1 is an organic acid such as formic acid. The base of step 2 is a base such as ammonium hydroxide. The sample is a sample of which a charge amount changes based on the pH of a solvent.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR DECOMPOSITION OF PFCS GAS USING GLIDING ARC DISCHARGE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus for decomposing perfluoro compound gas using a gliding arc discharge is provided to more effectively process the perfluoro compound gas when the apparatus is used in a semiconductor and display process by processing much amount of fluid per a unit time. CONSTITUTION: An apparatus for decomposing perfluoro compound gas using a gliding arc discharge comprises: a barrel-type reactor(1) in which an exhaust pipe is included on the top; an electrode portion(3) in which two blade shaped electrodes of a stainless steel alloy(SUS) material are installed inside of the reactor in 2~3 mm interval; a pulse AC power source(4) which is installed on the outer part of the reactor and induces the gliding arc by supplying the electricity to the electrode portion; a mixer(5) which mixes the perfluoro compound gas and diluted gas and supplies the mixture between the electrode portion and inner part of the reactor; and a storage unit(7) of the perfluoro compound gas and the diluted gas.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SHOCK-ABSORBING MEMBER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A shock-absorbing member including grooves is provided to apply to products that need to be contacted with human body, and to effectively reduce an impact of the human body when using the products. CONSTITUTION: A shock-absorbing member formed with an elastic material comprises the following: a main body(10) with a honeycomb structure including grooves(15) continuously arranged to length and a breadth direction; and a sealer blocking the flowing in and flowing out of air through openings of each groove by sealing the grooves. The bottom(16) of the groove is in a dome shape. The sealer includes a sealing sheet(22) attached to the main body to seal the openings of each groove.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CRUSHER FOR EXCAVATOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A crusher for excavator is provided to prevent abrasion of a roll bearing and the noise between a driving body and the roll bearing. CONSTITUTION: A crusher for excavator comprises a body(100), a fastening plate(110), and a cam housing(120), a drive unit, a driving body(170), a crushing unit(180), a vibration absorption unit and a drive guide unit. The fastening plate connects the body to an arm of the excavator. The cam housing vibrates inside the body according to the drive of the drive unit. The drive unit makes the cam housing vibrate. The driving body is integrally fixed to the cam housing. The crushing unit is fixed to the end part of the drive unit. The vibration absorption unit is mounted inside the body and prevents the vibration from being delivered to the body from the cam housing. The drive guide unit drives the driving body up and down.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FLOTING TYPE PLATFORM FOR FISHING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A floating type platform for fishing is provided to prevent damages around fishing places by floating the platform on water, and to adjust the location or the height of the platform due to the level of water. CONSTITUTION: A floating type platform for fishing comprises the following: a floating member(11) to float on water; a holder(10) fixed to the edge of the water with a loop member(12); multiple fixing units(20) fixing the holder to the edge of the water while installed in the edge of the holder through a controller(50); multiple supporting boards(30) installed in the front upper side of the holder to accept fishing poles and other fishing tools; and a protector(40) protecting the user while installed on the upper side of the holder.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD OF MANUFACTURING WAFER AND WAFER MANUFACTURED BY USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method of manufacturing a wafer and a wafer thereof are provided to prevent a particle from being attached to the wafer surface by forming an oxide film on the wafer surface through oxide plasma processing on the wafer surface. CONSTITUTION: A silicon ingot manufactured through the growth of single crystalline silicon using a Chokralski method is prepared(S110). The silicon ingot is sliced in the form of a wafer(S120). The edge part of the sliced wafer is ground(S130). A lapping process for both sides of the wafer whose edge part is ground is operated(S140). The lapped wafer is etched(S150). The surface of the etched wafer is polished(S160). An oxygen plasma treatment is operated for the surface of the wafer(S170).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DRIVING CIRCUIT FOR SOLENOID VALVE AND COMPENSATING METHOD OF DRIVING CURRENT USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A solenoid valve drive circuit and a drive current compensation method using the same are provided to prevent the uncertain control of the fluid pressure of a solenoid valve due to ambient temperature caused by the drive of an engine and self-heating caused by the drive of a solenoid valve by compensating the drive current of a solenoid valve according to increased value. CONSTITUTION: A solenoid valve drive circuit comprises a solenoid valve(20), a front and a rear switch(11,12), a first and a second switch(21,22), and a first and a second resistor(R1,R2), and a constant voltage source(Vign). The solenoid valve is composed of resistor components and inductor components. The front and the rear switch are positioned at the front end and the rear end of the solenoid valve. The front and the rear switch control the opening degree of the solenoid valve. The first and the second switch form a Wheastone bridge with the front and the rear switch. The first and the second resistor are positioned in a diode and the rear end of the first and the second switch respectively. The diode is positioned at the rear end of the rear switch.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FEEDING SCREW FOR RAW MATERIALS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A double screw device for transferring materials is provided to maximize the amount of the material to be transferred per hour by dually forming transferring screws. CONSTITUTION: A double screw device for transferring materials comprises a first screw device(200), a second screw device(300), and a discharge pipe(400). The first screw device is connected to a hopper(100). The first screw device transfers raw material stored in the hopper. The second screw device is connected to one side of the first screw device. The second screw device is positioned below the first screw device. The second screw device secondly transfers a part of raw materials passing through the first screw device. The discharge pipe discharges the raw material transferred through the first screw device and the second screw device.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR COATING A ADHESIVE, APPARATUS FOR COATING A ADHESIVE USING THE SAME AND APPARATUS FOR BONDING A DIE HAVING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An adhesive coating method, an adhesive coating device thereof and a die bonding device thereof are provided to shorten a whole process time by uniformly coating an adhesive on a substrate through a first and a second transport parts. CONSTITUTION: A substrate is classified into a first and a second regions based on a first axis. An adhesive is sprayed to a first direction which is parallel to the first axis in order to coat the adhesive on the first region of the substrate(S10). A substrate that the adhesive was sprayed on the first region is moved to the second direction which is parallel to a second axis perpendicular to the first axis so that the second region should be located the place the first region was placed(S20). The adhesive is sprayed to the third direction opposing the first direction so that the adhesive is sprayed on the second region of the substrate which was moved to the second direction(S30). The adhesive including a liquid material is sprayed on the substrate as the form of spraying.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PAYMENT USING RFID

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A payment method using RFID and a system thereof are provided to use a payment card including a RFID tag storing authentication information of a user, thereby offering a convenient noncontact method. CONSTITUTION: A payment card includes a RFID tag. The RFID tag stores authentication information of a payment service user. A portable payment terminal(107) recognizes the RFID tag by a noncontact type. The terminal transmits a payment approval request statement to a relay server(103). The relay server selects one among multiple VAN company servers(113). The statement is transmitted to the selected VAN company server.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SEALING PAD FOR LEUCOCYTE ELIMINATION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A sealing material for a leukocyte elimination filter is provided to prevent a leakage of blood between a case and the filter by sealing a mismatched surface between the case and the filter with a material. CONSTITUTION: A sealing material for a leukocyte elimination filter comprises the following: a case with a blood inlet(11a) on one side of the case and a blood outlet(12a) on the other side; a filter(20) installed in between the blood inlet and the blood outlet, in which the edge is facing the edge of the case; and a sealing member(30) installed in the upper and the lower side of the filter to face the edges of the case and the filter. The sealing member is produced by electro spinning a non-woven fabric form using plural nanofibers with an average diameter of 100~2,000 nanometers. The sealing member includes plural pores with an average diameter of 0.5~3 micrometers in between the nanofibers. The thickness of the sealing member is 10~50 micrometers. The nano fiber is composed of a high absorbent polymer resin.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR MEASURING BLOOD PRESURE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A portable apparatus and a method are provided to measure exact blood pressure by maintaining a right posture of an examinee through a tilt sensor. CONSTITUTION: A blood pressure measuring apparatus comprises a slope measuring unit(20), a bio-signal measurement unit, and a central processing unit(60). The slope measuring unit comprises an inclination sensor. The slope measuring unit measures the slope of the blood pressure measuring apparatus by using the sensing signal of the inclination sensor. The bio-signal measurement unit measures an electrocardiogram and a pulse wave. The central processing unit predicts a posture of an examinee. The central processing unit compares a sensed posture with a reference posture. The central processing unit measures the blood pressure of the examinee.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: WATERTIGHT FABRIC USING NANO FIBER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: Waterproof fabric using nanofiber is provided to improve comfort in wearing clothes for a wearer by changing permeation performance and waterproof performance corresponding to meteorological environment which is suddenly changed. CONSTITUTION: Waterproof fabric using nanofiber comprises the following: a lining cloth layer(30); a nanofiber waterproof layer(20) made with nanofiber yarns of which average diameter is 100~2000nm and manufactured by electrospinning; and a surface fabric layer(10) laminated on the top of the nanofiber waterproof layer. The average diameter of a pore formed between the nanofiber yarns and the fiber yarns is 0.5~5μm. The thickness of the nanofiber waterproof layer is 5~50μm. The high absorbent polymer resin is one element selected among polyacrylo-nitrile polymers, gelatin-based polymers and cellulose-based polymers.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BIOCOMPATIBLE NANO FABRIC MANUFACTURING METHOD AND BIOCOMPATIBLE NANO FABRIC

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A manufacturing method of a bio compatible nano fabric and the bio compatible nano fabric manufactured thereby are provided to form micro pores and macro pores within a nano fabric when manufacturing a nano fiber structure through an electro spinning method. CONSTITUTION: A manufacturing method of a biocompatible nano fabric comprises the following steps: step 1, manufacturing a spinning solution by dissolving a bio compatibility macro molecular polymer to a solvent; step 2, manufacturing a nano fiber structure by laminating a nano fiber using an electro spinning apparatus to electro spin the spinning solution; step 3, sprinkling water soluble solid particles, with a diameter of 10~1000 micrometers, on the nano fiber; step 4, drying the nano fiber structure with the water soluble solid particles; step 5, removing the water soluble solid particles by washing the dried nano fiber structure; and step 6, drying the nano fiber structure.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FACIAL TISSUE FOR REMOVING SEBUM AND MANUFACTURING METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A facial tissue for removing sebum, which is formed with nanofibers, is provided to rapidly absorb sebum from the face of a user with a wide surface area and to insure safety by not using an organic solvent. CONSTITUTION: A facial tissue for removing sebum is manufactured with a non-woven fabric form by crossing plural nanofibers produced by electro spinning. The nanofiber has an average diameter of 50~2000 nanometers. Multiple pores are formed in between the nanofibers with an average diameter of 100~5000 nanometers and a thickness of 10~80 micrometers. The nanofiber is fabricated with a water-soluble polymer resin which is selected from a group consisting of a PVA polymer, a cellulose polymer, an acrylic polymer, a starch class high molecule, and an alginic acid polymer.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: WOUND DRESSING USING NANO FIBER AND MANUFACTURING METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A wound dressing using nanofibers formed with polymers and a method of manufacturing thereof are provided to facilitate a recovery of a would while protecting the wound, and to provide a dressing material with high biocompatibility, moisture permeability and others. CONSTITUTION: A wound dressing using nanofibers comprises the following: a first fiber layer contacting with a wounded skin while being fabricated with a non-woven fabric form by crossing plural nanofibers composing polymers by electro spinning; and a second fiber layer located on the upper side of the first fiber layer while being fabricated with a non-woven fabric form by crossing plural nanofibers composing high absorbent polymers by electro spinning. The nanofiber forming the first and the second fiber layers has an average diameter of 100~1,000 nanometers. The pores formed in between the nanofibers has an average diameter of 100~1000 nanometers.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SHEET OF WALL PAPERS HAVING MOISTURE ABSORPTION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: Wallpaper on which moisture is easily adsorbed is provided to prevent discoloration or molds on the wallpaper, and to prevent a gap between the wallpaper and wall due to the moisture by the moisture being absorbed on the wallpaper. CONSTITUTION: Wallpaper on which moisture is easily adsorbed comprises inner paper improving a look of the wallpaper by printing a specific pattern and inner paper adhered on an inner side of outer paper. The inner paper is made with super absorbent resin and manufactured by electrospinning. The super absorbent resin is one component selected among polyacrylamide, polyacrylic acid, polymethacrylic acid, polyethylene oxide, polyvinyl alcohol, gelatin and chitosan resin. The average diameter of the microfiber is 30~1000 nm. The average weight of the microfiber is 0.5~10 g / m.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THE DUCT WHICH THE GASKET COMES TO BE COMBINED

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A duct combined with a gasket is provided to prevent a gasket from being separated from a duct although the pressure of a post exceeds fixed pressure by coupling flanges with the gasket. CONSTITUTION: A duct combined with a gasket(2) comprises the end of an opening area rolled outward. The end is overlapped. The end of the gasket is fixed inside a rolled space part(14). The gasket is formed of a flat body unit(20). The duck and the gasket are integrated with each other.

exch:applicant-name.name: KNOWLEDGE-BASE CARD BUSINESS AND COMPANY CO., LTD.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A EXAMINATION SYSTEM FOR COMPUTING INSURED AMOUNT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A vehicle examination system for calculating insurance money is provided to immediately calculate insurance money and enable an examiner to immediately appropriate the insurance money by mounting an insurance money computing device on a vehicle. CONSTITUTION: A vehicle examination system for calculating insurance money comprises a vehicle recording unit(10) and an insurance money calculation unit(60). A vehicle recording device comprises a sensing part(20), a photographic unit(30), a black box(40), and an output unit(50). The sensing part senses the change on a vehicle. The photographic unit comprises a front camera(32) and a rear camera(34). The black box continuously stores video signals recorded by the photographic unit based on the current time. If the sensing signals about collision are inputted from the sensing part, the black box preserves video signals and information recorded by the sensing part. The output unit outputs the saved video signals.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A HEAD PLATE FOR BED

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A head board is provided to reduce a material cost of timber forming the head board and the weight, and to facilitate an installation and transportation. CONSTITUTION: A head board comprises the following: two side plates(10) separately installed to form an inner space with a constant size; an enhancing screen board(20) to support the gap between the two side plates from the inside; and a molding material(30) detachably combined to each edges of the side plates. The molding material comprises: plural insertion grooves(31) to combined with the side plates in the longitudinal direction; and a wrapping wall(32) with a constant width(w) to cover the edge of the side plates from both side walls. The enhancing screen board is located at a inner constant distance from the edge of the side plates or the grooves of the molding material to prevent the board from contacting with the molding material.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HAND GRENADE FOR THROWING AND COMPOSITE FOR FIRE EXTINGUISHING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A hand grenade including a fire extinguishing composition is provided to completely extinguish a fire early on by filling the hand grenade with a fire extinguishing composition which is released when the grenade is thrown. CONSTITUTION: A hand grenade includes a fire extinguishing composition. The fire extinguishing composition consists of 10~30wt% of a low temperature noncombustible gas generator, 10~30wt% of a glassy coating forming agent, 10~30% of a freezing material, 2~8wt% of a nonionic surfactant, 1~5 wt% of a thickener, 25~65wt% of water, and 2~8wt% of a high temperature noncombustible gas generator. The low temperature noncombustible gas generator is selected from ammonium carbonate or ammonium bicarbonate. The glassy coating forming agent is selected from three types of phosphoric acid ammoniums. The freezing material is selected from propylene glycol or ethylene glycol. The thickener is selected from cellulose or hydroxyl cellulose.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PRINTING PLATE AND METHOD OF PRINTING AN ALIGNMENT FILM USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A printing plate and an alignment film printing method using the same are provided to minimize the generation of stains on alignment film material by removing a heap raised pattern from both sides of a pixel array raised pattern formed on a print plate, thereby preventing the transmission of the stains to the pixel array raised pattern of the printing plate. CONSTITUTION: A printing plate which prints an alignment film includes a resin(RPL), a pixel array raised pattern, a heap raised pattern, and an intaglio pattern. The resin includes two or more resin plate. The pixel array raised pattern is formed on the resin plate and prints an alignment film on a pixel array to be formed on a glass plate of a liquid crystal display device. The heap raised pattern is formed on the resin plate. The intaglio pattern is formed on the resin plate between the pixel array raised pattern and the heap raised patterns.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: REFRIGERATOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A refrigerator with a cover operating unit is provided to simplify structure by not needing a separate transfer member for discharging ices to a dispenser and a drive part for driving the same. CONSTITUTION: A refrigerator comprises a storage room, an ice tray, an ice storage box(50), a cover member(100), and a manual cover working unit(500). The ice tray is formed inside the storage room and produces ice. The ice storage box comprises an ice outlet through which ices escape. An inclined guide is formed in the ice storage box. An ice guide plate is formed in the ice storage box. The cover member opens and closes the ice outlet. The manual cover working unit drives the cover member to open the ice outlet.

exch:applicant-name.name: HYUN DAI HEAVY IND CO LTD

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR CHECK LEAKAGE OF WATER IN UNDERWATER VEHICLES INCLUDING SUBMARINES

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A water leakage inspection system for an underwater vehicle is provided to effectively inspect a water leakage in an external hydraulic actuator and associated pipes and remove the possibility of contamination of an oil feeder. CONSTITUTION: A water leakage inspection system for an underwater vehicle comprises a hydraulic actuator(210), a water leakage checking penetration device(220), a pipeline link device(230), and a hydraulic oil property test apparatus(240). The hydraulic actuator is installed outside of the underwater vehicle and consumes hydraulic oil. The water leakage checking penetration device is installed in a pressure chamber of the underwater vehicle and provided with the hydraulic oil from the hydraulic actuator. The pipeline link device is installed inside the underwater vehicle and provided with the hydraulic oil of the hydraulic actuator through the water leakage checking penetration device. The hydraulic oil property test apparatus inspects the property of the hydraulic oil of the hydraulic actuator provided the pipeline link device.

exch:applicant-name.name: HYUN DAI HEAVY IND CO LTD

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BLIND FLANGE AND APPARATUS FOR CHECK LEAKAGE OF WATER IN SUBMERSIBLE VEHICLE USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A flange for detecting the leakage of water and device for detecting the leakage of the water in a submersible vehicle using the same are provided to limitedly operate a hydraulic actuator in the inspection of the leakage and accurately grasp a water leakage point. CONSTITUTION: A device for detecting the leakage of the water comprises a flange plate(311), a first and a second O-ring(312,313), a water detecting reagent(314), and a sample extracting valve. The flange plate is closely fixed on one side of the hydraulic actuator. The first and the second O-ring are positioned on one side of flange plate at fixed intervals. The sample extracting valve is installed on one side of the flange plate. A through hole(316) is formed on the flange plate.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PLASMA DISPLASY DEVICE AND GLASS FILTER FOR THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A plasma display device and glass filter for the same are provided to simplify a process by supplying a functional film layer, a substrate, an adhesive to a glass film. CONSTITUTION: A PDP(Plasma Display Panel)(130) outputs an image. A glass filter(110) protects the front of PDP. A bracket(150) combines the glass filter with the front intimate. The bracket connects a rear frame(120) and the PDP. A rear housing(140) is combined in rear part of the glass filter and protects the PDP.

exch:applicant-name.name: HYUN DAI HEAVY IND CO LTD

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BLIND FLANGE AND APPARATUS FOR LEAKAGE CHECK OF WATER IN SUBMERSIBLE VEHICLE USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A blind flange and a leakage inspection apparatus for a submersible vehicle using the same are provided to effectively grasp a water leakage position and restrictively operate a specific hydraulic actuator for leakage inspection. CONSTITUTION: A blind flange comprises a flange plate(311), an O-ring(312), and a sampling valve. The flange plate is pressed onto one side of a hydraulic actuator. The O-ring is arranged on one side of the flange plate. The sampling valve is provided on one side of the flange plate and samples hydraulic oil sample from the hydraulic actuator. The flange plate has a through hole(314).

exch:applicant-name.name: HYUN DAI HEAVY IND CO LTD

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BLIND FLANGE AND APPARATUS FOR CHECK LEAKAGE OF WATER IN SUBMERSIBLE VEHICLE USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A water leakage checking connector and a water leakage checking device for a submersible vehicle is provided to limitedly operate a specific hydraulic actuator and effectively grasp a water leakage point. CONSTITUTION: A water leakage checking connector comprises a flange plate(310), a pipe connecting member(320), and a sampling valve(350). The flange plate comprises an inner through-hole(340) inside. The pipe connecting member is respectively formed on the both sides of the flange plate. The pipe connecting member is fixed on one side of the hydraulic actuator. The pipe connecting member is spatially connected to the inner through-hole of the flange plate. The sampling valve is formed on the side of the flange plate.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: GLASS FILTER FOR A PLASMA DISPLASY DEVICE AND METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A glass filter for a plasma display device and method for manufacturing the same are provided to reduce manufacturing costs by optimizing a function of a glass filter. CONSTITUTION: A glass substrate(1) is separated from the PDP(Plasma Display Panel) in forward direction of the PDP. A functional film layer(3) has a black frame layer defining an effective screen one side. An adhesive layer(5) bonds the glass substrate and the functional film layer. An electromagnetic wave shielding layer secludes electromagnetic wave created in the PDP.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: POLYFUNCTIONAL CLEANSER FOR GOOD RINSE FEEL AND WET COMBING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cleaner composition is provided to ensure an excellent rinsing property and to be useful as a multifunctional cleaner for the hair, body, and face. CONSTITUTION: A cleaner composition comprises (i) anionic surfactants including potassium cocoyl glycinate and (ii) cationic polymers including at least one kind selected from a group consisting of guar hydroxypropyltrimonium chloride and polyquaternium-10. The cleaner composition further comprises amphoteric surfactants including sodium cocoamphoacetate.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CATHODE OF SPUTTERING DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cathode of a sputtering device is provided to prevent a target from being burned on the bent portion of a target clamp even if the target melts during the thermal expansion. CONSTITUTION: A cathode of a sputtering device comprises a target(100), a cooling plate(300), a back plate(400), a sealing member, a back plate clamp(600), a target clamp(700), and a clamp bolt. The target comprises a deposition material consumed for deposition. The cooling plate is arranged on one side of the target and allows a cooling water flow therein. The back plate is arranged between the cooling plate and the target and blocks the inside of the cooling plate. The sealing member is interposed between the back plate and the cooling plate and seals the cooling plate. The back plate clamp is pressed on the lateral surfaces of the target and connected to the top of the back plate. The target clamp is arranged on the top of the back plate clamp and the target clamp and prevents the movement of the target.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: INTEGRATED TUNNEL MANAGING METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An integrated tunnel management method is provided to enable a driver to reduce driving time by confirming the abnormal state of tunnel through a sensor and transmitting congestion information to adjacent drivers using a short message of a mobile phone. CONSTITUTION: A sensor installed inside/outside a tunnel senses the inside of the tunnel and neighboring state. A server(100) analyzes information transmitted from the sensor and informs the abnormal state to the terminal of a manager. The server transmits a tunnel detour request text message to a terminal(310) of the citizen who is located in the tunnel within a constant distance.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MARKING INK COMPOSITION FOR DETECTING DEFECT OF POLARIZING PLATE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A marking ink composition for detecting defects of a polarizing plate is provided to prevent the blockage of a nozzle head in a marking apparatus, to be dried within 10 seconds after marking defects, and to improve visibility. CONSTITUTION: A marking ink composition for detecting defects of a polarizing plate comprises an acrylic binder resin 0.1-13 weight%, fluorescent pigment 0.1-5 weight%, solvent 80-99.5 weight% and additive 0.01-3 weight% based on the marking ink composition 100.0 weight%. The solvent comprises at least one of an alcohol-based solvent 5-11 weight%, ketone-based solvent 50-60 weight%, and acetate-based solvent 25-28.5 weight%.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LIQUID CRYSTAL DISPLAY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A liquid crystal display is provided to reduce brightness variation and to improve aperture ratio. CONSTITUTION: A liquid crystal display includes a gate line(GL), a data line(DL), a first switching device, a second switching device, a first sub pixel electrode, and a second sub pixel electrode. The gate line is spread toward a first direction. The data line is spread toward a second direction and crosses with the gate line. The first switching device is connected with the gate line and the data line. The second switching device is connected with the gate line and the data line. The first sub pixel electrode is connected with the first switching device and has a first voltage. The second sub pixel electrode is connected with the second switching device and has a second voltage.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DC TO DC CONVETER WITH DEAD ZONE STATE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A DC to DC converter with a dead zone state is provided to prevent cross over by reducing a ripple and forming a dead zone. CONSTITUTION: A DC/DC converter comprises an input switching element(110), an output unit(120), a feedback unit(140), and a comparison unit(130). The input switching element switches the input voltage. The output unit comprises a first resistor(R1), a second resistor, and a switching element(M1). The output unit rectifies voltage from the input switching element and generates the output voltage. A feedback unit generates a feedback signal. A comparison unit compares a feedback signal with a reference voltage. The comparison unit selects one of a charge state, a discharge state, and a dead zone state and controls the switching element.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BRAKE BOOSTER FOR VEHICLE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A boost power device for a vehicle brake is provided to prevent the deformation of a sound-insulating member by coupling a support member, which adheres closely to the sound-insulating member on an input shaft. CONSTITUTION: A boost power device for a vehicle brake comprises a sound-insulating member(67) and a supporting member(90). The sound-insulating member is formed on the outer circumference of an input shaft(40). The sound-insulating member prevents air inhalation noise from being leaked out to the outside. The support member adheres closely to the sound-insulating member and is coupled with the input shaft. The supporting member prevents the deformation of the sound-insulating member.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ELECTRICAL MECHANICAL BRAKE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An electrical mechanical brake is provided to obtain braking power in a compact space by serially connecting two planetaries in order to boost the torque of a drive motor. CONSTITUTION: An electrical mechanical brake comprises a drive motor, a power distribution unit, and a friction pad. The drive motor generates the torque. The power distribution unit increases the torque created by the drive motor. The friction pad is connected to the power distribution unit and is selectively contacted with the disk. The power distribution unit comprises plural planetaries which serially connected to each other. The planetary comprises a sun gear(142), a ring gear(144), planetary gears(146), and a carrier(145). The ring gear is formed on the outside of the sun gear. The planetary gears engage with the sun gear and ring gear. The carrier is connected to the planetary gears.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD OF FORMING PATTERNS FOR SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A pattern formation method of a semiconductor device is provided to control the fault generation of a pattern profile by forming a subsidiary pattern in the front side of a second region in order to eliminate the step difference of the second region forming relatively wide patterns. CONSTITUTION: An etching object film(102), a hard mask film, and a first sub-layer are successively formed on a semiconductor substrate(100). A first assistant pattern(108a) is formed by patterning the first sub-layer of a cell region while the first sub-layer in a peripheral circuit region remains. A spacer layer(112) is formed along the surface of the hard mask film exposed and the first assistant pattern with lower temperature than the temperature that the first subsidiary pattern is transformed. A second subsidiary film(114) is formed on the top of the spacer layer. The spacer layer remaining in the sidewall of the first subsidiary pattern is formed by etching the space so that the first assistant pattern is exposed. The hard mask film and the etching object film are patterned according to the remaining space pattern, the first assistant pattern, and the second subsidiary pattern.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD OF FORMING SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A formation method of a semiconductor device is provided to prevent an impurity from being slipped out of an active area by forming a barrier layer along the surface of a trench after forming a trench. CONSTITUTION: A semiconductor substrate(400) in which a trench(TC) is formed is provided. A liner insulating layer is formed along the surface of the trench. The liner insulating layer is transformed into a barrier layer(410) by executing a nitridation process in order to prevent an impurity from being slipped out of the semiconductor substrate. The liner insulating layer is formed by an oxide film. The barrier layer is formed by a nitride film.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD OF MANUFACTURING SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A manufacturing method of a semiconductor device is provided to easily operate a gap-fill process and an EFH(Effective Field Height) adjustment by forming a subsidiary layer on the upper part of a semiconductor substrate including a fluent insulating layer. CONSTITUTION: A semiconductor substrate(100) in which a trench(TC) is formed is provided. A fluent insulating layer(102a) is formed on the upper part of the semiconductor substrate so that the inside of the trench is filled. The fluent insulating layer is transformed to a solidified insulating layer. A planarization process is executed so that the upper part of the semiconductor substrate is exposed. A sub-layer(104) is formed on the upper part of the solidified insulating layer and the semiconductor substrate. An oxidation process for transforming the sub-layer to the insulating sub-layer is executed. The fluent insulating layer is transformed into a SOD(Spin On Dielectric) film.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD OF MANUFACTURING METAL LINE FOR SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A metal wiring forming method of a semiconductor device is provided to prevent the etch damage of a first interlayer insulating film by forming an etch stop layer between a dual interlayer insulating layer. CONSTITUTION: A semiconductor substrate(100) includes gate lines. A first etch stop layer(116) is formed along the surface of the semiconductor substrate including the gate line. A first interlayer insulating layer(118), a second etch stop layer(120), and a second interlayer insulating layer(122) are successively formed on the top of the first etch stop layer. A first etch process for forming a contact hole(H) between gate lines is executed. A second etching process for forming a trench(TC) on the second interlayer insulating layer is executed. A third etching process for eliminating the exposed first and the second etch stop layer is executed. A metal material is filled with inside the trench and the contact hole.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD OF MANUFACTURING A FLASH MEMORY DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A manufacturing method of a flash memory device is provided to form a cobalt silicide layer with a uniform thickness by vertically diffusing the cobalt by forming the cobalt on the top of a control gate using a damascene method. CONSTITUTION: A second conductive pattern(208a) and gate lines including a gate mask pattern are formed on the top of a semiconductor substrate(200). An interlayer insulating film(214) is filled with between gate lines. A trench in which the top of the second conductive pattern is exposed is formed by eliminating the gate mask pattern. A cobalt film(216) is filled inside the trench. A cobalt silicide layer is formed on the outcome by executing a rapid thermal process. The gate mask pattern is formed to a nitride film.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ROTARY TYPE BOOKCASE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A rotary bookcase is provided to conveniently bring or store books by rotating the bookcase to lower the high parts, and to lift up the low parts, and to offer the rotary bookcase to children or the disabled. CONSTITUTION: A rotary bookcase comprises following: a main body housing(100); rails(210,220,230,240) installed at the left, the right, the upper, and the lower side of the main body housing to rotate by a driving unit; plural bookshelves installed at the main body housing while moving by the rails; a controlling unit controlling the movement of the bookshelves when pressing the switch; a rotation partition unit formed in the main body housing; a jamming protrusions in the back of the bookshelves; and multiple operational projections(710,720,730,740) installed on the rails. The controller successively transfers the bookshelves to the rotation partition unit to rotate the bookshelves.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DISK FOR BUTTERFLY VALVE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A disc for a butterfly valve is provided to increase service life of a rotary shaft, which is a valve operator, by protecting an elastic ring. CONSTITUTION: A disc(100) for a butterfly valve comprises a body(70), a close adhesion end(110), and an elastic ring(50). The close adhesion end is formed on the circular rim end of the disc. The two spherical surfaces of different diameters are connected to the close adhesion end. The close adhesion end is compressed and inserted into the close adhesion end. The corner of the edge of the close adhesion end rotates during the operation of ht disc.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FOOD CONTAINER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A food container is provided to simply mix liquid materials and solid materials with one container on which the liquid materials and solid materials are stored, and to improve convenience for mixing the materials in one container. CONSTITUTION: A food container comprises a solid container main body(11), a liquid receiving part, an opening part(31a,31b), a discharge part(35a,35b), and a liquid container main body(21). The solid container main body has a solid receiving part and an opening part on one side. The opening part opens the liquid receiving part. The discharge part is formed on the same position with the opening part and arranged towards the solid receiving part. The liquid container main body is sealed on the solid container main body.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR MEASURING AND DISPLAYING FUEL RATIO

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus for displaying a fuel ratio on a real time basis by measuring fuel pressure provided to a vehicle is provided to enable a driver to select an economic driving mode according to driving conditions by measuring and displaying fuel injection pressure according to driving speed. CONSTITUTION: An apparatus for displaying fuel ratio on a real time basis by measuring fuel pressure provided to a vehicle comprises an effective injection time calculating module(130), a injection pressure signal unit(110), an injection rate calculating unit(140), a fuel efficiency output module(150), a display unit(210), and a controller(230). The effective injection time calculating module receives injection valve alteration signals and calculates an effective injection time. According to driving speed, injection pressures are preset. The injection pressure signal unit transmits signals to an injection valve to inject fuel with the injection pressure corresponding to the driving speed. The injection rate calculating unit calculates injection rate using the injection pressure of the injection pressure signal unit corresponding to the effective injection time and driving speed. The injection rate calculating unit receives injection rate from the injection rate calculating unit and receives driving speed from a speedometer. The display unit displays the effective injection time and fuel efficiency to a driver.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THE TREATING APPARATUS OF WASTE INSULATING OIL WITH POLYCHLORINATED BIPHENYLS AND THE TREATING METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus for processing waste insulating oil in which polychlorinated biphenyl is contained is provided to environment-friendlily discharge the waste insulating oil by purifying the polychlorinated biphenyl component through an exhaust gas disposal part. CONSTITUTION: An apparatus for processing waste insulating oil in which polychlorinated biphenyl is contained comprises: an pre-treatment tank(2) which stores waste insulating oil and preheats the oil; a reaction bath(10) in which metallic sodium is melted and the melted sodium is desalted by chemically reacting with the polychlorinated biphenyl contained in the waste insulating oil; a post-treatment bath(21) which sends the waste insulating oil to a processed oil reservoir(24) and sends sodium chloride and all kinds of the precipitates to a separation collecting tub(27); and an exhaust gas disposal part(32) which desalts the polychlorinated biphenyl included in exhaust gas and discharges the gas.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LIGHT EMITTING DIODE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A light emitting diode is provided to improve emitting efficiency by removing a depletion layer generated from an impurity doping and increasing the area in which carriers are recombined. CONSTITUTION: A light emitting diode includes a n-type contact layer(27) which is a nitride-based n-type semiconductor layer, a p-type semiconductor layer(33) which is a nitride-based p-type semiconductor layer. The light emitting diode includes a substrate(21), an un-doped GaN layer(25) and a nucleus layer(23). A transparent electrode(35) and a p-electrode(37) are arranged on the p-type contact layer. An n-electrode(39) is arranged on the n-type contact layer. The light emitting diode includes the active area(29) of a multiple-quantum-well structure in which a quantum well layer and a barrier layer are stacked by turns.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LIGHT EMITTING DIODE HAVING MODULATION DOPED LAYER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A light emitting diode including a modulation doped layer is provided to release a strain generated in an active area by forming the modulation doped layer of a doped InGaN/an un-doped InGaN with identical compositions between a contact layer and the active area. CONSTITUTION: A p-type contact layer(33) is formed on the upper side of an n-type contact layer(27). The active area(29) of a multiple-quantum-well structure is interposed between the p-type contact layer and the n-type contact layer. A modulation doping layer(28) is interposed between the n-type contact layer and the active area. The modulation doping layer is a stacked structure in which a n-type impurity doped InGaN layer(28a) and a un-doped InGaN layer are stacked by turns(28b). The compositions of the doped InGaN layer and the un-doped InGaN layer are same.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METAL INSULATOR METAL CAPACITOR AND THE MANUFACTURING METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A metal insulator metal(MIM) capacitor and a method for manufacturing the same are provided to obtain the high level of capacitance by alternately stacking a metal layer and an insulation layer and connecting the MIM capacitor in parallel. CONSTITUTION: A first interlayer insulation layer(110) forms a lower wire pattern and an etching part. A first metal layer(M1) is formed on the inner side and the upper side of the etching part. A first insulation layer(I1) is formed on the upper side of the first metal layer. A second metal layer(M2) is formed to cover the upper side of the first insulation layer. A second insulation layer(I2) is formed to cover the one upper side of the second metal layer. A third metal layer(M3) is formed to cover the upper side of the second insulation layer.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HEAT PUMP SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A heat pump system and a control method thereof are provided to improve the efficiency of heating a room. CONSTITUTION: A heat pump system comprises an air conditioning system(100) and a heater(200). The air conditioning system cools or heats a space by heat exchange with circulating refrigerant and outside air. The air conditioning system comprises one or more outdoor units(110) and one or more indoor units(120). An outdoor heat exchanger and a compressor are installed in the outdoor unit. The indoor heat exchanger is installed in the indoor unit. The heater heats working fluid which heat-exchanges with the refrigerant circulating the air conditioning system. The heater comprises a heating part(220) and a heat exchange unit(230).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: GUARD FOR GAS CYLINDER ACTUATORS

exch:abstract.exch:p: A guard for gas cylinder actuators, constituted by a rigid or deformable covering element (11), to be fixed to the stem (12) of the gas cylinder actuator (13) with which it is associated or to the translating body against which the gas cylinder actuator (13) is intended to act, the covering element (11) being contoured so as to extend radially from the fixing region in order to protect the stem (12) and the opening (16) of the body (15) of the actuator (13) from which the stem (12) exits.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SEMICONDUCTOR LIGHT-EMITTING DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: Disclosed is a semiconductor light-emitting device (A) comprising a long substrate (1) having a through hole (11), a first, second and third semiconductor light-emitting device (3R, 3G, 3B) mounted on the major surface of the substrate (1), and an electrode (2R) electrically connected with the first semiconductor light-emitting device (3R) and extended to the backside of the substrate (1) through the through hole (11). The first semiconductor light-emitting device (3R) and the through hole (11) are located between the second semiconductor light-emitting device (3G) and the third semiconductor light-emitting device (3B) in the longitudinal direction of the substrate (1). The second semiconductor light-emitting device (3G) is arranged closer to one end of the substrate (1), while the third semiconductor light-emitting device (3B) is arranged closer to the other end of the substrate (1).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR SHARING MEDIA IN A GROUP COMMUNICATION AMONG WIRELESS COMMUNICATION DEVICES

exch:abstract.exch:p: A system, method, and wireless communication device for sharing media in a group communication among a plurality of wireless communications devices, such as among a Push-to-Talk (PTT) group. A wireless communication device that is a member of the communication group can send group-directed media, such as graphics, multimedia and applications, to other members of the communication group, either during a ongoing PTT communication, or independently therefrom. In one embodiment, a group communication computer device stores information on communication groups on the wireless communication network that includes the member wireless communication devices of one or more communication groups, and receives group-directed media from a sending wireless communication device sends the group-directed media either directly to the other member wireless communication devices of the communication group or stores the group-directed media such that the other member devices can access and download the group-directed media.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PIPERAZINE COMPOUNDS WITH HERBICIDAL ACTION

exch:abstract.exch:p: The present invention relates to piperazine compounds of the general formula (I) defined below and to the use thereof as herbicides. The invention also relates to compositions for crop protection and to a process for controlling undesired plant growth. In formula (I), A, Aare each independently aryl or heteroaryl, where Ris bonded in the ortho position to the bonding site of Ato a carbon atom or nitrogen atom of A, Y, Yare each oxygen, sulfur or an NRgroup, and the variables R, R, R, R, R, R, R, R, R, R, R, R, Rand Rare each as defined in the claims and the description.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PHOTOELECTRIC CONVERTER

exch:abstract.exch:p: Short circuit current of a photoelectric converter is enhanced by optimizing a transparent conductive layer. The photoelectric converter (100) has a first transparent electrode layer (2), a power generation layer (3), a second transparent electrode layer (6), and a back surface electrode layer (4) formed on a substrate (1). The film thickness of the second transparent electrode layer (6) is 80 nm or more but not more than 100 nm, and the light absorptivity of the second electrode layer (6) in the wavelength region of 600 nm or more but not more than 1,000 nm is 1.5% or less. In the photoelectric converter (100), the second transparent electrode layer (6) has a film thickness of 80 nm or more but not more than 100 nm, and the second transparent electrode layer (6) and the back surface electrode layer (4) have a reflectivity of light of 91% or above in the wavelength region of 600 nm or more but not more than 1,000 nm.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PHOTOELECTRIC CONVERSION DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: Provided is a large-area photoelectric conversion device having a high conversion efficiency and an excellent mass-production efficiency. The photoelectric conversion device (100) includes a photoelectric conversion layer (3) containing a crystalline silicone layer formed on a substrate (1). The photoelectric conversion device (100) has a distribution in the substrate as follows: the crystalline silicone layer has a crystalline silicon i-layer (42); the average value of the Raman peak ratio of the Raman peak intensity of the crystalline silicone phase with respect to the Raman peak intensity of the non-crystalline silicon phase in the crystalline silicone i-layer (42) is not smaller than 4 and not greater than 8. The standard deviation of the Raman peak ratio is not smaller than 1 and not greater than 3; and the ratio of the region where the Raman peak ratio is not greater than 4 is not smaller than 0% and not greater than 15%. The photoelectric conversion layer (3) in the substrate (1) has a size not smaller than 1 m x 1 m. The average value of the Raman peak ratio in the crystalline silicone i-layer (42) is not smaller than 5 and not greater than 8. The standard deviation of the Raman peak ratio is not smaller than 1 and not greater than 3. The ratio of the region where the Raman peak ratio is not greater than 4 is not smaller than 0% and not greater than 10%.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: INK-JET-PRINTABLE DECORATIVE PAPER

exch:abstract.exch:p: Decorative paper for decorative materials for coating, comprising a base paper and an ink-receiving layer which is colored such that, following impregnation with impregnating resins and pressing as a laminate, the decorative paper has the same coloring as the coloring of a laminate comprising a decorative paper that does not have an ink-receiving layer.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LIGHT-EMITTING DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: A light-emitting device in which a gallium nitride upper and lower electrode type light-emitting diode is provided on a ceramic substrate on which at least a pair of insulated metal substrates or at least two package electrodes are formed. In the light-emitting device, a gallium nitride upper and lower electrode type light-emitting diode (11) is mounted on substrates (12, 14). The power of the gallium nitride upper and lower electrode type light-emitting diode (11) is connected on the substrates (12, 14), and is surrounded by a reflector (16). The reflector (16) is adhered to the substrates (12, 14) with an adhesive. Further, the reflector (16) is provided in such a manner that a fluorescent layer covers an aperture plane.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CLEANING METHOD FOR SIMPLE FILTRATION SYSTEMS

exch:abstract.exch:p: A method of cleaning a permeable, hollow membrane (6) in an arrangement of the type wherein a pressure differential is applied across the wall of the permeable, hollow membrane (6) immersed in a liquid suspension provided in a vessel (5), said liquid suspension being applied to the outer surface of the permeable hollow membrane (6) to induce and sustain filtration through the membrane wall. The method of cleaning comprising the steps of: suspending the filtration process; while continuing to supply the liquid suspension to the vessel (5); aerating the membrane (6) by flowing gas into the vessel (5) to produce a flow of gas bubbles around the membrane (6) to dislodge at least some of the retained particulate material from the membrane surface; removing liquid containing dislodged particulate material from the vessel (5) during the aerating step and recommencing the filtration process.

exch:applicant-name.name: JAPAN OIL, GAS AND METALS NATIONAL CORPORATION

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PROMOTION OF METHANE HYDRATE DECOMPOSITION AND METHANE GAS COLLECTING SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: A collection technology that in the collection of methane gas from a methane hydrate layer, would achieve improvement in economical efficiency and technical hardship without relying upon fuel consumption as a heat source. Hot water is pumped up from an underground aquifer (300) lying 1000 to 1500 m under the seabed (500) by means of a pump (31), and the geothermal energy thereof is caused to flow through a water-permeable layer (104) under a methane hydrate layer (100). Accordingly, a decomposition boundary surface (105) of undecomposed zone (101) of the methane hydrate layer (100) is decomposed to thereby produce methane gas. The methane gas passes through peripheral zones (102,103) and a gas inlet screen (12) and is introduced in a production well (20). The methane gas goes up and is recovered on the sea.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MULTIMEDIA COMMUNICATIONS METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: The present invention is directed to various methods for rendering one or more conversations on a communication device. In a one method, a current conversation among a plurality of conversations is selected. For the selected conversation, media received and associated with the selected conversation is rendered, while media created on the device and associated with the selected conversation is transmitted to the participants of the selected conversation. The media associated with the non-selected conversations is stored on the communication device for later review. In a second method, the plurality of conversations may be consecutively rendered using a priority order. As media for the various conversations is received, the available media of the highest priority conversation is rendered while the media of the other conversations is rendered in a time-shifted mode. In yet another method, the media of the plurality of conversations may be simultaneously rendered and stored. With this embodiment, one of the conversations may be selected for review. During the review period, the received media of the other conversations is stored, but not rendered.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THERMOPLASTIC MOLDING MATERIALS COMPRISING ORGANIC BLACK PIGMENTS

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to thermoplastic molding materials comprising (A) from 34 to 99.99% by weight of at least one thermoplastic polymer selected from (i) polyarylene ethers, (ii) polyetherimides, (iii) polyarylene sulfides and (iv) polycarbonates having a glass transition temperature of at least 145°C, and to copolymers of the aforementioned polymers (i) to (iv), (B) from 0.01 to 10% by weight of at least one organic black pigment which is transparent in the range from 1000 nm to 1600 nm and has a thermal stability under DIN EN 12877-1 of at least 300°C, (C) from 0 to 6% by weight of at least one demolding agent selected from fatty acids, esters and amides, (D) from 0 to 50% by weight of one or more additives, where the sum of the percentages by weight of (A), (B), (C) and (D) adds up to 100% by weight. The invention further relates to a process for preparing the thermoplastic molding materials and to the moldings obtainable therefrom. The invention finally relates to the use of the thermoplastic molding materials for reducing the accumulation of heat in plastic components, moldings, films or membranes.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BENZIMIDAZOLE DERIVATIVES

exch:abstract.exch:p: The present invention relates to a compound of the Formula I (I) or a pharmaceutically acceptable salt thereof, wherein R1, R2, R3A, R3B, R4, R5, X, m, and n are as defined herein. Such novel benzamidazole derivatives are useful in the treatment of abnormal cell growth, such as cancer, in mammals. This invention also relates to a method of using such compounds in the treatment of abnormal cell growth in mammals, especially humans, and to pharmaceutical compositions containing such compounds.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ELECTROMIGRATION-RESISTANT AND COMPLIANT WIRE INTERCONNECTS, NANO-SIZED SOLDER COMPOSITIONS, SYSTEMS MADE THEREOF, AND METHODS OF ASSEMBLING SOLDERED PACKAGES

exch:abstract.exch:p: A nano-sized metal particle composite includes a first metal that has a particle size of about 50 nanometer or smaller. A wire interconnect is in contact with a reflowed nanosolder and has the same metal or alloy composition as the reflowed nanosolder. A microelectronic package is also disclosed that uses the reflowed nanosolder composition. A method of assembling a microelectronic package includes preparing a wire interconnect template. A computing system includes a nanosolder composition coupled to a wire interconnect.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NEW ANTICOAGULANT COMPOUNDS, PHARMACEUTICAL COMPOSITIONS ON THEIR BASIS TO TREAT THROMBOTIC CONDITIONS, AND PLASMA-SUBSTITUTING SOLUTION TO CORRECT HYPERCOAGULATION DEFECTS OF HEMODILUTION

exch:abstract.exch:p: This invention relates to new chemical compounds, application of these compounds as anticoagulants, pharmaceutical compositions, and plasma-substituting solutions on their basis, and can be used for treating thromboembolic complications of diseases such as myocardial infarction, stroke, and thrombosis of deep veins or a pulmonary artery; and for preventing hypercoagulation conditions in consequence of injuries, surgeries, sepsis, various obstetric pathologies, in disaster medicine, resuscitation, and so on.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NOVEL ARYLAMINE POLYMER, METHOD FOR PRODUCING THE SAME, INK COMPOSITION, FILM, ELECTRONIC DEVICE, ORGANIC THIN-FILM TRANSISTOR, AND DISPLAY DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: A polymer containing a repeating unit expressed by General Formula (I): General Formula (I) where Ar1 represents a substituted or unsubstituted aromatic hydrocarbon group; Ar2 and Ar3 each independently represent a divalent group of a substituted or unsubstituted aromatic hydrocarbon group; and R1 and R2 each independently represent a hydrogen atom, substituted or unsubstituted alkyl group, or substituted or unsubstituted aromatic hydrocarbon group.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CELLULAR MOBILE COMMUNICATION SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: A cellular mobile communication system has a problem that communication quality is lowered by increase of an attenuation amount of a desired signal and increase of an interfering signal amount at a position apart from a base station and high-speed data communication becomes difficult. To solve this problem, when a mobile station M is at a location D where the radio attenuation is small, the mobile station M uses an OFDM signal to transmit data x, y, z via a traffic channel all at once so that data communication is performed at the maximum communication speed. On the other hand, when the mobile station M moves from the location D to a location E which is far from any of the base stations A, the mobile station M divides B, C, the data x, y, z into three and, by using a diffusion OFDM signal having a high interference resistance, increases the interference resistance, and transmits data x, y, z almost simultaneously from the three base stations A, B, C, thereby realizing equivalence of high-speed data transmission.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE AND WIRE BONDING METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: A semiconductor device has a first layer pressing portion (100) that is formed by crushing a ball neck formed by bonding an initial ball to a first layer pad (14) of a first layer semiconductor die (11) and pressing the side of a wire folded onto the crushed ball neck, a first wire (25) stretched in the direction of a lead (16) from the first layer pressing portion (100), and a second wire (25) that is looped from a second layer pad (15) of a second layer semiconductor die (12) toward the first layer pressing portion (100) and joined to the second layer pad (15) side of the first layer pressing portion (100). Thereby, the connection of wires is performed at a small number of times of bonding, while reducing damages caused on the semiconductor dies.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MOBILE ON-WING ENGINE WASHING AND WATER RECLAMATION SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: A system (10) for on-wing engine washing and water reclamation is provided. The system (10) has at least one spray device (26) for introducing a cleaning liquid containing at least water into the engine (32) while the engine (32) is being operated, and an effluent trough for collecting the cleaning liquid from an exit end or underneath side of the engine (32). In a preferred embodiment, a source (14) of the cleaning liquid and the effluent trough are located on a mobile unit (12). Further, a treatment system (20) for treating the collected cleaning liquid is also located on a mobile unit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CONTACTOR, PROBE CARD AND METHOD OF MOUNTING CONTACTOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: Contactor (60) comprising conductive part (63) electrically connected to an input or output terminal of IC device; beam part (62) provided at its major surface with the conductive part (63); and pedestal part (61) supporting the beam part (62) in the manner of a cantilever. The pedestal part (61) has support area (611) for supporting the beam part (62) and mark forming area (612) provided with positioning first mark (613). Fragile part (614) with its strength lower than in other parts of the pedestal part (61) is provided between the support area (611) and the mark forming area (612).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: POLYOLEFIN POLYMER HAVING POLAR GROUP, METHOD FOR PRODUCTION THEREOF, AND WATER DISPERSION MATERIAL AND MOLD RELEASE AGENT COMPOSITION

exch:abstract.exch:p: Disclosed are: a polyolefin polymer having a polar group represented by the general formula (i), which is produced by modifying, with a high degree of modification rate, a double bond in a polymer that has the double bond at one terminal, at both terminals, or in the inside of its polymer chain and is produced by a known method; a method for producing the polyolefin polymer; and a water dispersion material and a mold release agent composition each comprising the polyolefin polymer. (i) wherein PO represents a polyolefin polymer produced by the polymerization of a monomer comprising an ethylene or an olefin having 3 to 20 carbon atoms, wherein a group inside the parentheses represents a polar group; A and B independently represent any one selected from R, a cyano group, C(O)ORand C(O)NRR, provided that A and B may together form a cyclic structure; M represents a metal cation or an onium cation; j represents the number of the metal cation(s) or the onium cation(s), and is an integer of 0 to 4; i represents the number of valency of the metal cation or the onium cation, and is an integer of 0 to 4; D and E independently represent any one selected from an oxygen atom, a nitrogen atom, a sulfur atom, R, OR, SRand NRR, provided that D and E may together form a cyclic structure; d and e represent the number of valency of the substituent D and the number of valency of the substituent E, respectively, and independently represent an integer of 0 to 4; R, R, Rand Rindependently represent any one selected from a hydrogen, an optionally substituted alkyl, alkenyl, alkynyl, aralkyl or aryl group having 20 or less carbon atoms, and a group having a heterocyclic ring; and n represents the average number of the functional groups, and is a number of 0.80 to 10.0.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CONDUCTIVE INK, CONDUCTIVE COATING THEREFROM AND METHOD FOR PRODUCING THE SAME
