exch:abstract.exch:p: A conductive ink comprising a metal colloid liquid and a saccharide compound, wherein the saccharide compound is contained in an amount of 3 to 15 wt.% based on the solid contents of the metal colloid liquid. Accordingly, there is provided a conductive ink capable of forming a conductive coating exhibiting high conductivity and high adherence to base materials. Further, there are provided a conductive coating made by use of the conductive ink and method for producing them.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: OPTIMIZED MOBILITY MANAGEMENT PROCEDURES USING PRE-REGISTRATION TUNNELING PROCEDURES

exch:abstract.exch:p: A method and apparatus for optimizing mobility management procedures comprises establishing a tunnel between a wireless transmit/receive unit (WTRU) and a target system core network (CN). The WTRU is handed over from a source system CN system to the target system CN.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: USE OF HYPOGLYCEMIC AGENT FOR TREATING IMPAIRED GLUCOSE METABOLISM

exch:abstract.exch:p: The invention relates to the use of a hypoglycemic agent or a pharmaceutically acceptable salt thereof for the manufacture of a medicament for the prevention or delay of the progression to overt diabetes, especially type 2, prevention or reduction of microvascular complications (e.g. retinopathy, neuropathy, nephropathy), prevention or reduction of excessive cardiovascular morbidity (eg. myocardial infarction, arterial occlusive disease, atherosclerosis and stroke) and cardiovascular mortality, prevention of cancer and reduction of cancer deaths. Additionally, the invention relates to the use of a treatment for diseases and conditions that are associated with IGM, IGT or IFG.

exch:applicant-name.name: THE GOVERNMENT OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, AS REPRESENTED BY THE SECRETARY OF THE NAVY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COMPUTER-IMPLEMENTED BIOLOGICAL SEQUENCE IDENTIFIER SYSTEM AND METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: A method of: submitting reference sequences to a taxonomic database to produce taxonomic results; and reporting a taxonomic identification based on the taxonomic results. The reference sequences are the output of genetic database queries that return a score for each reference sequence. A method for processing a biological sequence obtained from an assay by: converting base calls located in a predetermined list of positions within the biological sequence to N; and determining the ratio of single nucleotide polymorphisms in the biological sequence relative to a reference sequence. Each entry in the predetermined list of positions represents the capability of a substance hybridizing to a microarray used to generate the biological sequence. The substance is not the nucleic acid of a target pathogen.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PROCESS FOR PRODUCING SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: A process for semiconductor device production in which three-dimensional mounting through a spacer is conducted without necessitating a novel device for fixing the spacer to an adherend and by which semiconductor devices can be produced in high yield at low cost. The process for semiconductor device production employs an adhesive sheet serving as a spacer. The adhesive sheet serving as a spacer is one comprising a spacer layer having an adhesive layer on at least one side thereof. The process is characterized by comprising a step in which the adhesive sheet serving as a spacer is subjected to dicing to form a chip-form spacer having an adhesive layer and a step in which the spacer is fixed to an adherend through the adhesive layer.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LIGHT EMITTING DIODE MODULE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: Light emitting diode modules are provided to connect the light emitting diode modules by directly connecting stacked-circuit pattern layers in a substrate. CONSTITUTION: A first circuit pattern layer(110) and a second circuit pattern layer(120) are respectively stacked on the upper side and the lower side of an insulation layer. A solder resist layer(130) is applied on the first circuit pattern layer. A first via(110a) is electrically connected to the first circuit pattern layer. The first via vertically penetrates through the solder resist layer. A second via(120a) is electrically connected to the second circuit pattern layer. The second via vertically penetrates through the solder resist layer and the insulation layer. A light emitting device is mounted on the solder resist layer.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LIGHT EMITTING DIODE AND APPARATUS FOR LENS MOLDING OF LIGHT EMITTING DIODE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A light emitting diode(LED) and an apparatus for molding a lens of the same are provided to prevent the generation of voids in a molding resin by injecting the molding resin into a mold with a plunger. CONSTITUTION: The apparatus for molding a lens of a light emitting diode includes an upper mold(100), a lower mold(200) and a mold plate(400). An LED chip mounting substrate is formed on the upper mold. The lower mold includes an inlet, a runner, a cavity and an air vent. The molding plate is formed between a substrate and the lower mold. A molding resin is inserted into the inlet through a plunger(300).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LED PACKAGE MODULE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A light emitting diode(LED) package module is provided to stably combine an LED package to a printed circuit board by assembling the screw thread of a socket assembly unit and the thread groove of a socket unit. CONSTITUTION: An LED package module(100) includes a printed circuit board(110), an LED package(120) and a socket unit(130). The printed circuit board includes a socket assembly unit including a screw thread. The socket unit is integrated into the lower side of the LED package. The socket unit includes a thread groove corresponding to the screw thread. The printed circuit board and the LED package are combined by assembling the screw thread and the thread groove.

exch:applicant-name.name: UNIVERSITY OF SEOUL INDUSTRY COOPERATION FOUNDATION.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PROBE OF TRANSMITTING NANO-PARTICLE COATED MATERIAL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A transmission probe of a material coated with nanoparticles is provided to minutely transfer predetermined materials into a narrow region, and to improve usability of the transmission probe used in various industrial fields. CONSTITUTION: A transmission probe(100) of a material coated with nanoparticles includes the following: an inlet(120) putting materials coated with the nanoparticles into the probe and located on one end of the probe; an outlet(140) located on the other end of the probe; a nano coil part(110) including a plurality of nano ocils and located on the outlet of the probe; and a transfer passage(130) formed from the inlet to the nano coil part. The nano particles have magnetic forces or metallicity.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PELLET

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method of manufacturing a pellet for a carbon gas production boiler is provided to reduce the generation of a volatile organic compound and a pollution element. CONSTITUTION: A method of manufacturing a pellet for a carbon gas production boiler comprises the following steps: pulverizing a first waste including rice hulls and saw dusts into a size under 5 millimeters using a first pulverizing device(30); pulverizing a second waste including waste tires and waste plastics into a size under 5 millimeters using a second pulverizing device(31); supplying the first waste through a weight sensor(41) of a first hopper(40) for 45~55wt%; supplying the second waste through a weight sensor(43) of a second hopper(42) for 25~35wt%; supplying water for 10~15wt% from a water tank(44) through a weight sensor(45); supplying a soluble starch through a weight sensor(47) of a third hopper(46) for 5~10wt%; making a mixture including 45~55wt% of the first waste, 25~35wt% of the second waste, 10~15wt% of the water, and 5~10wt% of the soluble starch using a mixer(50); and making the cylindrical pellet with a diameter of 7~20mm and a length of 30~50mm using a molder(60).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: WAIST AND LEG REFORM CHAIR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A waist and leg correction chair is provided, which can maintain correct posture and prevents various kinds of the backbone diseases. CONSTITUTION: A waist and leg correction chair is constituted as follows. The rectangle bar(4) and cylindrical rod(3) are interlinked to the lower part of a chair. An arm rest(1) is moved by the right lever in which the spring is installed at 90 degrees while integrating with an iron pipe(2) moving in the cylindrical rod. The chair is controlled in the height and width by the lever and iron pipe.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MULTI-PURPOSE AMPLIFIER HAVING A COMPUTER FOR LECTURE ROOM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A multipurpose amplifier with a computer for a lecture room is provided to reduce the waste of manpower by operating illumination, a curtain, a beam project, a camera, or screen under the control of one person. CONSTITUTION: A monitor(1) and a keyboard(2) are installed on a cover(3). A main body(5) is combined with the cover through a hinge. The cover and the main body are opened by two locking devices(6a,6b) or more. The main body of the computer and the audio system are installed inside the main body. A device controller is installed on the audio system and the main body of the computer and controls the screen, illumination, curtain inside the lecture room, or camera according to a control signal from the main body of the computer.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHODS OF ELECTRONIC VAPOR RECOVERY SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An electronic vapor collection method is provided to prevent release pollutant to atmosphere and incinerate collected vapor. CONSTITUTION: An electronic vapor collection apparatus comprises a pump motor(10) for collection and controller(20). The pump motor for collection is mounted at the collection pipe. The controller controls an electric flowmeter(40). The controller frequently compares pulse generated from the electric flowmeter with pulse generated from the pulse generator and orders the rotation change of the vapor collection pump motor.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: USING NATURAL EXTRACT POWDER, METHOD FOR BIO ACTIVE SOYBEAN POWDER MANUFACTURING PACKED CLEANING SWEETLY WHOLE BEAN CURD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for manufacturing packaged whole bean curd using natural material extract powder is provided to manufacture soy bean milk by mixing soybean particles with soft water, and to improve functional effects and tastes of the bean curd. CONSTITUTION: A method for manufacturing packaged whole bean curd using natural material extract powder comprises the following steps: mixing soybean particles with a mixer of 3000RPM; manufacturing steamed soybean milk by heating a mixture with steam of 102°C; manufacturing cooled soybean milk by cooling the steamed soybean milk(2); manufacturing a mixed compound by agitating the cooling the steamed soybean milk, the extract powder and conjugated enzyme; adding the natural material extract powder, enzyme a coagulant; wrapping the mixed compound with a packaging container; heating the packing container with an electronic oven; and sterilizing the whole bean curd for 30 minutes after a low temperature sterilization process.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR PATTERNING OF NANO-PARTICLE AND WIRE GRID POLARIZER MANUFACTURED BY THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A nano-particle patterning method and a wire-grid polarizer manufactured by the same are provided to perform a nano-patterning process without the deposition process of a metal thin-film by spin-coating metal nano-particles on a substrate. CONSTITUTION: An anti-reflection layer(110) is formed on a substrate. Patterns with a constant period are formed on the substrate as a photosensitive layer(120). A nano-pattern is formed on the substrate by etching the anti-reflection layer and the photosensitive layer. Nano particles are spin-coated on the substrate with the nano-pattern. A firing process for the spin-coated nano-particles is performed.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FINISHING MATERIALS OF EDGE FOR FURNITURE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A finishing material of edge of furniture is provided, which makes the work efficiency improved remarkably by reducing working time. CONSTITUTION: A finishing material of edge of furniture is constituted as follows. The rear side of the polypropylene type finishing member(10) in which various patterns are printed is treated with corona. The adhesive(20) is spread in the rear side of the corona-processed feeling member and is attached to a film member(30). The primer having affinity to the hot melt adhesive is spread on the film. The film member is made of PVC sheet, polystyrene, and the material of G-PET.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A STEERING ASSIST TORQUE CONTROL METHOD OF VEHICLE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A steering assisting torque control method of vehicle is provided, which controls the steering assisting torque according to the intention of a driver. CONSTITUTION: A steering assisting torque control method of vehicle comprises: a step(820) for confirming whether the counter steer is proceed by a driver if oversteer generates in the vehicles; a step(840) of reducing the steering assisting torque if oversteer is generated and the counter steer is proceeded; a step of detecting the real yaw rate of vehicles; and a step(800) of producing the yaw rate of the vehicles.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PRODUCE OF ARCHITECTURE EXTERIOR & INTERIOR MATERIAL MADE OF VERMICULITE INSERTED WITH NON-WOVEN FABRIC OR STEEL NET

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A manufacturing method of interior and exterior materials using vermiculite in which a nonwoven fabric and a wire net are inserted is provided to improve diversity of the materials, and to make up for a weak point of the vermiculite. CONSTITUTION: A manufacturing method of vermiculite in which a nonwoven fabric and a wire net is as follows. Various particles of the vermiculite are dried by a drying machine. The dried vermiculite particles are expanded by evaporating moisture. The expanded vermiculite is mixed with liquid which has viscosity. The mixed vermiculite is placed in a desired mold, and a nonwoven fabric and a wire net are inserted into the vermiculite. And then, the vermiculite is molded by adding heat.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COOLING SYSTEM OF PNEUMATIC RUN FLAT TIRE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cooling device of run flat tire is provided, which can improve thermal performance of tire by cooling oil within the oil container rapidly. CONSTITUTION: A cooling device of run flat tire comprises an oil container(11), an oil pocket(12), a flow control member(13), and an oil tank(14). The oil container is installed in the tire wheel(30) and stores oil. The oil pocket is located inside the tire(20), is swelled by the oil provided by the centrifugal force, and comes into contact with the reinforcing material(25). Moreover, the oil pocket is made of the flexible material absorbing the heat of the sidewall(23). The flow control member opens and closes a path for oil to pass. The oil tank supplies the oil to the oil container.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD OF CONTROLLING BRAKE OF ANTO-LOCK BRAKE SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for controlling braking of anti-lock brake system is provided, which performs turning braking control which maintains the posture of vehicles stable. CONSTITUTION: A method for controlling braking of anti-lock brake system comprises a step(630) of presuming the brake pressure and horizontal acceleration in vehicle if the braking of vehicle is detected; and a step(660) of performing the turning braking control reducing the brake pressure of the wheel locating in the turning inner side among the non-driving wheel of vehicles if the presumed brake pressure is smaller than the fixed standards brake pressure and the presumed horizontal acceleration is bigger than the fixed standard horizontal acceleration.

exch:applicant-name.name: NAT UNIV CHONBUK IND COOP FOUN
INDUSTRIAL COOPERATION FOUNDATION CHONBUK NATIONAL UNIVERSITY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SYSTEM FOR IDENTIFICATING VEHICLE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A system for identifying a vehicle is provided to improve traffic condition by obtaining information like a traffic law violation existence and a stolen vehicle. CONSTITUTION: A system for identifying a vehicle includes a transmitting device(11), a receiving device(12), a police computer server(14), and a display device(13). The transmitting device is attached to a vehicle and transmits the identification information of a vehicle. The receiving device receives the identification information of a vehicle by a wireless or a cable communications. The police computer server is connected to the receiving device and communicates to bidirectional. The display device displays information about a vehicle corresponding to the ID information by receiving from the police computer server.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LIPOLYSIS EQUIPMENT WITH BROADBAND ULTRASOUND AND BROADBAND LASER RADIATION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An obesity treating device is provided, which makes biochemical effect by the ultrasonic wave amplified by irradiating laser light. CONSTITUTION: An obesity treating device is constituted as follows. The broadband ultrasonic wave and broadband laser light are radiated to the obesity portion. The broadband ultrasonic energy and broadband optical energy are irradiated to the fat part at the same time. The decomposition of the lipid accumulated at fat tissue is promoted.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AN DREDGING DEPOSIT SEDIMENT PURIFIER OF CENTRIFUGATION METHOD USING SEDIMENTATION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A dredging deposit sediment purifier by a centrifuge method using sedimentation is provided to rapidly mass-process various kinds of deposits, and to sterilize noxious bacteria included in water to be processed using ultraviolet rays. CONSTITUTION: A dredging deposit sediment purifier by a centrifuge method comprises the following: a deposit suction pump(31); a first settling tank(36) precipitating a heavy deposit among sucked in deposits using the natural gravity; a medicine reaction bath(39) for coagulating the liquid transferred from the first settling tank using a coagulant harmless to a human body; a second settling tank(42) precipitating the sampled deposit from the coagulating process; a first and a second precipitate material transfer pump(45,47) transferring the precipitate material in the bottom of the first and the second settling tank; a continuous centrifuge(46) treating the transferred precipitate material; a sludge discharging outlet discharging a sludge dehydrated in the continuous centrifuge; a feedback line returning a separated solution discharged from a separated solution outlet by the dehydrated sludge; and a filtering device(49) filtering a supernatant in the second settling tank.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR PROVIDING INFORMATION BASED ON LOCATION OF PORTABLE TERMINAL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for providing location based information of a portable terminal is provided to display destination guide information in the portable terminal, thereby easily providing event information around a station on a moving path and destination information. CONSTITUTION: A portable terminal transmits present position information to an event information providing server(103). The event information providing server searches event information corresponding to a location of the portable terminal in a database(107). If the event information exists, the event information providing server transmits the event information to the portable terminal(109,111). The portable terminal displays the event information(115).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: INTERIOR AQUARIUM SINK PETAL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An interior aquarium sink board is provided, which makes the body and the mental fatigue relieved when washing dishes while looking at the fish. CONSTITUTION: An interior aquarium sink board is constituted as follows. The transparent sink plate(1) forming the cutout groove of the top end portion and an outlet of the bottom central part is formed by intaglio and relief mold work. The water tank(5) formed according to two outlets and transparent sink plate is formed by intaglio and relief mold work. The rubber packing(7) is closely adhered to the water tank.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NOVEL ORGANIC ELECTROLUMINESCENT COMPOUNDS AND ORGANIC ELECTROLUMINESCENT DEVICE USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An organic electroluminescent compound is provided to manufacture an organic light emitting diode with excellent driving durability, and to ensure good color purity and lifetime property. CONSTITUTION: An organic electroluminescent compound has a structure represented by chemical formula 1. In chemical formula 1, R1-R10 are independently hydrogen, deuterium, halogen, (C1-C60) alkyl, (C6-C60) aryl, (C3-C60) heteroaryl, morpholino, thiomorpholino, 5-6 membered heterocycloalkyl containing at least one selected from N, O, S and Si, (C3-C60) cycloalkyl, tri(C1-C60) alkylsilyl, di(C1-C60) alkyl (C6-C60) arylsilyl, tri(C6-C60) arylsilyl, adamantly, (C7-C60) bicycloalkyl, (C2-C60) alkenyl, and (C1-C60) alkoxycarbonyl.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LURE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A lure is provided, which prevents corrosion by the moisture or the salinity penetration and achieves perfect waterproof function. CONSTITUTION: A lure comprises an RFID chip(12), a MICOM(14), a speaker(S), a lamp(L), batteries(B1,B2), a lure body(10), and a read/write unit(20). The MICOM stores the received information and outputs it into the voice or light signal. The speaker outputs the voice signal delivered from the MICOM. The lamp outputs the light signal delivered from the MICOM. The battery supplies the power source to the apparatus. The read/write unit transmits a message data to RFID chip.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MEDIA STREAMING SYSTEM AND METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A media transmission system and a method therefor are provided to watch desired media contents by supplying many random access points, and to prevent degradation of compression efficiency produced by supplying the random access points. CONSTITUTION: A user terminal(110) receives the desired play position information for a user. The user terminal regenerates an image stream corresponding to the play position information. A media server(130) streams media data to the user terminal. When the play position information is received from the user terminal, the media server streams the image stream of the compression rate to the user stream.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DEVICE FOR DRAWING BILLS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A device for drawing bills is provided to allow easy insertion of a paper money by allow user to draw a cassette from a case and tilts the cassette a creation angle. CONSTITUTION: In a device for drawing bills, a cassette(10) keeps a paper currency. A case(20) accepts the cassette. Guide devices(30,40) position the cassette in the case and inclines the cassette downward while drawing the cassette from the case. A transfer guide includes a first guide fixed on the cassette and a second guide rotatable with the first guide.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AN APPARATUS FOR FUEL REDUCTION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A fuel reduction device for an internal combustion engine is provided to improve combustion efficiency and cut down on fuel consumption by accelerating ionization of air flowing in the internal combustion engine. CONSTITUTION: A fuel reduction device for an internal combustion engine comprises a coil part(110), a first conductor part(120) which is connected to both ends of the coil part, a light generating part(130) which is connected to the first conductor part, and a second conductor part which is connected to the lower side of the first conductor part.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FILTER A MEDIAN POLE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A filter median pole is provided to absorb and remove air pollutants by forming a filter within the median pole, and to be not easily broken using a metal material. CONSTITUTION: A filter median pole is composed as follows. Multiple holes(13) are formed in a supporting board(12) to be fixed to the ground using anchor bolts. A spring(20) is formed on the top of the supporting board. A cylindrical rod(10) is formed on the spring, and a cover(30) is formed on the cylindrical rod. Multiple suction holes(11) are formed in the cylindrical rod. A filter(50) is formed inside the cylindrical rod.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AN EXPRESSWAY LIGHT USE A SMALL SIZE WIND POWER GENERATOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An expressway light using a small wind power generator is provided to prevent a traffic accident by inducing the tension of a user by forming a reflective sheet on the lower side of a tower and an emergency light combined with a bulb. CONSTITUTION: A cylindrical tower(40) more than 5m is combined with a support board(41). A frame(21) is combined with the side lower than 4.5m of the cylindrical tower. A bulb consuming electricity less than 200W is combined with the end of the frame. A control box is combined inside the cylindrical tower with a bulb and a wire. A storage battery is combined on the control box with the wire. A small generator(10) below 1KW/h is combined with the storage battery with the wire. A vertical central shaft is combined with the small generator. The vertical central shaft is protruded to the outside of the cylindrical tower.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HIGH IMPACT POLYAMIDE RESIN COMPOSITION AND METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A polyamide resin composition is provided to ensure excellent mechanical strength, heat resistance and workability, especially impact strength at a room temperature and low temperature, by comprising glass fiber and additives for strengthening interface adhesion. CONSTITUTION: A polyamide resin composition comprises (a) polyamide 50-85 weight%, (b) impact strength reinforcement 5-20 weight%, (c) additives for strengthening interface adhesion 0.05-10 weight%, and (d) glass fiber 10-30 weight%. The polyamide is a mixture of nylon 6, nylon 66 or their mixture. The impact strength reinforcement is at least one kind selected from the group consisting of ethylene-propylene rubber, ethylene-octene rubber and ethylene-propylene-diene rubber.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CURABLE RESIN COMPOSITION AND LIQUID CRYSTAL DISPLAY DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A curable resin composition is provided to ensure excellent storage stability, UV curing in a shaded portion, and low liquid crystal contamination, and to be useful as a curable resin composition for a sealant for a liquid crystal display device. CONSTITUTION: A curable resin composition comprises an oxime derivative radical photopolymerization initiator, a partial epoxy (meth)acrylate obtained by reaction of an epoxy compound with (meth)acrylic acid, and a thermosetting agent as a dihydrazide derivative with a melting point of 130-160 °C. The oxime derivative is at least one compound selected from compounds represented by chemical formula 1.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR PROVIDING CONTENTS USING PORTABLE TERMINAL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for providing contents using a portable terminal is provided to perform reproduction from a stop location of contents without the portable terminal, thereby providing convenience in use. CONSTITUTION: A portable terminal transmits a content request signal to a content providing server(107). The portable terminal transmits a contents reproduction control signal to the content providing server(111). The content providing server transmits corresponding content data to the portable terminal(113). The portable terminal reproduces the contents on a display(115). The content providing server stores bookmark information of the contents by a stop control signal(121).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: REAR LAMP FOR VEHICLE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A rear lamp for a vehicle is provided to increase user satisfaction by radiating the light generated from a rear lamp uniformly and removing a dark part which is not turned on. CONSTITUTION: In a rear lamp for a vehicle, a lens unit(100) is interposed between a lamp housing and an outer lens. The lens unit forms a forming unit and a second forming unit which are curved faces. Bezels(200) are arranged between lens units by an equal interval.

exch:applicant-name.name: JEONJU UNIVERSITY OFFICE OF INDUSTRY-UNIVERSITY COOPERATION

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DEVICE TO BLEACH ON BAST-FIBER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A device for bleaching bast fibers is provided to bleach bamboo bast and produce Korean paper by processing the bast of bamboo after removing the bark of the paper mulberry and to improve convenience when bleaching the bast fibers. CONSTITUTION: A device for bleaching bast fibers comprises the following: a water tank(10) containing tap water to wash foreign materials from the bast of the paper mulberry; a moving plate, which provides a place to put the bast, installed on the water tank; two or more rollers(32) transferring the moving plate and connected to the moving plate; two or more rails installed on the tank; a chain(31) transferring power; one or more motors(30) providing power to the chain; an ultra-violet ray lamp(40) installed on a lamp support(41); a button part installed on a predetermined location of the lamp support; and a button rod blocking power supplied to the ultra-violet ray lamp.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AN OUTLET

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An electrical outlet is provided to reduce manufacturing costs by reducing the number of components comprising the electrical outlet and integrally forming each component of a spring and an opening and closing part of the electrical outlet. CONSTITUTION: A hinge(2) is formed on the rear surface of a body(1). A static jaw(3) is formed on a side of the hinge. A hinge hole(5) is formed on the center part of an opening part(4). A circular part(6) is formed on the both sides of an opening and closing part. An elastic piece is combined to one side of the opening and closing part. The elastic piece is formed on the static jaw. A protrusion is formed on a body of an outlet.

exch:applicant-name.name: KYUNGPOOK NATIONAL UNIVERSITY INDUSTRY-ACADEMIC COOPERATION FOUNDATION

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PEPTIDES FOR TARGETING ACTIVATED ENDOTHELIAL CELLS AND ATHEROSCLEROSIS AND USES THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A peptide for targeting activated endothelial cells and arteriosclerosis is provided to specifically bind to arteriosclerosis lesion and to detect and diagnosing the lesion. CONSTITUTION: A peptide for targeting activated endothelial cells and atherosclerosis comprises an amino acid sequence of sequence number 1 or 2. A composition for drug delivery contains the peptide for targeting the endothelial cell and arteriosclerosis. The peptide binds to therapeutic agent for arteriosclerosis such as Rapamycin, Lovastatin, Celebrex, Ticlopin. A pharmaceutical composition for treating and preventing arteriosclerosis contains the peptide and therapeutic agent binding to the peptide as active ingredient.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NOVEL ORGANIC ELECTROLUMINESCENT COMPOUNDS AND ORGANIC ELECTROLUMINESCENT DEVICE USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An organic electroluminescent compound is provided to prepare an organic light emitting diode with good driving durability due to excellent luminous efficiency and lifetime, and proper color coordinate. CONSTITUTION: An organic electroluminescent compound has a structure represented by chemical formula 1. In chemical formula 1, Ar is (C6-C60) arylene, (C3-C60) heteroarylene containing at least one selected from N, O and S, 5-6 membered heterocycloalkylene containing at least one selected from N, O and S, (C3-C60) cycloalkenylene, adamantylene, (C7-C60) bicycloalkylene, (C2-C60) alkenylene, (C2-C60) alkynylene, (C1-C60) alkylenethio, (C6-C60) alkyleneoxy, (C6-C60) aryleneoxy, or (C6-C60) arylenethio.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HOT-WATER SUPPLY DEVICE FOR HOT-WATER MAT TO BE EQUIPPED A PRESSURE DEVICE TO CONTROL CIRCULATION VELOCITY OF HOT-WATER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A hot-water supply device for a hot-water mat with a pressure device to control the circulation of hot water is provided to quickly circulate hot water and evenly heat the entire hot-water mat by periodically pressurizing the water provided from a water tank. CONSTITUTION: A hot-water supply device for a hot-water mat includes a hot-water circulation pressing unit(1) which is installed between a water tank(2) and a heater(3) to periodically pressurize the water provided from the water tank and supply the water to the heater. The hot-water circulation pressing unit comprises a tube(9), a pair of compression plates(8), rods, and a driving part. The tube with an inlet check valve(6) for preventing the backflow of the water provided from the water tank and an outlet check valve(7) for supplying the pressurized water to the heater is located between the water tank and the heater. The compression plates compress the surface of the tube. The rods are linked to the compression plates in an X form. The driving part presses or releases the tube with a magnetic force.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DIFFUSION OF LIGHT LENS HAVING BACK SIDE DIFFUSE EMISSION MEANS FOR LED LIGHT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A diffusion of a light lens having back side diffuse emission means for an led light is provided to excellent product by radiating high brightness light and reducing manufacturing costs. CONSTITUTION: An aspherical lens(10) is combined in an end of an LED. The aspherical lens reflects, diffracts, and refracts the light through a diffusion sloped unit from the end of the LED and diffuses the light. A reflective coating unit(20) is formed on the diffusion sloped unit surface of the aspherical lens. The light from the LED is scattered to the side of the LED, reflected and diffused to the side and a rear side of the LED.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR SCRAMBLING IN A WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A scrambling device and a scrambling method are provided to reduce a buffering time for generating a symbol by changing an input and output unit of the scrambling according to a modulation method. CONSTITUTION: A transmitting terminal device includes a selector(304), a plurality of scramblers(306-1 to 306-N), and a plurality of modulators(308-1 to 308-N). The selector selects the scrambling method applied to the transmission bit stream according to the modulation method applied to the bit stream. The scramblers scramble the transmission bit stream according to the scrambling method corresponding to the modulation method. The modulators modulate the scrambled transmission bit stream according to a plurality of modulation methods.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR SUPPORTING MULTICAST/BROADCAST SERVICE OF TERMINAL IN MOBILE COMMUNICATION SYSTEM BASED ON PROXY MOBILE IP SERVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus and a method for supporting multicast/broadcast services of a terminal in a mobile communication system based on a proxy mobile IP service are provided to add multicast/broadcast functions of the terminal, thereby providing multicast/broadcast services to the terminal. CONSTITUTION: When a packet of a terminal is an upward multicast/broadcast packet, an FA(Foreign Agent) adds a header(404) for providing a multicast/broadcast service of the terminal to the packet. The FA adds a header(406) for providing a proxy mobile IPv4(Internet Protocol version4) service of the terminal to the packet. A HA(Home Agent) confirms double encapsulation of the packet. The HA eliminates the two headers. The HA transmits the packet to a destination.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR TRANSMITTING COEXISTANCE BEACON PROTOCOL PACKET IN A CONGNITIVE RADIO BROADBAND WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus and a method for transmitting a coexistence beacon protocol packet in a cognitive wireless communication system are provided to determine a WRAN(Wireless Regional Area Network) which will transmit a CBP packet through competition in a frequency shaft, thereby improving efficiency of CBP transmission without influence of transmission delay. CONSTITUTION: A CBP(Coexistence Beacon Protocol) transmitter generates a time random number and a frequency random number(303). If it is not an indication time of the time random number, the CBP transmitter confirms the reception of a competition beacon of another WRAN(Wireless Regional Area Network)(305,307). If the competition beacon of another WRAN is not received, the CBP transmitter confirms the termination of the first symbol interval of an SCW(Self-Coexistence Window) slot(309). If the competition beacon received through a sub channel does not exist, the CBP transmitter transmits a CBP packet(315,317).

exch:applicant-name.name: UNIV KYUNG HEE UNIV IND COOP
UNIVERSITY-INDUSTRY COOPERATION GROUP OF KYUNG HEE UNIVERSITY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: UBIQUITOUS TECHNICAL DEVELOPMENT PROPRIETY ANALYTICAL METHOD AND ANALYTICAL EQUIPMENT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An analyzing method of ubiquitous technology development feasibility using a black-scholes model and an analyzing device thereof are provided to perform actual case study in order to suggest directionality of investment by performing effective advisory about technology development investment. CONSTITUTION: Using a technology value calculating program which utilizes a black-scholes model, a control unit(510) controls development feasibility analysis of new technology. A black-scholes technology value analysis value(540) analyzes development feasibility of new technology. A storage unit(530) stores inputted information. A communication unit(520) offers a wireless communication interface smoothly communicating multiple smart devices.

exch:applicant-name.name: UNIV KYUNG HEE UNIV IND COOP
UNIVERSITY-INDUSTRY COOPERATION GROUP OF KYUNG HEE UNIVERSITY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: USS TECHNICAL EVALUATION METHOD AND EQUIPMENT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A technology evaluation method of a ubiquitous intelligence space and a device thereof are provided to perform evaluation about a space in which a service is suggested and realized in order to confirm probability of general and individual evaluation of future service. CONSTITUTION: Using a preset condition evaluation table, a condition of a ubiquitous intelligence space is evaluated(S303). About a ubiquitous intelligence space satisfying the condition, a master server evaluates the level of a service offered from the ubiquitous intelligence space(S305). The master server analyzes commercialization-enable time(S313).

exch:applicant-name.name: UNIV KYUNG HEE UNIV IND COOP
UNIVERSITY-INDUSTRY COOPERATION GROUP OF KYUNG HEE UNIVERSITY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: USER CRIME PREVENTION SERVICE METHOD AND EQUIPMENT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A user crime prevention service method and a device thereof are provided to increase the happiness index of users by providing a customized anti-crime service based on the happiness index. CONSTITUTION: A control unit(510) receives crime index data and sets up an anti-crime index by using an expert crime index evaluation level. The control unit provides an anti-crime serve according to the basic anti-crime index level set for each environment. A communication unit(520) provides a wireless communication interface smoothly interworking with a smart device. A storage unit(530) stores the anti-crime index data for each situation.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FLOWERPOT WITH FUNCTION OF LIGHTING AND CRIMEPREVENTING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A flowerpot with illuminating function and anti-theft function is provided to improve growth of flowers planted on the flowerpot, and to improve safety for occupants while improving interior appearance. CONSTITUTION: A flowerpot with illuminating function and anti-theft function comprises the following: an LED light-emitting part(50) emitted by control of a driving part; an intrusion detection part(30) detecting intrusion and outputting an intrusion signal to the driving part; a solar cell part(10) equipped on a planting part and supplying power to the driving part and a storage battery part(20); the storage battery part supplying power to the driving part; and the driving part driving the LED light-emitting part.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HAND DRYER HAVING WINTER-SOWING PREVENTING FUNCTION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A hand dryer equipped with the winter-sowing prevention function is provided, which keeps the temperature of indoor place at the constant temperature. CONSTITUTION: A hand dryer equipped with the winter-sowing prevention function comprises an infrared ray sensor part, a temperature sensing part(20), a fan driving unit(3), a heater drive unit(4), and a controller(2). The infrared ray sensor part senses an object and transmits the detected signal to the controller. The temperature sensing part detects the indoor temperature. The fan driving unit inhales the indoor air to the hand dryer and supplies it to the heater drive unit. The heater drive unit generates the hot air.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DESK CALENDAR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A desk calendar including separated information memos using a Chinese fortune-telling method is provided to offer information that can be helpful in real life by putting a separated information providing paper on the right or the left end of each calendar page. CONSTITUTION: A desk calendar is made out of a relatively thick and hard paper material or a plastic material. The desk calendar comprises: a supporting plate(42) capable of folding to form a triangular structure when standing the calendar; a coil-shaped fitting member(44) with a constant diameter combined with the upper side of the supporting plate to the lateral direction; monthly calendar pages(46) printed with monthly calendars comprising a year with the coil-shaped fitting member on the upper side to flip the pages front and back; and multiple information providing papers(48) arranged in a parallel direction while connected with the coil-shaped fitting member to flip the papers front and back.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PILLAR FOR AUTOMOBILE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A pillar for a vehicle is provided, which prevents the indoor environment of a vehicle from being changed suddenly by forming an air guide part on a pillar. CONSTITUTION: A pillar for a vehicle(100) comprises an A-pillar(101), a B-pillar(102), and a C-pillar(103). An air guide part(110) capable of moving air in the longitudinal direction of the vehicle is formed in one of the A-pillar, B-pillar, and C-pillar. The air guide part is formed in a form of a variable section and is inclined at the constant angle in the longitudinal direction of the vehicle, wherein the diameter of the variable section changes in the longitudinal direction of the vehicle. Furthermore, the air guide part is divided into plural sections by a reinforcement member(120).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ZEROS FILTER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A filter for electronic cigarette is provided, which makes prohibition of smoking success rate enhanced by satisfying a smoking habit of a smoker. CONSTITUTION: A filter for electronic cigarette is constituted as follows. The part to be bitten by the mouth in the filter(3) for electronic cigarette is made of the fabric material like the normal cigarette or the silicone material. The filter for electronic cigarette has a doughnut shape covering the outside of the liquid cartridge. The whole structure is made to be assembled and disassembled.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NICOTINE COMPOSITION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A nicotine aqueous solution for electronic tobacco is provided, which can have the effect that is similar to the smoking of the normal cigarette. CONSTITUTION: A nicotine aqueous solution for electronic tobacco is constituted as follows. The nicotine aqueous solution comprises propylene glycol 50% or more, glycerol 30%, distilled water 10%, nicotine extract 0~3%, orient tobacco incense 1%, menthol 1%, and various kinds of the natural herb scents 1%. The nicotine aqueous solution excludes tar, nicotine and other harmful contents of 4,000 kinds.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BACKLIGHT ASSEMBLE AND LIQUID CRYSTAL DISPLAY APPARATUS HAVING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A back light assembly and a liquid crystal display having the same are provided, which reduce the thickness of the back light assembly and improve efficiency of the light. CONSTITUTION: A back light assembly comprises a light guide plate(200) and a light emitting module(300). The light guide plate guides the light. The light emitting module comprises a plurality of top type light emitting diodes(320) irradiating the light in the direction perpendicular to the mounting surface of the printed circuit board(310).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BLAST VOLUME VARYING APPARATUS USING FLOWING BACKWARD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An air output adjusting device using the backward flowing is provided to control the air output by changing the air output according to the change of the angular velocity. CONSTITUTION: An air output adjusting device using the backward flowing comprises a motor(110) and an impeller(140). The impeller revolves with the drive of the motor. When the impeller revolves, controls the backward flowing volume of the air by the pressure difference generating in the inner side and outside of impeller.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: INSTANT GLUCOMANNAN GRANULE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An instant glucomannan granule is provided to maximize diet effects by rapidly giving feeling of satiety and maintaining the feeling of satiety for a long time, and to prevent or cure lifestyle-related diseases. CONSTITUTION: A manufacturing method of an instant glucomannan granule comprises the following steps: sieving minute powder of glucomannan 90% or more manufactured by an alcohol refining method; granulating the sieved powder after mixing the powder with minute powder; and wrapping the powder with a unit of 0.1~200g.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THE COMPOSITION FOR THE VOICE MANAGEMENT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A composition for protecting voice is provided to supply moisture to larynx and pharynx and remove disorder relating to sputum and cough. CONSTITUTION: A composition for protecting voice contains Schizandra, quince, bellflower, Glycyrrhiza uralensis, pomegranate, Lyncium chinense Miller, kelp, ginseng, black bean, lemon, black sesame, pear, radish, ginkgo, atractylodis Rhizoma alba, and wolfiporia cocos The composition contains 0.1-90 weight parts of schixandra extract, 0.1-90 weight parts of quince extract, 0.1-90 weight parts of bellflower, and 0.01-10 weight parts of magnesium as main ingredients. The composition is used in the form of liquid, powder, granule, pill, tablet, capsule, syrup, juice, suspension, or emulsion.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR SUPPORTING A FRAME OF PANEL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A panel frame supporter is provided to easily fix panels of uniform thickness by installing fastening bolts in the end of frame supporters. CONSTITUTION: A panel frame supporter comprises a first supporter(100), a second supporter(200), and a fastening unit(300). The first supporter supports one edge of a panel. A fixing hole(111) is formed in both ends of the first supporter. The second supporter is arranged in one end of the first supporter, and has a fixing bolt(90) fitted to the fixing hole. And the second supporter supports the other edge of the panel. The fastening unit is formed in the second supporter, and fastens the fixing bolt and the fixing hole.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SLIDE TYPE HINGE MODULE FOR MOBILE COMMUNICATION TERMINAL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A slide type hinge module for a mobile terminal is provided to slide the second body for the first body in right/left directions and slide the third body for the second body in up/down directions, thereby making up/down/right/left sliding opening/closing possible. CONSTITUTION: The first body(130) is combined with the main body of a mobile terminal. The second body(140) is slidably installed in right/left directions of the first body. The third body(150) is slidingly mounted on the second body in up/down directions. A moving body of the mobile terminal is combined with the third body. The first body, the second body and the third body are laminated each other.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR CALCULATION LOCATION BASED ON GPS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method and an apparatus for calculation location based on GPS are provided to decide accurate position by using GSP information of other terminal at short distance. CONSTITUTION: A satellite signal receiving module(300) receives a satellite signal from one or more satellites. A demodulator(302) demodulates the satellite signal and outputs first GPS information. A short range communications unit(306) receives second GPS information from another second terminal in the short distance. A controller(304) determines the position of the terminal by using the demodulated first GPS information and the received second GPS information.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DANDELION PROCESSING METHOD AND DANDELION JUICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for processing dandelion and dandelion extract are provided to prevent adult diseases and a cold by mixing the processed dandelion extract with black garlic extract by passing vapor evaporated in heating through a cooler. CONSTITUTION: A method for processing dandelion comprises the following steps: completely drying the dandelion after washing the dandelion with water; sealing the dried dandelion in a heating container; heating the container with vapor in 100°C ~ 110°C for 7 ~ 8 hours; extracting extract of the dandelion by compressing or dehydrating the heated dandelion in a hemp cloth bag; aging the dandelion extract for 7 ~ 8 hours in 60°C~70; wrapping the aged contents; sterilizing the dandelion extract for 3 hours in 100°C~110°C.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NON VOLATILE MEMORY DEVICE AND METHOD OF OPERATING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A non-volatile memory device and a method for operating the same are provided to inhibit a program operation by preventing a voltage leakage due to a boosting with one word-line which is adjacent to a source selection line. CONSTITUTION: Memory cells(C0 to C31) for storing data are connected to a first word-line. A second word-line is adjacent to a source selection line(SSL). A program mode is maintained for the second word-line. Dummy memory cells(DC) are connected to the second word-line. A turn-off mode is maintained for the dummy memory cells during the program operation of the memory cells.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: VOLTAGE GENERATING CIRCUIT AND NON VOLATILE MEMORY DEVICE HAVING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A voltage generation circuit and a non-volatile memory device including the same are provided to reduce a current consumption by generating a high voltage with the change of clock frequency according to operation sections. CONSTITUTION: A clock logic unit(270) responds to an input signal. The clock logic unit generates a switch clock signal and a pump clock signal with a variable frequency. A high voltage unit(290) generates a high voltage in response to the pump clock signal. A high voltage switch outputs a selection signal in response to the switch clock signal. A switch element(280) responds to the selection signal. The switching element transfers the high voltage to an output node.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HIGH VOLTAGE SWITCHING CIRCUIT AND NON VOLATILE MEMORY DEVICE HAVING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A high voltage switching circuit and a non-volatile memory device including the same are provided to stably apply a high voltage by including a switching circuit which operates regardless of a clock and preventing ripple generated from high voltage which is switched by the clock. CONSTITUTION: A switching device(200) transfers a high voltage. A driver circuit includes a boosting device and a cross coupled charge pump(210). According to a first and a second clock signal, the boosting device boosts the high voltage. The cross coupled charge pump in which the high voltage is input generates an operation voltage to drive the switching device. The switching device is a transistor which is turned on by the operation voltage from the driving circuit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: VOLTAGE GENERATING CIRCUIT AND NON VOLATILE MEMORY DEVICE HAVING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A voltage generation circuit and a non-volatile memory device including the same are provided to reduce current consumption by applying a high voltage in a preset time and preventing a clock generation. CONSTITUTION: A hold control unit(271) outputs a second clock enable signal, a second pump enable signal, a second switch enable signal and a hold enable signal. According to a first or the second clock signal, a high voltage pump(274) generates the high voltage. A switching unit outputs a switching enable signal and a first control signal. The first control signal connects the output unit of the high voltage pump to the output unit of a voltage by a third clock signal. According to the hold enable signal, a switching device(273) controls a first route generation.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NON VOLATILE MEMORY DEVICE AND METHOD OF OPERATING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A non-volatile memory device and a method for operating the same are provided to perform the storage and the change of option information after the initial storage of the option information by storing the option information which is loaded during the initial starting in a memory cell. CONSTITUTION: A memory cell array(310) includes first and second memory blocks. The first memory blocks include memory cells for storing data. The second memory blocks include memory cells for storing option information. Data is read from the second memory block in a starting mode. A bit counter(370) counts the number of data "1" and data"0" in a data group at the same time. According to the counting result, the data of the data group is determined and option information is stored. A control unit(360) performs a operation control based on the option information.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: QUICK FREEZING STICKER ANDLABEL AN INSTRUMENT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A container having a refrigerant label is provided to maintain cold liquid phase and to resolve inconvenient of using ice bottle. CONSTITUTION: A container having a refrigerant label has a label(40) containing a refrigerant material attached on the outside. An adhesive member is attached inside the label and a company logo is configured at the other side. The refrigerant is inserted between inside and other side of the label. The container is made of a material selected from paper, synthetic resin, metal, rubber, and silicon.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: WASHING DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A washing device is provided to prevent a substrate from being damaged by applying shock to only foreign materials. CONSTITUTION: A washing device comprises a substrate entry guiding unit(100), a foreign material removing unit(200), a foreign material washing unit(300), and a position control unit(400). The substrate entry guiding unit advances a substrate(SUB) in a right direction. The substrate is supplied to the foreign material removing unit. The foreign material removing unit removes foreign materials within the substrate. The foreign material washing unit washes foreign materials remained on the substrate. The position control unit controls the position of the substrate carried from the foreign material washing unit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MOBILE TERMINAL METHOD FOR DISPLAYING AND INFORMATION THEREIN

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A mobile terminal and an information providing method using the same are provided to recognize a sensing signal for motion of the mobile terminal as a text input signal, thereby increasing user convenience of inputting a text by a limited number of keys. CONSTITUTION: A mobile terminal(700) comprises a motion sensing unit(710), a manipulation unit(720), a memory(730) and a controller(740). The motion sensing unit outputs a sensing signal according to the movement of the mobile terminal. The manipulation unit generates a key input signal for operation control of the mobile terminal. The controller recognizes the sensing signal of the motion sensing unit and a key input signal of the manipulation unit as text input signals.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD OF MANUFACTURING SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for manufacturing a semiconductor device is provided to improve the intensity of a combination between a copper via and a lower copper pad by removing a vacancy in a copper plating film. CONSTITUTION: A wiring insulation layer(110) is etched to form a copper pad area. A metal barrier layer(200) and a copper seed layer are deposited in the copper pad area. The copper pad area is filled with copper through a plating process. After the copper is plated on the copper pad area, a wafer is thermally treated. Copper wiring is formed on the wafer through a planarization process. An upper copper pad(700) and a copper via(600) are formed through a copper filling the planarization processes.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NEW PREPARATION OF DONEPEZIL, DONEPEZIL HYDROCHLORIDE AND INTERMEDIATE THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for preparing donepezil, donepezil hydrochloride and intermediated thereof is provided to prepare the donepezil and donepezil hydrochloride without by-products and impurities. CONSTITUTION: A donephezil is prepared by reacting 1-benzyl-4-[(5,6-dimethoxy-1-indanone)-2ylidene]methylpyperidinol with diemthyl1,4-dihydro-2,6-dimethyl-3,5-pyridinedicarbozylate under the presence of weak acid catalyst. The weak acid catalyst is silica gel or alumina. The reaction temperature is 80-150°C. The donepezil hydrochloride is prepared by reacting donepezil and hydrochloric acid.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THE DESK TO BE RECEIVED CHAIR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A desk for receiving a chair is provided, which makes a place for moving a chair unnecessary and provides a space for facilitating cleaning. CONSTITUTION: A desk for receiving a chair comprises a top sleeve part, a chair part, a turning member(27), and a receipt box(30). The top sleeve part has a semicircle shape capable of opening and shutting. The chair part connects one end of the fixing lower part sleeve fixed to the rear leg(3) by a hinge. The turning member can rotate the upper plate(26), both side support stands(28), and an upper plate supporting the upper plate. In the receipt box, the left and right arm rests(6) are accepted in the lower part of the cabinet(29) attached to the desk lower plate.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COMPOSITION HAVING SKIN WHITENING ACTIVITY COMPRISING AN EXTRACT OF BUDDLEJA OFFICINALIS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cosmetic composition containing Buddleja officinalis extract for skin whitening is provided to suppress tyrosinase activity and melanogenesis and to ensure excellent skin whitening effects. CONSTITUTION: A cosmetic composition for skin whitening contains Buddleja officinalis extrtact. The extract is isolated using water, C1-C4 alcohol, or C1-C4 aqueous alcohol solution. A method for extracting the Buddleja officinalis comprises: a step of extracting the Buddleja officinalis with water, C1-C4 alcohol, or C1-C4 aqueous alcohol solution; a step of adding water and n-hexane to separate an aquerous layer; and a step of adding ethyl acetate to the aqueous layer to separate an ethyl actate layer. A pharmaceuitcal composition for preventing and treating pigmentation contains Buddleja officinalis extrtact and pharmaceutically acceptable carrier. The cosmetic composition is used in the form of skin lotion, whitening cream, or whitening essence.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ION IMPLANT METHOD OF PREVENTING PHOTORESIST POPPING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An ion implantation method is provided to prevent photo-resist popping by rotating a wafer during an ion implantation process in order to implant ions to the area to be patterned of a photo-mask. CONSTITUTION: A photo-mask is patterned by performing a photo process and an etching process. The photo-mask is used for forming the source and the drain of a transistor in the pixel of a CMOS image sensor. An ion is implanted on the area to be patterned of the photo-mask by rotating a wafer. A wafer is rotated by 90 degrees each time.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PARKING INFORMATION ON CELL PHONE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A parking position guide system using cellular phone is provided to conveniently confirm the parking position through the cellular phone and to reduce unnecessary time and effort to look for the parking position. CONSTITUTION: A transmitter(3) transmits its own location using a character, voice and an image. A receiver(1) receives information including its own location, a generic number, the voice, the image, and other data. A bluetooth device(2) is attached to vehicle. The bluetooth device is connected to engine operation situation. A data / system server(4) takes charge of certification of users, administration of pop up of a stand-by screen, and rental fee charging.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR FABRICATION OF SEMICONDUCTOR CAPABLE OF PREVENTING PATTERN COLLAPSE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for manufacturing a semiconductor device is provided to prevent a pattern from collapsing after a photo-resistor is developed by keeping a constant temperature in a developing chamber. CONSTITUTION: A photo-resist is applied on a wafer(100). The photo-resist is exposed through a reticle pattern. The exposed photo-resist is developed in a developing chamber(600) with a constant temperature by applying a developing solution. The developing solution is removed by rotating a wafer. The wafer is rinsed with an ultrahigh purity of de-ionized water. The de-ionized water is removed by rotating the rinsed wafer.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MANUFACTURING METHOD OF METAL WIRING IN SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for manufacturing a metal wiring in a semiconductor device is provided to prevent a short circuit between wirings due to a metal residue by performing a chemical mechanical polishing(CMP) process after a wiring layer is formed. CONSTITUTION: A first insulation layer(2) is deposited on a semiconductor substrate(1). A trench is formed in the first insulation layer. A first metal layer is deposited on the first insulation layer. A CMP process is performed on the first metal layer to form a first wiring layer(4a). A second insulation layer(5a) is deposited on the first insulation layer and the first wiring layer. The trench is formed in the second insulation layer. A second metal layer is deposited on the second insulation layer. The CMP process is performed on the second metal layer to form a second wiring layer.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SCANNING METHOD OF SEMICONDUCTOR PROCESS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A scanning-exposure method in a semiconductor manufacturing process is provided to form regular patterns on a wafer by preventing the dispersion or the distortion of a pattern size. CONSTITUTION: A reticle(400) is manufactured using a photo process and an etching process. The reticle includes a reticle pattern(410). During a scanning-exposure process, a wafer(500) is moved without the movement of the reticle. A reduced wafer pattern(510) is formed by adjusting the speed of a wafer scanning. In the reticle pattern, the size of a transversal axis is 10nm to 30nm and the size of a longitudinal axis is 10nm to 50nm.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BURNISHING SYSTEM FOR MACHINING OF BALL STUD IN THE STEERING SYSTEM OF VEHICLE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A burnishing system for machining a ball stud of a steering device for a vehicle is provided to relieve shock when a burnishing process by uniformly maintaining pressing force. CONSTITUTION: A burnishing system(10) for machining a ball stud of a steering device for a vehicle comprises a burnishing wheel(20), a pressure control spring, and a contact pressure regulator(18). The burnishing wheel is installed in a sliding holder(14), and arranged in a shaft(26). A needle roller bearing and a thrust bearing(24) are installed in the shaft. The pressure control spring is installed inside a sleeve(12). The contact pressure regulator is installed outside the sleeve. During a burnishing process, roughness of the surface of a ball stud is controlled.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PRINTED CIRCUIT BOARD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A printed circuit board is provided to prevent the deformation of a substrate due to thermal expansion difference between a chip and the substrate by differently forming the thermal expansion rates of insulation layers. CONSTITUTION: A first insulation layer(20) is formed on the upper side of a core layer(10). The first insulation layer is formed by stacking a plurality of insulation layers with a circuit. The first insulation layer has a preset thermal expansion rate. A second insulation layer(30) is formed on the lower side of the core layer by stacking the plurality of insulation layers with the circuit. The second insulation layer has the thermal expansion rate which is different from the first insulation layer. The thermal expansion rate is in proportion to the circuit area formed on the surface of the first and second insulation layers.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LED PACKAGE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A light emitting diode(LED) package is provided to maximize the heat radiation effect of the package by protruding a plurality of heat-sink plates on the peripheral side of a heat-sink. CONSTITUTION: An LED package includes a heat-sink(110), a package body(120) with a cavity, a pair of lead frames(130) and an LED chip(140). A plurality of heat-sink plates(113) is protruded on the peripheral side of the heat-sink in a radial shape. A space for filling a molding material is formed between the heat-sink plates. The package body is placed on the upper side of the heat-sink. The lead frames are arranged on the upper side of the heat sink and are expanded to both sides of the heat sink. The LED chip is mounted in the cavity.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SEWING LINE HAVING SHOES AND MANUFACTURING METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: Footwear having sewing line and a manufacturing method thereof are provided, which enable the effect that the sewing line is cleanly washed. CONSTITUTION: Footwear having sewing line comprises an outsole(300) protecting the plantar and the uppers of leather(200). The uppers of leather protects instep while being combined with the outsole. The sewing line is formed by pressing the uppers of leather using a mold equipped with a sewing line(210) molding unit. The sewing line has a plurality of grooves at a constant interval.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR OUTPUTTING OF AUDIO SIGNAL IN DISPLAY DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A voice signal output apparatus for a display device and a method thereof are provided to supply an optimized voice signal for a user by applying optimized equalizer function according to a preset voice mode. CONSTITUTION: A voice signal analysis part(20) acquires a frequency bandwidth level value by analysis of a voice signal on an external interface part(10). A control part sets the frequency bandwidth level value for compensation of the input voice signal by the analysis between frequency bandwidth reference values according to a preset voice mode and a bandwidth level value. A voice signal compensation part(50) compensates the voice signal according to the compensation values on frequency band compensation values.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: TRIPPING DEVICE FOR MCCB

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A trip device for a molded case circuit breaker is provided to easily perform a reset operation to an on state after a trip operation according to the open of N phase by rotating the only handle. CONSTITUTION: A molded case circuit breaker includes a detection circuit unit(30), and an open phase trip device(40). The detection circuit unit detects an open phase of a neutral line and an excess/low voltage. The detection circuit unit is installed between an excessive current detector and a load terminal. The detection circuit unit detects the excessive or low voltage according to the open phase of the neutral line, transmits the detection signal to the open phase trip device and receives the signal of the detection circuit unit. The open phase trip device induces the trip by generating a magnetic force opposite to the permanent magnet in a coil according to the received signal.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR MANUFACTURI NG FLYING TAIL TYPE RIGID-FLEXIBLE PRINTED CIRCUIT BOARD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for manufacturing a flying tail type rigid printed circuit board is provided to constantly maintain the thickness and the coating quantity of IR ink by coating the exfoliation ink for protecting IR ink. CONSTITUTION: A rigid printed circuit board is prepared. A coverlay(117) for exposing a part of the rigid printed circuit board is coated. IR ink(120) is coated on the rigid printed circuit board exposed by the coverlay. The exfoliation ink is coated on the IR ink. A prepreg layer(140), a substrate(143), and a copper plate(145) are successively stacked on the upper and lower sides of the rigid printed circuit board. A rigid region and a flexible region are formed through a stack process. An outer layer circuit pattern is formed on the copper plate of the rigid printed circuit board. The copper plate is removed from the flexible region. The exfoliation ink is removed.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: INDEPENDENT POWER STYLE ION OCCURRENCE SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A self-powered ion generator is provided, which utilizes environment-friendly energy as the drive power after generating the environment-friendly energy. CONSTITUTION: A self-powered ion generator is constituted as follows. The generator(20) supplies the power source to the ion generation circuit(10) consisting of the ion generation ceramics discharge plate(70) and ion generation circuit. The bulk capacitor(30) having the protection circuit between the generator and ion generation circuit is established. The up-step regulator(40) is established between the bulk capacitor and ion generation circuit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR CONTROLLING TEMPERATURE OF CALORIFIC WINDOW

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A device for controlling the temperature of a heating window is provided to remove dew condensation generated on the surface of the heating window by heating a nano material layer. CONSTITUTION: A device for controlling the temperature of a heating window comprises a heating window(30), a power supply unit(40), a dew condensation detecting part(50), and a controller(60). The heating window comprises a nano material layer(30b) and a power terminal(30c). The nano material layer is composed of a transparent substrate and a carbon nanotube formed on the transparent substrate. The power supply unit applies power on the power terminal. The dew condensation detecting part detects the dew condensation generated on the heating window. The controller analyzes signals detected through the dew condensation detecting part and controls the power supplied to the power terminal.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR AUTO EXTRACTING MEDIAL SURFACE OF 3D CAD MODEL FOR THE PRODUCTS ANALYSIS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An automatic medial surface extracting method of a 3D CAD model for product analysis is provided to rapidly and exactly search a face pair to be extracted to a medial surface through selective searching method. CONSTITUTION: Thickness surfaces and edge pairs of each thickness surface is searched by performing MAT(Medial Axis Transform)(S1). A face pair connected to the thickness surfaces is searched(S2). Other face pairs connected from registered face pair is successively searched. According to each face pair, medial surface pieces are generated(S3). The medial surface pieces are interconnected(S4).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PROCESS FOR PREPARING SYNTHETIC INTERMEDIATES OF PENEM OR CARBAPENEM ANTIBIOTICS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for preparing (S)-4-phenyl-3-propioniloxazolidine-2-one is provided to massively produce the compound industrially and prepare intermediate, β-4-BMA with high yield. CONSTITUTION: A compound of chemical formula 2 is prepared by reacting propionil halide or propionil anhalide with a compound of chemical formula 1 under the presence of Lewis acid and weak base. The Lewis acid is LiCl. The weak base is triethylamine. A method for preparing a compound of chemical formula 4 comprises: a step of adding 1-3 equivalent of Lewis acid with a compound of chemical formula 2 based on 1 equivalent of compound of chemical formula 3 and adding base; and a step of the compound of chemical formula 3 and 0.3-0.6 equivalent of Lewis acid to reaction mixture based on 1 equivalent of chemical formula 3.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MAGIC STICK UMBRELLA

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A magic rod umbrella is provided, which has a simple structure, is conveniently assembled, and can be endured against the wind pressure. CONSTITUTION: A magic rod umbrella is constituted as follows. A magic rod umbrella has a form that a bar receives the umbrella film when being folded. The magic rod umbrella is made of urethane with a superior tension or a silicon natural rubber. Thee umbrella film is spread and received within in umbrella ribs on one side or fixed to the umbrella ribs.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BALLOON UMBRELLA

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A balloon umbrella is provided, which enables to recognize one's own umbrella in the place where many peoples are gathered. CONSTITUTION: A balloon umbrella is constituted as follows. The balloon made of urethane with good elasticity, natural rubber, silicone is built in the protection cover and is inserted into the corner part. Thereafter, the balloon umbrella is connected to the exit of the flexible zebra pump and surrounds the pump using spring. The action of the pump and opening and shutting of umbrella are operated at the same time.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PIEZORESISTIVE COMPOSITE WITH HIGH HARDNESS AND CONDUCTIVITY AND METHOD FOR PREPARING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A piezoresistive composite and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to prevent the deformation of a conductive particle due to repetitive use by obtaining high hardness. CONSTITUTION: A piezoresistive composite includes a conductive ceramic particle of 35-70% based on a polymer ectromelus. The polymer ectromelus has high insulation resistance and elasticity and is made of one or mixture selected from silicon rubber, polyurethanes, low density polyethylene, and high density polyethylene. The conductive ceramic particle is a compound including group III to VIII transition metal on a periodic table.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THE METHOD OF READABILITY INDEXING SYSTEM BASED ON LEXICAL DIFFICULTY AND THESAURUS UTILIZING THE RELATION OF PUBLICATION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A book index providing system and a method thereof are provided to calculate more reliable book index by considering a variable of prints in a book index providing system including a book index calculation program and a lexical difficulty thesaurus. CONSTITUTION: A file for which a book index is calculated is selected, is converted into a text file and a pretreatment procedure is performed(201). A text is divided into sentenced unit(203). The inputted sentences are analyzed by morpheme, and error in the analysis of morpheme is corrected based on difficulty thesaurus(205). A first book index is calculated by extracting an adverb, a noun, a subject and a case mark and comparing the those sentence with thesaurus, and providing a grade for each word(206). The final book index is calculated by the print conversion for the first book index(207).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BUOYANCY BAG

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A buoyant bag is provided, which is used as the original bag function in the normal times and can be used as an aid when the safety accident occurs. CONSTITUTION: A buoyant bag comprises a slide fastener(14) which opens and shuts the bag(10) and a handle(15) and is formed of an internal space. The buoyant material of the flat board is inserted between the outer cover and inner cover. The outer cover and slide fastener are made of water proof material and is composed so that the air of the internal space can't be exposed outside. A rope to which a detachable clip(17) is connected is inserted into the internal space.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DIVERSITY ANTENNA USING LOOP ANTENNA
