exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A diversity antenna using a loop antenna is provided to perform a diversity function without installing an additional diversity antenna by installing a control device on the terminal. CONSTITUTION: A loop element(202) has a loop shape. At least one pin diode(210,212) is inserted between the loop elements. A forward bias or reverse bias is applied to the pin diode according to a mode of a mobile communication terminal. The loop element is operated as a diversity antenna in the other bands according to the reverse bias applied to the pin diode. The loop element is operated as a radiator with a length from a feeding point to the pin diode insertion point according to the reverse bias applied to the pin diode.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR ATTACHING OR DETACHING LIGHT BULB

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus for attaching or detaching a lamp on a high ceiling is provided to maximize efficiency of replacing the lamp by installing the lamp on a high ceiling without using a ladder. CONSTITUTION: A lamp griping unit(100) grips a lamp. A lampshade griping unit(200) includes a wing unit for griping both ends of the lampshade and a wing control unit for controlling the open and close of the wing. A lamp rotating rod(300) supports the lamp griping unit and separates the lamp from a socket by rotating the lamp griping unit. A height control pipe(400) has a pipe structure to surround the outside of the lamp rotating rod. The height control pipe supports the lampshade gripping unit which includes a lamp gripper, a lamp grip support, and a lamp grip string.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: IMAGE SENSOR AND FORMING METHOD THEREFOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An image sensor and a method for manufacturing the same are provided to secure a bridge margin between adjacent micro lenses by allowing the micro lenses to obtain different surface properties. CONSTITUTION: A light sensor(104) and a color filter array(108) are formed on a semiconductor substrate. The first group of micro lenses(112) is separated each other on the semiconductor substrate. The first group of micro lenses includes the first type of surface property. The second group of micro lenses(116) is formed between the first group of micro lenses. The second group of micro lenses includes the second type of surface property.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR FORMING FINE PATTERN IN SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for forming fine patterns in a semiconductor device is provided to finely form a line and a space pattern using a first mask pattern for a line and a second mask pattern for a space. CONSTITUTION: A hard mask is formed on a semiconductor substrate. A first photo-resist pattern is formed on the hard mask. The first photo-resist pattern is etched to form a first hard mask pattern(33). A second photo-resist pattern is formed on the first hard mask pattern. The first hard mask pattern is etched to form a second hard mask pattern(35). A line and a space pattern is formed using the first hard mask pattern and the second hard mask pattern.

PURPOSE: A container lid making a crushed container reset is provided to restore a shape of the crushed container by swelling the container due to inflow of air even when a stopper of the lid is closed and to automatically block incoming and outgoing of the air after restoring the shape. CONSTITUTION: A container lid making a crushed container reset comprises a lid stopper(1) and a lid body(2). A hole is included in the lid stopper and a special hole is installed in the lid body to be separate from the hole in which content comes out. The special hole has an inverse current preventing function to make air and the content move only to the inner part of the container from the outside. A soft pad is installed in the inner side of the container for having the inverse current preventing function.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A CONTROL DEVICE FOR AUTOMATICALLY CONTROLLING A ROTARY/PLOWING DEVICE IN A TRACTOR, A CONTROL DEVICE FOR BOTH AUTOMATICALLY AND MANUALLY CONTROLLING A ROTARY/PLOWING DEVICE THEREIN, AND A TRACTOR HAVING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A controller for automatically controlling a rotary/plowing device in a tractor, an automatic and manual controller, and a tractor having the same are provided, which make necessary energy(oil) remarkably diminished in the control. CONSTITUTION: A controller for automatically controlling a rotary/plowing device in a tractor comprises a forward and backward control device(210), an elevation control device, and a rotary rotation control switch(230). The forward and backward control device comprises front and rear levers which go in gear with the forward gear and back gear. The elevation control device is connected in the operation of front and rear levers and controls rising and lowering of the rotary/plow work. The rotary rotation control switch controls the PTO switch in a switching mode.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LIQUID CRYSTAL DISPLAY DEVICE AND DRIVING METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A liquid crystal display and a driving method thereof are provided to compensate a charge sharing period by partitioning the charge time of data into a plurality of charge time. CONSTITUTION: A liquid crystal display device includes a data driver(102), an LCD panel(100), and a timing controller. The data driver drives a dataline. The LCD panel comprises a first sub pixels charging data which has an opposite polarity to a previous horizontal period and a second sub pixels charging data which has a same polarity to a previous horizontal period. The timing controller generates compensation data and supplies the data to the data driver in order to compensate data corresponding to one charge period.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ORAL IRRIGATOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A mouth cleansing device is provided, which is capable of pragmatical use and removes possibility of hurting the oral cavity by the separation of the injection nozzle. CONSTITUTION: A mouth cleansing device comprises an inflow water housing(1), a water flow controller(2a), and an injection nozzle(3a). In the inflow water housing, the mouth cleansing water flows through the influx hose. The water flow controller is installed inside the inflow water housing and secludes the flowing waterway by the water pressure of the mouth cleansing water. The injection nozzle is detachably combined with the inflow water housing.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A DEVICE FOR SUPER COOLING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A super-cooling device is provided to prevent the surface temperature of liquid in the bottom of an air layer from being risen by the air layer. CONSTITUTION: A super-cooling device has a cover member and a liquid container(100). The cover member has a heater. One side of the liquid container is accepted inside the cover member. A partition(140) is installed inside the liquid container, and divides inside of the liquid container. A connecting hole(150) is formed in the center of the partition. When the liquid container is accepted in the cover member, the partition is located lower than the lowermost part of the heater.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AN ANTI-FIRE DOOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A fire prevention door is provided to maximally delay combustion of the door by improving a fireproof function of the door. CONSTITUTION: A fire prevention door(1) comprises a frame(11), a core member(20), a medium density fiberboard, and chlorinated rubber resin. The frame forms an exterior of the door. The core member is installed inside the frame, and composed of a wood wool cement board with strong flame-resistance. The medium density fiber board covers the front and rear surfaces of the core member. The chlorinated rubber resin is spread on the medium density fiber board.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR GENERATING VIBRATION AND PORTABLE TERMINAL EMPLOYING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A vibration generation apparatus and a portable terminal using the same are provided to supply various feedbacks to a user by generating a mechanical and intermittent vibration. CONSTITUTION: A coil(11) generates a magnetic flux according to driving power. A magnetic material(12) forms a magnetic field. A structure(14) comprises a hemi spherical unit(13). The hemi spherical unit is protruded according to electromagnetic force generated by the mutual action with the magnetic flux and the magnetic field. A core(15) is positioned on the center of the coil to increase the magnetic flux density. A yoke(16) controls the direction of the magnetic field formed by the magnetic unit. The magnetic unit is attached to the hemi spherical unit and is positioned on the central axis of the coil.

exch:applicant-name.name: PUSAN NAT UNIV IND COOP FOUND
PUSAN NATIONAL UNIVERSITY INDUSTRY-UNIVERSITY COOPERATION FOUNDATION

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MANUFACTURING METHOD OF FERROELECTRIC ZNCOO POWDER TREATED HYDROGEN AND THE ZNCOO POWDER, LASER PRINTER TONER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method of producing ferromagnetic ZnCoO(zinc carbon oxide) powder, the ferromagnetic ZnCoO powder produced from thereof, and a laser printer using thereof are provided to obtain the ferromagnetic ZnCoO powder at room temperature using a strong interaction between hydrogen and cobalt. CONSTITUTION: A method of producing ferromagnetic ZnCoO powder comprises the following: synthesizing ZnCoO powder using inorganic materials including Zn and Co, respectively through a physicochemical reaction; and magnetize the ZnCoO powder by inserting hydrogen to the ZnCoO powder using a plasma processing. The physicochemical reaction for producing the ZnCoO powder is selected from the group consisting of a sol-gel method, a hydrothermal reaction, or a polymerization method.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SLIDING MOBILE PHONE HAVING AUXILIARY COVER AND MANUFACTURING METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A slide cellular phone equipped with a sub cover and a method for manufacturing the same are provided to maintain a slim shape of the cellular phone and to secure enough resonance space of a speaker by opening and closing the sub cover. CONSTITUTION: A first main body(10) includes a guide groove. The guide groove is extended to both sides of the first main body. A second main body(20) is close with the first main body. The second main body is connected to the first main body to be slid. A speaker unit(21) is installed in the second main body. A sub cover(30) is installed on the bottom side of the first main body. A guide is projected on both sides of the sub cover. The guide slides along the guide groove of the first main body.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CMOS IMAGE SENSOR AND METHOD FOR FABRICATING OF THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A CMOS image sensor and a method for manufacturing the same are provided to improve the light collection efficiency of a photo-diode by forming an inclined photo-diode. CONSTITUTION: The parts of a semiconductor substrate(50) which correspond to each color filter layer are etched into different thicknesses. Photo-diodes(48) are formed on the etched semiconductor substrate. An interlayer insulation layer and a protective layer are formed on the substrate. Color filter layers(56) which correspond to the photo-diodes are formed on the protective layer. A planarization layer is formed on the color filter layers. The micro lens is formed on the front side of the planarization layer.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MOBILE TERMINAL AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING IN THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A mobile terminal and a control method thereof are provided to display current screen composition suitably to an external device when the external device is mounted on a terminal, in order to conveniently and rapidly input characters. CONSTITUTION: An interface unit(170) is composed for connection with an external device. If connection with the external device is performed through the interface unit, a control unit(180) changes a touch screen into a screen related to the external device. An idle screen in which icons for performing multiple functions is displayed is displayed on the touch screen.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MOBILE DEVICE AND METHOD OF PROVIDING USER INTERFACE USING SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A mobile terminal and a method for offering an user interface using the same are provided to easily recognize an user identity module related to properties of with present function and the user interface which is offered with an item. CONSTITUTION: A memory(160) stores a plurality of user interface(UI) information and a plurality of items. A plurality of user interface information is corresponded to each of a plurality of user identity modules. A plurality of items is related to each of a plurality of functions of a mobile terminal. A controller(180) offers one or more item and the user interface together. The user interface information is corresponded to the user identity module related to one or more item.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD OF FORMING GERMANIUM NANOCRYSTALS AND METHOD OF FABRICATING A NON-VOLATILE MEMORY DEVICE HAVING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for forming a germanium nano-crystal and a method for manufacturing a non-volatile memory device including the same are provided to control the position, the size and the crystallinity of the germanium nano-crystals by adjusting the position and the thickness of an amorphous germanium layer. CONSTITUTION: An electronic beam is radiated on a semiconductor substrate. The semiconductor substrate includes an amorphous germanium layer which is formed between a plurality of oxide layers. A plurality of germanum nano-crystal is formed in a B region which is between a tunnel oxide layer and a control oxide layer after a thermal treatment is performed on the substrate. The energy of the electronic beam ranges between 1MeV to 2MeV. The dose of the electronic beam ranges between 10^15/cm^2 to 10^17/cm^2.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ANTI ROLLBACK WHEEL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An anti-rollback wheel is provided, which facilitates prevention of anti-rollback and facilitates rollback if the braking power is eliminated. CONSTITUTION: An anti-rollback wheel comprises a central axis, a constraining member, a rotating member, a power transmission element, an elastic member, and a braking part. The central axle is installed not to revolve in the car body. The constraining member is fixed and combined with the hub and comprises a plurality of power transmission sides. The rotating member unites with the constraining member to be rotatable and has a power transmission side facing the power transmission side of the constraining member. The power transmission element is operated to be press-fitted between the power transmission side of the rotating member and constraining member or to be separated. The elastic member pressurizes the power transmission element in the direction of the rollback of the vehicles. The braking part is fixed and combined with the central axis and provides frictional force.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FABRICATING METHOD OF OXIDATION LAYER OF SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for manufacturing the oxide layer of a semiconductor device is provided to form the oxide layer with a constant thickness by applying radical oxygen to a nitride layer. CONSTITUTION: A trench is formed on a semiconductor substrate(S1). The trench is embedded in an insulator to form an element isolation layer(S2). A nitride layer is formed on the surface of the semiconductor substrate(S3). The nitride layer is arranged on the outer circumference of the element isolation layer. Radical oxygen is applied to the nitride film to form an oxide layer(S4). The thickness of the nitride layer ranges between 10 to 15Å.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR FORMING SILICIDE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for forming silicide is provided to prevent a delay in a silicide formation process by simultaneously performing a thermal treatment with multiple temperatures in one thermal treatment process. CONSTITUTION: A substrate including a gate and a source/drain is prepared(S1). A metal layer is formed on the upper side of the substrate (S2). Thermal treatment is performed on the upper side of the metal layer(S3). The temperature of the thermal treatment changes in a wide range. The gate and the source/drain react to the metal layer in order to form silicide. The part of the metal layer that is not reacted to the gate and the source/drain is removed (S4).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MASK MAKING METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for manufacturing a mask is provided to improve the accuracy of a critical dimension by applying dummy patterns according to the density of a main pattern on a mask substrate. CONSTITUTION: A mask substrate including at least one main pattern is prepared(S1a). A first dummy pattern is formed on the mask substrate based on optical proximity compensation(S3a). A second dummy pattern is formed on the mask substrate based on the density of the mask substrate on which the first dummy pattern is formed(S4a). An auxiliary pattern is formed on the main pattern of the mask substrate(S2a).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: IMAGE SENSOR AND MEASURING METHOD OF CROSS TALK OF THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An image sensor and a method for measuring crosstalk are provided to verify the generation of spectral crosstalk by forming a dummy sub-pixel in a dummy area. CONSTITUTION: An image sensor includes a pixel area, a logic area, and a dummy area. The dummy area includes a dummy sub-pixel(301). The dummy sub-pixel is separated from the pixel area. The dummy sub-pixel includes a substrate(310), a photo diode(320), an insulation layer(330), a first color filter(341), a planarization layer(350), and a micro lens(360). The second color filter is placed on the upper side of the first color filter.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PHOTOSENSITIVE POLYMER FOR PHOTORESIST AND MANUFACTURING METHOD THEREOF AND PHOTORESIST COMPOSITION COMPRISING THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A photosensitive polymer for a photoresist, a manufacturing method thereof, and a photoresist composition comprising the same are provided to be used in a lithographic process using a DUV excimer-laser source due to excellent etching resistance and adhesion with an underlayer. CONSTITUTION: A photosensitive polymer for a photoresist comprises a structure of chemical formula 1. In chemical formula 1, R1 and R2 are C1 ~ 10 alkyl group; R3 is a methyl group, ethyl group or isopropyl group; x, y and z are 1 ~ 60 mole % as mole % of each repeating unit. The photosensitive composition comprises the photosensitive polymer, photoacid generator, and organic solvent.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR CONTROLLING LIGHT AND DARKNESS OF IMAGE DISLPLAY DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A light correction device of an image display device and a method thereof are provided to correctly determine brightness of an image by determining lightness of the images according to frequency of pixels in each divided areas and average brightness values. CONSTITUTION: An image analysis part(20) analyzes luminance frequency of a signal bandwidth image and luminance frequency of an input image signal. An information processor(30) reads a video signal input-output function of a memory unit(40) with the average luminance information. The information processor process the video signal input-output function with the luminance frequency information of each bandwidth image. A control part(50) controls output of a contrast-adjusted image.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AN APPARATUS AND SYSTEM FOR TESTING A PANEL OR MODULE OF DISPLAY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus and a system for testing a panel or a module of a display are provided to find out accurate cause of a defective panel by monitoring the operation of each circuit element. CONSTITUTION: A main cover(210) covers a circuit board(120) of an object to be tested and provides a predetermined closed space. A sub-cover(220) is larger than the main cover to covers the main cover. A protective cover(230) prevents damage to the main cover and sub-cover. The protective cover comprises a connecting member connected to the sub-cover.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COOLING DEVICE FOR YARN COATED SYNTHETIC RESINS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cooling device for synthetic resin-coated yarns is provided to save installation cost and reduce an installation area by cooling the yarns with compressed air, and to improve convenience for using and installing the cooling device. CONSTITUTION: A cooling device for synthetic resin-coated yarns comprises the following: a main body with a space part(21) inside; a cooling jacket(30) mounted on the space part of the inside of the main body; and an air supply pipe(60) supplying compressed air to the cooling jacket. The main body includes a cover combined on a housing(22), a settling groove(24) on which the cooling jacket is inserted, and an air inlet used for injecting the compressed air and formed on the front side of the main body.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MOTOR FOR MAGNETIC RESONANCE EQUIPMENT AND CONTROL METHOD OF THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A motor for a magnetic resonance equipment and a control method thereof are provided to remove a loss of power by directly supplying the power to various medical instruments. CONSTITUTION: A core(210) with a plurality of coils(214) is formed inside a bore of magnetic resonance equipment. A rotary shaft(220) passes through the core. A commutator(230) is formed on the rotary shaft. A brush(240) is formed on the circumference of commutator. The coil is at right angles to the direction of a main magnetic field inside the bore. A sensor coil(312) is formed on the end of the rotary shaft. An electromotive force sensor(314) measures an inductive electromotive force from a sensing coil. The magnetic sensor measures the main magnetic field inside the bore. A PID controller outputs a correction signal according to the variation quantity of the main magnetic field measured by the magnetic field sensor.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: WEATHER DATA TRANSMISSION/RECEPTION SYSTEMS OF AUTOMATED WEATHER OBSERVATION SYSTEMS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A weather data transmission/reception system of an automatic weather observation system is provided to prevent an aviation accident due to abrupt weather change and bad weather by offering real-time weather information to an aircraft. CONSTITUTION: A display device(2) receives weather information which is necessary in an aircraft. A central command room(20) collects the weather information of each region. The central command room again transmits the weather information to each region. An automatic weather information system(AWOS)(10) automatically observes weather of an install zone. The automatic broadcasting system transmits the weather information of entire area of the central command room to wireless network.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: TABLE GENERATION METHOD FOR DECODING VARIABLE-LENGTH CODES

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for generating a table for decoding a code with a variable length is provided to reduce an average memory access number for decoding the code with the variable length using an N-bit code table. CONSTITUTION: A code table with a variable length and a search width N are is inputted(S10). A K-ary tree is generated from the inputted code table with variable length and the search width N(S20). The N-bit code table is generated from the K-ary tree(S30). The N-bit code table is stored in a memory. The N-bit code table is used for decoding the code with the variable length. The K-ary tree corresponds to the tree with the maximum K sub nodes.

exch:applicant-name.name: DAEGU GYEONGBUK INSTITUTE OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR SUPPORTING A DRIVER AND APPARATUS FOR THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A driving auxiliary apparatus and a driving support method are provided, which can analyze the state of a driver using the image and support driving vehicles. CONSTITUTION: A driving auxiliary apparatus comprises a terminal(100), a driving auxiliary unit(110), and a function control part(130). The terminal offers the navigator information about driving and the driver image about a driver. The driving auxiliary unit performs an accident prevention procedure and a sleep driving prevention procedure using judgment information. The function control part controls each function of vehicle by the driving auxiliary unit.
